tika-s0404t:5_2: Punappunaṃ katāyāti bhāvanāya bahulīkaraṇena aparāparaṃ pavattitāya.
tika-s0404t:5_3: Yuttayānasadisakatāyāti yathā yuttaājaññayānaṃ chekena sārathinā adhiṭṭhitaṃ yathāruci pavattati,
tika-s0404t:5_6: Paccupaṭṭhitāyāti bhāvanābahulīkārehi pati pati upaṭṭhitāya avijahitāya.
tika-s0404t:5_7: Samantato citāyāti sabbabhāgena bhāvanānurūpaṃ cayaṃ gamitāya.
tika-s0404t:6_0: Yo ca mettaṃ bhāvayatītiādīsu yo koci gahaṭṭho vā pabbajito vā. Mettanti mettājhānaṃ.
tika-s0404t:7_1: Asubhabhāvanādayo viya hi ārammaṇe ekadesaggahaṇaṃ akatvā anavasesapharaṇavasena anodhiso pharaṇavasena ca,
tika-s0404t:7_3: Tanū saṃyojanā hontīti mettaṃ pādakaṃ katvā sammasitvā heṭṭhime ariyamagge adhigacchantassa sukheneva
tika-s0404t:7_4: paṭighasaṃyojanādayo pahīyamānā tanū hontīti evamettha attho daṭṭhabbo.
tika-s0404t:8_0: Evaṃ kilesappahānañca nibbānādhigamañca mettābhāvanāya sikhāppattamānisaṃsaṃ dassetvā idāni aññepi ānisaṃse dassetuṃ “ekampi ce”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0404t:8_1: Tattha aduṭṭhacittoti mettābalena suṭṭhu vikkhambhitabyāpādatāya byāpādena adūsitacitto.
tika-s0404t:8_10: sabbe pana pāṇe attano puttaṃ viya hitapharaṇena manasā anukampanto pahukaṃ pahuṃ anappakaṃ apariyantaṃ
tika-s0404t:8_11: catusaṭṭhimahākappepi attano vipākappabandhaṃ pavattetuṃ samatthaṃ uḷāraṃ puññaṃ ariyo parisuddhacitto
tika-s0404t:9_1: Nipphannasassato nava bhāge kassakassa datvā raññaṃ ekabhāgaggahaṇaṃ dasamabhāgaggahaṇaṃ.
tika-s0404t:9_2: Evaṃ kassakā haṭṭhatuṭṭhā sassāni sampādentīti āha “sassasampādane medhāvitāti attho”ti.
tika-s0404t:10_1: Dvīhi pariyaññehīti mahāyaññassa pubbabhāge pacchā ca pavattetabbehi dvīhi parivārayaññehi. Satta…pe…
tika-s0404t:10_2: bhīsanassāti sattanavutādhikānaṃ pañcannaṃ pasusatānaṃ māraṇena bheravassa pāpabhīrukānaṃ bhayāvahassa.
tika-s0404t:13_3: Pubbe kira eko rājā sammāpāsaṃ yajanto sarassatinaditīre pathaviyā vivare dinne nimuggoyeva ahosi.
tika-s0404t:13_4: Andhabālabrāhmaṇā gatānugatigatā “ayaṃ tassa saggagamanamaggo”ti saññāya tattha sammāpāsaṃ yaññaṃ paṭṭhapenti.
tika-s0404t:13_11: Tattha kira yaññe attano sāpateyyaṃ anavasesato anigūhitvā niyyātīyati.
tika-s0404t:14_1: Tārāgaṇāva sabbeti yathā sabbepi tārāgaṇā candimasobhāya soḷasimpi kalaṃ nāgghanti,
tika-s0404t:14_2: evaṃ te assamedhādayo yaññā mettassa cittassa vuttalakkhaṇena subhāvitassa soḷasimpi kalaṃ nānubhavanti,
tika-s0404t:15_0: Idāni aparepi diṭṭhadhammikasamparāyike mettābhāvanāya ānisaṃse dassetuṃ “yo na hantī”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0404t:15_2: Na hantīti teneva mettābhāvanānubhāvena dūravikkhambhitabyāpādatāya na kañci sattaṃ hiṃsati,
tika-s0404t:15_4: Na ghātetīti paraṃ samādapetvā na satte mārāpeti na vibādhāpeti ca.
tika-s0404t:15_5: Na jinātīti sārambhaviggāhikakathādivasena na kañci jināti sārambhasseva abhāvato,
tika-s0404t:15_6: jānikaraṇavasena vā aṭṭakaraṇādinā na kañci jināti.
tika-s0404t:15_8: Na jāpayeti parehi payojetvā paresampi dhanajāniṃ na kārāpeyya.
tika-s0404t:15_10: Mettāya vā aṃso aviheṭhanaṭṭhena avayavabhūtoti mettaṃso.
tika-s0404t:18_4: Tuṇhībhāvo na titthiyānaṃ mūgabbatagahaṇaṃ viya aparisuddhoti ariyo tuṇhībhāvo.
tika-s0404t:18_8: Yathā vā ekacco viparītaṃ gaṇhanto jānantopi na jānāti,
tika-s0404t:21_8: Yasmā lohite sati tadupaghātavasena pubbo viya anurodho laddhāvasaro eva hoti,
tika-s0404t:24_1: Chaṭṭhe adhikaṃ payasati payujjati etenāti adhippayāso,
tika-s0404t:27_1: Navame duvidhā kulaputtā jātikulaputtā ācārakulaputtā ca.
tika-s0404t:27_2: Tattha “tena kho pana samayena raṭṭhapālo kulaputto tasmiṃyeva thullakoṭṭhike aggakulikassa putto”ti evaṃ āgatā uccākulaputtā jātikulaputtā.
tika-s0404t:27_3: “Saddhāyete kulaputtā agārasmā anagāriyaṃ pabbajitā”ti evaṃ āgatā pana yattha katthaci kule pasutāpi ācārakulaputtā nāma.
tika-s0404t:27_6: nandaṃ sammā vadamāno vadeyyā”ti bhagavatā vuttanti āha “jātikulaputto”ti.
tika-s0404t:30_5: Tattha aññaṃ kāraṇaṃ vacanaṃ vāti yaṃ codakena cuditakassa dosavibhāvanaṃ kāraṇaṃ,
tika-s0404t:30_9: Kāraṇenāti codanāya amūlāya amūlikabhāvadīpaniyā yuttiyā vā.
tika-s0404t:30_11: “Ko āpanno”tiādinā codanaṃ vissajjetvāva vikkhepāpajjanaṃ aññenāññaṃ paṭicaraṇaṃ.
tika-s0404t:30_12: Bahiddhā kathāpanāmanā nāma “itthannāmaṃ āpattiṃ āpannosī”ti vutte –
tika-s0404t:30_19: “evarūpaṃ kiñci tayā diṭṭha”nti vutte “na suṇāmī”ti sotaṃ vā upaneti,
tika-s0404t:30_21: Yo pana “itthannāmaṃ nāma āpattiṃ āpannosī”ti puṭṭho “pāṭaliputtaṃ gatomhī”ti vatvā puna “na tava pāṭaliputtagamanaṃ pucchāma,
tika-s0404t:30_25: Taṃ tattha me sūkaramaṃsaṃ laddha”ntiādīni vadati,
tika-s0404t:31_0: Kāraṇḍavaṃ niddhamathāti vipannasīlatāya kacavarabhūtaṃ puggalaṃ kacavaramiva anapekkhā apanetha.
tika-s0404t:31_1: Kasambuṃ apakassathāti kasambubhūtañca naṃ khattiyādīnaṃ majjhagataṃ pabhinnapaggharitakuṭṭhaṃ caṇḍālaṃ viya apakaḍḍhatha.
tika-s0404t:31_7: Yathā palāpā antosārarahitā ataṇḍulā bahi thusena vīhī viya dissanti,
tika-s0404t:31_8: evaṃ pāpabhikkhū anto sīlarahitāpi bahi kāsāvādiparikkhārena bhikkhū viya dissanti,
tika-s0404t:36_1: Dutiyassa paṭhame verañjāyaṃ viharatīti ettha verañjāti tassa nagarassetaṃ adhivacanaṃ,
tika-s0404t:36_8: saddo “mūlāni uddhareyya antamaso usīranāḷimattānipī”tiādīsu mūlamūle dissati.
tika-s0404t:36_14: tasmā naḷeruyakkhena adhiggahitassa pucimandassa samīpeti evamettha attho daṭṭhabbo.
tika-s0404t:36_15: So kira pucimando ramaṇīyo pāsādiko anekesaṃ rukkhānaṃ ādhipaccaṃ viya kurumāno tassa nagarassa avidūre gamanāgamanasampanne ṭhāne ahosi.
tika-s0404t:36_16: Atha bhagavā verañjaṃ gantvā patirūpe ṭhāne viharanto tassa rukkhassa samīpe heṭṭhābhāge vihāsi.
tika-s0404t:37_0: Paccuṭṭhānaṃ nāma āsanā vuṭṭhānanti āha “nāsanā vuṭṭhātī”ti.
tika-s0404t:37_3: vayoanuppatteti upayogavacanaṃ āsanā vuṭṭhānakiriyāpekkhaṃ na hoti.
tika-s0404t:37_5: vayoanuppatte disvā”ti ajjhāhāraṃ katvā attho veditabbo.
tika-s0404t:37_7: tasmā na paccuṭṭhātīti uṭṭhāya paccuggamanaṃ na karotīti attho veditabbo.
tika-s0404t:37_9: Vuttañhetaṃ “ācariyaṃ pana dūratova disvā paccuṭṭhāya paccuggamanakaraṇaṃ paccuṭṭhānaṃ nāmā”ti.
tika-s0404t:37_10: Nāsanā vuṭṭhātīti iminā pana paccuggamanābhāvassa upalakkhaṇamattaṃ dassitanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0404t:37_12: Na abhivādeti vāti na abhivādetabbanti vā sallakkhetīti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-s0404t:38_0: Taṃ aññāṇanti “ayaṃ mama abhivādanādīni kātuṃ araharūpo na hotī”ti ajānanavasena pavattaṃ aññāṇaṃ.
tika-s0404t:38_2: kiṃ nu kho ahaṃ samaṇaṃ vā brāhmaṇaṃ vā sakkareyyaṃ garuṃ kareyya”ntiādisuttavaseneva ñāṇacakkhunā olokento.
tika-s0404t:39_2: sampatijāto bodhisatto samehi pādehi patiṭṭhahitvā uttarābhimukho sattapadavītihārena gacchati,
tika-s0404t:39_3: setamhi chatte anudhāriyamāne sabbā disā viloketi,
tika-s0404t:40_0: Evaṃ pāḷiyaṃ sattapadavītihārupari ṭhitassa viya sabbādisānulokanassa kathitattā vuttaṃ,
tika-s0404t:40_1: na panetaṃ evaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ sattapadavītihārato pageva disāvilokanassa katattā.
tika-s0404t:40_2: Mahāsatto hi manussānaṃ hatthato muccitvā puratthimaṃ disaṃ olokesi,
tika-s0404t:40_10: uparīti dasapi disā anuviloketvā attano sadisaṃ adisvā “ayaṃ uttaradisā”ti sattapadavītihārena agamāsīti veditabbā.
tika-s0404t:40_11: Olokesinti mama puññānubhāvena lokavivaraṇapāṭihāriye jāte paññāyamānaṃ dasasahassilokadhātuṃ maṃsacakkhunāva olokesinti attho.
tika-s0404t:41_5: Atthato pana pacchimāni dve purimasseva vevacanānīti veditabbaṃ.
tika-s0404t:41_10: Mayhaṃ abhivādanādiraho puggaloti mayhaṃ abhivādanādikiriyāya araho anucchaviko puggalo.
tika-s0404t:42_2: mādisā vā arasarūpā”ti vutte brāhmaṇo thaddho bhaveyya.
tika-s0404t:43_8: Rūpaparibhogena uppannataṇhāsampayuttasomanassavedanā rūpato nibbattitvā hadayatappanato ambarasādayo viya rūparasāti vuccanti.
tika-s0404t:43_11: Anukkhipantoti attukkaṃsanavasena kathite brāhmaṇassa asappāyabhāvato attānaṃ anukkhipanto anukkaṃsento.
tika-s0404t:44_0: Etasmiṃ panatthe karaṇe sāmivacananti “jahitā”ti etasmiṃ atthe tathāgatassāti karaṇe sāmivacanaṃ,
tika-s0404t:44_4: kārañca dīghaṃ katvā “tālāvatthukatā”ti vuttanti āha “tālavatthu viya nesaṃ vatthu katanti tālāvatthukatā”ti.
tika-s0404t:44_6: Yathā ārāmassa vatthubhūtapubbo padeso ārāmassa abhāve “ārāmavatthū”ti vuccati,
tika-s0404t:44_7: evaṃ tālassa patiṭṭhitokāso samūlaṃ uddharite tāle padesamatte ṭhite tālassa vatthubhūtapubbattā “tālavatthū”ti vuccati.
tika-s0404t:44_9: Kathaṃ pana tālavatthu viya nesaṃ vatthu katanti āha “yathā hī”tiādi.
tika-s0404t:44_11: vuttaṃ “tesaṃ pubbe uppannapubbabhāvena vatthumatte cittasantāne kate”ti.
tika-s0404t:44_14: Tālāvatthukatāti vuccantīti tālavatthu viya attano vatthussa katattā rūparasādayo “tālāvatthukatā”ti vuccanti.
tika-s0404t:44_15: Etena pahīnakilesānaṃ puna uppattiyā abhāvo dassito.
tika-s0404t:45_1: Matthakacchinno tālo pattaphalādīnaṃ avatthubhūto tālāvatthūti āha “matthakacchinnatālo viya katā”ti.
tika-s0404t:45_2: Etena “tālāvatthu viya katāti tālāvatthukatā”ti ayaṃ viggaho dassito.
tika-s0404t:45_3: Ettha pana “avatthubhūto tālo viya katāti avatthutālakatā”ti vattabbe visesanassa paranipātaṃ katvā “tālāvatthukatā”ti vuttanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0404t:45_5: rūparasādivacanena vipākadhammadhammā hutvā pubbe uppannakusalākusalā dhammā gahitā,
tika-s0404t:45_6: te uppannāpi matthakasadisānaṃ taṇhāvijjānaṃ maggasatthena chinnattā āyatiṃ tālapattasadise vipākakkhandhe nibbattetuṃ asamatthā jātā,
tika-s0404t:45_7: tasmā tālāvatthu viya katāti tālāvatthukatā rūparasādayoti.
tika-s0404t:45_8: Imasmiṃ atthe “abhinandantāna”nti iminā padena kusalasomanassampi saṅgahitanti vadanti.
tika-s0404t:45_10: saddo pacchāsaddena samānatthoti āha “yathā nesaṃ pacchābhāvo na hotī”tiādi.
tika-s0404t:46_1: so pariyāyo na hotīti yaṃ vandanādisāmaggirasābhāvasaṅkhātaṃ kāraṇaṃ arasarūpatāya vadesi,
tika-s0404t:46_4: Nanu cāyaṃ brāhmaṇo yaṃ vandanādisāmaggirasābhāvasaṅkhātapariyāyaṃ sandhāya “arasarūpo bhavaṃ gotamo”ti āha,
tika-s0404t:46_5: “so pariyāyo natthī”ti vutte vandanādīni bhagavā karotīti āpajjatīti imaṃ aniṭṭhappasaṅgaṃ dassento āha “nanu cā”tiādi.
tika-s0404t:47_1: Sandhāyabhāsitamattanti yaṃ sandhāya brāhmaṇo “nibbhogo bhavaṃ gotamo”tiādimāha.
tika-s0404t:47_2: Bhagavā ca yaṃ sandhāya nibbhogatādiṃ attani anujānāti,
tika-s0404t:48_3: “Anekavihitānaṃ pāpakānaṃ akusalānaṃ dhammāna”nti sāmaññavacanepi pārisesañāyato vuttāvasesā akusaladhammā gahetabbāti āha “ṭhapetvā te dhamme”tiādi,
tika-s0404t:49_0: Ayaṃ lokatantīti ayaṃ vuḍḍhānaṃ abhivādanādikiriyalakkhaṇā lokappaveṇī.
tika-s0404t:49_1: Anāgāmibrahmānaṃ alaṅkārādīsu anāgāmibhikkhūnañca cīvarādīsu nikantivasena rāguppatti hotīti anāgāmimaggena
tika-s0404t:49_3: Rūpādīsu pañcasu kāmaguṇesu vatthukāmakoṭṭhāsesu uppajjamāno rāgo “pañcakāmaguṇikarāgo”ti veditabbo.
tika-s0404t:50_0: Jigucchati maññeti ahamabhijāto rūpavā paññavā kathaṃ nāma aññesaṃ abhivādanādiṃ kareyyanti jigucchati viya,
tika-s0404t:50_2: Akusaladhamme jigucchamāno tesaṃ samaṅgibhāvampi jigucchatīti vuttaṃ “akusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ samāpattiyā jigucchatī”ti.
tika-s0404t:51_5: Vinayaṃ vā arahatīti ettha vinayanaṃ vinayo,
tika-s0404t:51_8: Nanu ca paṭhamaṃ vuttesu dvīsupi atthavikappesu sakatthe arahatthe ca taddhitapaccayo saddalakkhaṇato dissati,
tika-s0404t:51_9: na pana “vinayāya dhammaṃ desetī”ti imasmiṃ atthe.
tika-s0404t:51_10: Tasmā kathamettha taddhitapaccayoti āha “vicitrā hi taddhitavuttī”ti.
tika-s0404t:51_12: Tathā hi yasmiṃ yasmiṃ atthe taddhitappayogo lokassa,
tika-s0404t:51_13: tattha tattha taddhitavutti lokato siddhāti vicitrā taddhitavutti,
tika-s0404t:51_15: evaṃ vinayāya dhammaṃ desetīti venayikoti vuccatīti adhippāyo.
tika-s0404t:52_1: Byañjanāni avicāretvāti tissadattādisaddesu viya “imasmiṃ atthe ayaṃ nāma paccayo”ti evaṃ byañjanavicāraṃ akatvā,
tika-s0404t:53_0: “Devalokagabbhasampattiyā”ti vatvāpi ṭhapetvā bhummadeve sesadevesu gabbhaggahaṇassa abhāvato paṭisandhiyevettha
tika-s0404t:53_1: gabbhasampattīti veditabbāti vuttamevatthaṃ vivaritvā dassento āha “devalokapaṭisandhipaṭilābhāya saṃvattatī”ti.
tika-s0404t:53_3: Mātukucchismiṃ paṭisandhiggahaṇe dosaṃ dassentoti mātito aparisuddhabhāvaṃ dassento,
tika-s0404t:53_4: akkositukāmassa dāsiyā puttoti dāsikucchimhi nibbattabhāve dosaṃ dassetvā akkosanaṃ viya bhagavato mātukucchismiṃ
tika-s0404t:53_5: paṭisandhiggahaṇe dosaṃ dassetvā akkosantopi evamāhāti adhippāyo.
tika-s0404t:53_8: “Hīno vā gabbho assāti apagabbho”ti imassa viggahassa ekena pariyāyena adhippāyaṃ dassento āha “devalokagabbhaparibāhirattā
tika-s0404t:53_12: tasmā hīno vā gabbho assāti apagabbhoti adhippāyo.
tika-s0404t:53_14: dassento”ti heṭṭhā vuttanayassa anurūpaṃ katvā adhippāyaṃ dassento āha “hīno vāssa mātukucchismiṃ gabbhavāso ahosīti adhippāyo”ti. Gabbha-
tika-s0404t:53_15: saddo atthi mātukucchipariyāyo “gabbhe vasati māṇavo”tiādīsu viya.
tika-s0404t:53_16: Atthi mātukucchismiṃ nibbattasattapariyāyo “antamaso gabbhapātanaṃ upādāyā”tiādīsu viya.
tika-s0404t:53_17: Tattha mātukucchipariyāyaṃ gahetvā atthaṃ dassento āha “anāgate gabbhaseyyā”ti.
tika-s0404t:53_22: Ettha ca yadipi “apagabbho”ti imassa anurūpato gabbhaseyyā eva vattabbā,
tika-s0404t:53_23: pasaṅgato pana labbhamānaṃ sabbampi vattuṃ vaṭṭatīti punabbhavābhinibbattipi vuttāti veditabbā.
tika-s0404t:54_2: Imasmiṃ pana vikappe gabbhaseyyā punabbhavābhinibbattīti ubhayampi gabbhaseyyavaseneva vuttantipi vadanti.
tika-s0404t:54_3: Nanu ca “āyatiṃ gabbhaseyyā pahīnā”ti vuttattā gabbhassa seyyā eva pahīnā,
tika-s0404t:54_4: na pana gabbhoti āpajjatīti āha “yathā cā”tiādi.
tika-s0404t:54_5: Atha “abhinibbattī”ti ettakameva avatvā punabbhavaggahaṇaṃ kimatthanti āha “abhinibbatti ca nāmā”tiādi.
tika-s0404t:54_6: Apunabbhavabhūtāti khaṇe khaṇe uppajjamānānaṃ dhammānaṃ abhinibbatti.
tika-s0404t:55_0: Dhammadhātunti ettha dhamme anavasese dhāreti yāthāvato upadhāretīti dhammadhātu,
tika-s0404t:55_6: Desanāvilāsappatto hotīti rucivasena parivattetvā dassetuṃ samatthatā desanāvilāso,
tika-s0404t:55_9: Tādilakkhaṇameva puna upamāya vibhāvetvā dassento āha “pathavīsamacittata”nti.
tika-s0404t:55_12: evaṃ iṭṭhāniṭṭhesu lābhālābhādīsu anurodhavirodhappahānato avikampitacittatāya pathavīsamacittatanti attho.
tika-s0404t:55_13: Akuppadhammatanti ettha akuppadhammo nāma phalasamāpattīti keci vadanti.
tika-s0404t:55_14: “Paresu pana akkosantesupi attano pathavīsamacittatāya akuppanasabhāvatanti evamettha attho gahetabbo”ti amhākaṃ khanti.
tika-s0404t:55_16: Brāhmaṇassa vuddhatāya āsannavuttimaraṇanti sambhāvanavasena “ajja maritvā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0404t:55_17: “Mahantena kho pana ussāhenā”ti sādhu kho pana tathārūpānaṃ arahataṃ dassanaṃ hotī”ti evaṃ sañjātamahussāhena.
tika-s0404t:56_0: Pakkhe vidhunantāti patte cālentā. Nikkhamantānanti niddhāraṇe sāmivacanaṃ, nikkhantesūti attho.
tika-s0404t:57_0: So jeṭṭho iti assa vacanīyoti yo paṭhamataraṃ aṇḍakosato nikkhanto kukkuṭapotako,
tika-s0404t:57_4: Tibhūmapariyāpannāpi sattā avijjākosassa anto paviṭṭhā tattha tattha appahīnāya avijjāya veṭhitattāti
tika-s0404t:57_5: āha “avijjākosassa anto paviṭṭhesu sattesū”ti aṇḍakosanti bījakapālaṃ.
tika-s0404t:57_6: Lokasannivāseti lokoyeva saṅgamma samāgamma nivāsanaṭṭhena lokasannivāso,
tika-s0404t:57_10: Tasmā sammā aviparītenākārena sayameva cattāri saccāni bujjhati paṭivijjhatīti sammāsambodhīti maggo vuccati.
tika-s0404t:57_14: saddo sundaravacanoti āha “atha vā pasatthaṃ sundarañca bodhi”nti.
tika-s0404t:58_3: Tisso vijjāti upanissayavato saheva arahattaphalena tisso vijjā deti.
tika-s0404t:58_4: Nanu cettha tīsu vijjāsu āsavakkhayañāṇassa maggapariyāpannattā kathametaṃ yujjati “maggo tisso vijjā detī”ti?
tika-s0404t:58_6: Satipi āsavakkhayañāṇassa maggapariyāpannabhāve aṭṭhaṅgike magge sati maggañāṇena saddhiṃ tisso vijjā
tika-s0404t:58_7: paripuṇṇā hontīti “maggo tisso vijjā detī”ti vuccati.
tika-s0404t:58_10: Paccekabodhiñāṇanti etthāpi imināva nayena attho veditabbo.
tika-s0404t:58_14: Paṭivedhopi na dūre ṭhitassa lakkhaṇappaṭivedho viyāti āha “pattomhī”ti,
tika-s0404t:59_2: Yathā kukkuṭiyā aṇḍesu tividhakiriyākaraṇaṃ kukkuṭacchāpakānaṃ aṇḍakosato nikkhamanassa mūlakāraṇaṃ,
tika-s0404t:59_3: evaṃ bodhisattabhūtassa bhagavato tividhānupassanākaraṇaṃ avijjaṇḍakosato nikkhamanassa mūlakāraṇanti āha “yathā hi tassā kukkuṭiyā…pe…
tika-s0404t:59_7: buddhaguṇāti ca atthato buddhoyeva “tathāgatassa kho etaṃ, vāseṭṭha,
tika-s0404t:59_12: Tikkhakharavippasannasūrabhāvoti ettha pariggayhamānesu saṅkhāresu vipassanāñāṇassa samādhindriyavasena sukhānuppaveso tikkhatā,
tika-s0404t:59_14: Tikkhopi hi ekacco saro lakkhaṃ patvā kuṇṭho hoti,
tika-s0404t:59_16: Satipi kharabhāve sukhumappavattivasena kilesasamudācārasaṅkhobharahitatāya saddhindriyavasena pasannabhāvo,
tika-s0404t:59_17: satipi pasannabhāve antarā anosakkitvā kilesapaccatthikānaṃ suṭṭhu abhibhavanato vīriyindriyavasena sūrabhāvo veditabbo.
tika-s0404t:59_20: Tadā ca sā maggañāṇagabbhaṃ dhārentī viya hotīti āha “gabbhaggahaṇakālo”ti.
tika-s0404t:59_21: Gabbhaṃ gaṇhāpetvāti saṅkhārupekkhāya anantaraṃ sikhāppattaanulomavipassanāvasena maggavijāyanatthaṃ gabbhaṃ gaṇhāpetvā.
tika-s0404t:60_0: Jeṭṭho seṭṭhoti vuddhatamattā jeṭṭho, sabbaguṇehi uttamattā pasatthatamoti seṭṭho.
tika-s0404t:61_1: vīriya”ntiādikāya desanāya anusandhiṃ dassento āha “evaṃ bhagavā”tiādi.
tika-s0404t:61_2: Tattha pubbabhāgato pabhutīti bhāvanāya pubbabhāgīyavīriyārambhādito paṭṭhāya.
tika-s0404t:61_8: Sā ettha maṇḍā pasannā jātāti so padeso “bodhimaṇḍo”ti paññāto.
tika-s0404t:61_9: Paggahitanti ārambhaṃ sithilaṃ akatvā daḷhaparakkamasaṅkhātussahanabhāvena gahitaṃ.
tika-s0404t:61_12: Upaṭṭhitāti ogāhanasaṅkhātena apilāpanabhāvena ārammaṇaṃ upagantvā ṭhitā.
tika-s0404t:61_14: Sammosassa viddhaṃsanavasena pavattiyā na sammuṭṭhāti asammuṭṭhā.
tika-s0404t:61_17: tathāpi yasmā kāyappassaddhi uppajjamānā cittappassaddhiyā saheva uppajjati, na vinā,
tika-s0404t:61_19: Kāyappassaddhiyā ubhayesampi kāyānaṃ passambhanāvahattā vuttaṃ “rūpakāyopi passaddhoyeva hotī”ti.
tika-s0404t:62_0: So ca khoti so ca kho kāyo.
tika-s0404t:62_2: Nāmakāye hi vigatadarathe rūpakāyopi vūpasantadarathapariḷāho hoti.
tika-s0404t:62_3: Sammā āhitanti nānārammaṇesu vidhāvanasaṅkhātaṃ vikkhepaṃ vicchinditvā ekasmiṃyeva ārammaṇe avikkhittabhāvāpādanena sammadeva āhitaṃ ṭhapitaṃ.
tika-s0404t:62_6: sā sati ekaggatāya na hotīti āha “ekaggaṃ acalaṃ nipphandana”nti.
tika-s0404t:62_8: Nanu ca saddhāpaññānampi kiccasiddhi jhānassa pubbabhāgappaṭipadāya icchitabbāti? Saccaṃ,
tika-s0404t:62_9: sā pana nānantarikabhāvena avuttasiddhāti na gahitā.
tika-s0404t:62_11: paññāpariggahe ca nesaṃ asati ñāyārambhādibhāvo na siyā,
tika-s0404t:62_12: tathā asallīnāsammosatādayo vīriyādīnanti asallīnatādiggahaṇenevettha paññākiccasiddhi gahitāti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0404t:62_13: Jhānabhāvanāyaṃ vā samādhikiccaṃ adhikaṃ icchitabbanti dassetuṃ samādhipariyosānāva jhānassa pubbabhāgappaṭipadā kathitāti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0404t:63_0: Atītabhave khandhā tappaṭibaddhāni nāmagottāni ca sabbaṃ pubbenivāsaṃtveva gahitanti āha “kiṃ viditaṃ karoti?
tika-s0404t:63_2: Moho paṭicchādakaṭṭhena tamo viya tamoti āha “sveva moho”ti.
tika-s0404t:63_7: Avijjā vihatāti etena vijānanaṭṭhena vijjāti ayampi attho dīpitoti daṭṭhabbaṃ. “Kasmā?
tika-s0404t:63_8: Yasmā vijjā uppannā”ti etena vijjāpaṭipakkhā avijjā.
tika-s0404t:63_9: Paṭipakkhatā cassā pahātabbabhāvena vijjāya ca pahāyakabhāvenāti dasseti.
tika-s0404t:63_10: Esa nayo itarasmimpi padadvayeti iminā “tamo vihato vinaṭṭho. Kasmā?
tika-s0404t:63_12: Kilesānaṃ ātāpanaparitāpanaṭṭhena vīriyaṃ ātāpoti āha “vīriyātāpena ātāpino”ti,
tika-s0404t:63_15: Yathā appamattassa ātāpino pahitattassa viharatoti aññassapi kassaci mādisassāti adhippāyo.
tika-s0404t:64_0: Paccavekkhaṇañāṇapariggahitanti na paṭhamadutiyañāṇadvayādhigamaṃ viya kevalanti adhippāyo.
tika-s0404t:65_0: Tikkhattuṃ jātoti iminā pana idaṃ dasseti – “ahaṃ, brāhmaṇa,
tika-s0404t:65_1: paṭhamavijjāya jātoyeva purejātassa sahajātassa vā abhāvato sabbesaṃ vuddho mahallako,
tika-s0404t:65_2: kimaṅgaṃ pana tīhi vijjāhi tikkhattuṃ jāto”ti.
tika-s0404t:65_3: Pubbenivāsañāṇena atītaṃsañāṇanti atītārammaṇasabhāgatāya tabbhāvibhāvato ca pubbenivāsañāṇena atītaṃsañāṇaṃ pakāsetvāti yojetabbaṃ.
tika-s0404t:65_4: Tattha atītaṃsañāṇanti atītakkhandhāyatanadhātusaṅkhāte atīte koṭṭhāse appaṭihatañāṇaṃ.
tika-s0404t:65_5: Dibbacakkhuñāṇassa paccuppannārammaṇattā yathākammūpagañāṇassa anāgataṃsañāṇassa ca dibbacakkhuvaseneva
tika-s0404t:65_6: ijjhanato dibbacakkhuno paribhaṇḍañāṇattā dibbacakkhumhiyeva ca ṭhitassa cetopariyañāṇasiddhito vuttaṃ
tika-s0404t:69_2: Uyyogakālādīsu hi rājāno tattha ṭhatvā “ettakā purato gacchantu,
tika-s0404t:69_3: ettakā pacchā”tiādinā tattha nisīditvā santhaṃ karonti,
tika-s0404t:69_6: Uyyogaṭṭhānato ca āgantvā yāva gehe gomayaparibhaṇḍādivasena paṭijagganaṃ karonti,
tika-s0404t:69_7: tāva ekaṃ dve divase te rājāno tattha santhambhantītipi santhāgāraṃ.
tika-s0404t:69_8: Tesaṃ rājūnaṃ saha atthānusāsanaṃ agārantipi santhāgāraṃ.
tika-s0404t:69_10: tasmā uppannaṃ kiccaṃ ekassa vasena na sijjhati,
tika-s0404t:69_14: Yasmā vā tattha sannipatitvā “imasmiṃ kāle kasituṃ vaṭṭati,
tika-s0404t:69_15: imasmiṃ kāle vapitu”ntiādinā nayena gharāvāsakiccāni sammantayanti,
tika-s0404t:70_8: Satipi mahāpariccāgānaṃ dānapāramibhāve pariccāgavisesasabhāvadassanatthañceva sudukkarabhāvadassanatthañca pañcamahāpariccāgānaṃ visuṃ gahaṇaṃ,
tika-s0404t:72_1: Dvīhi kāraṇehi aniyyānikasāsane ṭhitā attano sāvakattaṃ upagate paggaṇhanti,
tika-s0404t:73_3: Tattha dānakathā tāva pacurajanesupi pavattiyā sabbasattasādhāraṇattā sukarattā sīle patiṭṭhānassa upāyabhāvato ca ādito kathitā.
tika-s0404t:73_4: Pariccāgasīlo hi puggalo pariggahavatthūsu nissaṅgabhāvato sukheneva sīlāni samādiyati,
tika-s0404t:73_6: Sīlena dāyakappaṭiggāhakavisuddhito parānuggahaṃ vatvā parapīḷānivattivacanato kiriyādhammaṃ vatvā akiriyādhammavacanato,
tika-s0404t:73_7: bhogasampattihetuṃ vatvā bhavasampattihetuvacanato ca dānakathānantaraṃ sīlakathā kathitā.
tika-s0404t:73_10: “Imehi ca dānasīlamayehi paṇītapaṇītatarādibhedabhinnehi puññakiriyavatthūhi etā cātumahārājikādīsu paṇītapaṇītatarādibhedabhinnā
tika-s0404t:73_11: aparimeyyā dibbabhogasampattiyo laddhabbā”ti dassanatthaṃ tadanantaraṃ saggakathā.
tika-s0404t:73_14: maggañca kathentena tadadhigamūpāyasandassanatthaṃ saggapariyāpannāpi pageva itare sabbepi kāmā nāma
tika-s0404t:73_15: bahvādīnavā aniccā addhuvā vipariṇāmadhammāti kāmānaṃ ādīnavo.
tika-s0404t:73_16: “Hīnā gammā pothujjanikā anariyā anatthasaṃhitā”ti tesaṃ okāro lāmakabhāvo.
tika-s0404t:73_17: Sabbepi bhavā kilesānaṃ vatthubhūtāti tattha saṃkileso.
tika-s0404t:73_18: Sabbaso saṃkilesavippamuttaṃ nibbānanti nekkhamme ānisaṃso ca kathetabboti ayamattho maggantīti ettha iti-
tika-s0404t:74_0: Sukhānaṃ nidānanti diṭṭhadhammikānaṃ samparāyikānaṃ nibbānupasaṃhitānañcāti sabbesampi sukhānaṃ kāraṇaṃ.
tika-s0404t:74_5: Sampattīnaṃ mūlanti yā imā loke padesarajjasirissariyasattaratanasamujjalacakkavattisampadāti evaṃpabhedā mānusikā sampattiyo,
tika-s0404t:74_9: Bhogānanti bhuñjitabbaṭṭhena “bhogo”ti laddhanāmānaṃ piyamanāpiyarūpādīnaṃ tannissayānaṃ vā upabhogasukhānaṃ patiṭṭhā niccalādhiṭṭhānatāya.
tika-s0404t:75_1: Evaṃ hissa mahagghaṃ hutvā sabbaso vinipatituṃ appadānaṭṭho dīpito hoti.
tika-s0404t:75_3: Yathā dubbalassa purisassa ālambanarajju uttiṭṭhato tiṭṭhato ca upatthambho,
tika-s0404t:75_4: evaṃ dānaṃ sattānaṃ sampattibhave upapattiyā ṭhitiyā ca paccayoti āha “ālambanaṭṭhena ālambanarajjusadisa”nti.
tika-s0404t:75_17: Dāyako hi dānapati sampati pakkhabalena balavā hoti,
tika-s0404t:76_0: Idāni mahābodhicariyabhāvenapi dānaguṇaṃ dassetuṃ “dānaṃ nāmeta”ntiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0404t:76_1: Tattha attānaṃ niyyātentenāti etena “dānaphalaṃ sammadeva passantā mahāpurisā attano jīvitampi pariccajanti,
tika-s0404t:76_2: tasmā ko nāma viññujātiko bāhire vatthusmiṃ pageva saṅgaṃ kareyyā”ti ovādaṃ deti.
tika-s0404t:76_3: Idāni yā lokiyā lokuttarā ca ukkaṃsagatā sampattiyo,
tika-s0404t:76_6: cakkavattisampatti pana attahitāya parahitāya cāti dassetuṃ sā tāsaṃ parato cakkavattisampatti vuttā.
tika-s0404t:76_9: Tāsupi ukkaṭṭhukkaṭṭhatarukkaṭṭhatamataṃ dassetuṃ kamena ñāṇattayaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-s0404t:76_10: Tesaṃ pana dānassa paccayabhāvo heṭṭhā vuttoyeva.
tika-s0404t:76_11: Eteneva tassa brahmasampattiyāpi paccayabhāvo dīpitoti veditabbo.
tika-s0404t:77_0: Dānañca nāma dakkhiṇeyyesu hitajjhāsayena pūjanajjhāsayena vā attano santakassa paresaṃ pariccajanaṃ,
tika-s0404t:77_2: paresaṃ vā santakaṃ haratīti aṭṭhānametanti āha “dānaṃ dento sīlaṃ samādātuṃ sakkotī”ti.
tika-s0404t:77_4: Sīlapupphasadisaṃ pupphaṃ natthīti etthāpi eseva nayo.
tika-s0404t:77_5: Sīlagandhasadiso gandho natthīti ettha “candanaṃ tagaraṃ vāpī”tiādikā gāthā –
tika-s0404t:77_7: kāyā cuto gacchati mālutenā”tiādikā jātakagāthāyo ca āharitvā vattabbā.
tika-s0404t:77_8: Sīlañhi sattānaṃ ābharaṇañceva alaṅkāro ca gandhavilepanañca parassa dassanīyabhāvāvahañca.
tika-s0404t:78_0: Ayaṃ saggo labbhatīti idaṃ majjhimehi āraddhaṃ sīlaṃ sandhāyāha. Tenevāha sakko devarājā –
tika-s0404t:81_3: Taṃ pana tassa iṭṭhādibhāvaṃ dassetuṃ “niccamettha kīḷā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0404t:82_2: Atha vā ādīnaṃ vāti pavattatīti ādīnavo,
tika-s0404t:82_4: Tathā ca kāmā yathātathaṃ paccavekkhantānaṃ paccupatiṭṭhanti.
tika-s0404t:83_7: nikkhantaṃ byāpādasaññāyā”tiādinā nayena nekkhamme ānisaṃse pakāsesi.
tika-s0404t:83_8: Pabbajjāyaṃ jhānādīsu ca guṇe vibhāvesi vaṇṇesi.
tika-s0404t:83_9: Kallacittanti kammaniyacittaṃ heṭṭhā pavattitadesanāya assaddhiyādīnaṃ cittadosānaṃ vigatattā upari desanāya bhājanabhāvūpagamena kammakkhamacittaṃ.
tika-s0404t:83_10: Aṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana yasmā assaddhiyādayo cittassa rogabhūtā,
tika-s0404t:83_22: Pasannacittanti vicikicchāvigamena sammāpaṭipattiyaṃ adhimuttacittanti evamettha sesapadānaṃ attho veditabbo.
tika-s0404t:84_0: Seyyathāpītiādinā upamāvasena sīhassa kilesappahānaṃ ariyamagguppādanañca dasseti.
tika-s0404t:84_7: Etenassa lahuvipassakatā tikkhapaññatā sukhappaṭipadakhippābhiññatā ca dassitā hoti.
tika-s0404t:84_18: vatthassa āgantukamalehi kiliṭṭhabhāvo viya cittassa rāgādimalehi saṃkiliṭṭhabhāvo,
tika-s0404t:84_21: udakena temetvā ūsagomayachārikakhārehi kāḷake sammadditvā vatthassa dhovanappayogo viya saddhāsinehena
tika-s0404t:84_22: temetvā temetvā satisamādhipaññāhi dose sithile katvā sutādividhinā cittassa sodhane vīriyārambho.
tika-s0404t:84_23: Tena payogena vatthe kāḷakāpagamo viya vīriyārambhena kilesavikkhambhanaṃ,
tika-s0404t:84_25: tena suddhavatthassa pabhassarabhāvo viya vikkhambhitakilesassa cittassa maggena pariyodapananti.
tika-s0404t:85_0: “Diṭṭhadhammo”ti vatvā dassanaṃ nāma ñāṇadassanato aññampi atthīti tannivattanatthaṃ “pattadhammo”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0404t:85_1: Patti nāma ñāṇasampattito aññāpi vijjatīti tato visesanatthaṃ “viditadhammo”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0404t:85_2: Sā panesā viditadhammatā dhammesu ekadesenapi hotīti nippadesato viditabhāvaṃ dassetuṃ.
tika-s0404t:85_5: Maggañāṇañhi ekābhisamayavasena pariññādikiccaṃ sādhentaṃ nippadesena catusaccadhammaṃ samantato ogāḷhaṃ nāma hoti.
tika-s0404t:85_7: Tiṇṇā vicikicchāti sappaṭibhayakantārasadisā soḷasavatthukā aṭṭhavatthukā ca tiṇṇā nittiṇṇā vicikicchā.
tika-s0404t:85_9: na nu kho”ti evaṃ pavattikā vigatā samucchinnā kathaṃkathā.
tika-s0404t:85_10: Sārajjakarānaṃ pāpadhammānaṃ pahīnattā tappaṭipakkhesu sīlādiguṇesu patiṭṭhitattā vesārajjaṃ visāradabhāvaṃ veyyattiyaṃ patto.
tika-s0404t:85_11: Attanā eva paccakkhato diṭṭhattā na paraṃ pacceti,
tika-s0404t:85_12: na cassa paro paccetabbo atthīti aparappaccayo.
tika-s0404t:86_0: Uddisitvā katanti attānaṃ uddisitvā māraṇavasena kataṃ nibbattitaṃ maṃsaṃ.
tika-s0404t:86_2: saddo kammasādhano atītakāliko cāti āha “attānaṃ paṭiccakata”nti.
tika-s0404t:86_5: Karaṇavasena paṭiccakammaṃ ettha atthīti maṃsaṃ paṭiccakammaṃ yathā buddhi buddhaṃ.
tika-s0404t:89_3: Tāni panassa sāṭheyyādīni kāyacittujukatāpaṭipakkhabhūtā lobhasahagatacittuppādassa pavattiākāravisesā.
tika-s0404t:89_4: Tattha yassa kismiñcideva ṭhāne ṭhātukāmassa sato yaṃ ṭhānaṃ manussānaṃ sappaṭibhayaṃ,
tika-s0404t:89_5: purato gantvā tatheva sappaṭibhayaṭṭhāneva ṭhassāmīti na hoti,
tika-s0404t:89_6: vañcanādhippāyabhāvato ṭhātukāmaṭṭhāneyeva nikhātatthambho viya cattāro pāde niccāletvā tiṭṭhati,
tika-s0404t:89_9: Tathā yassa kismiñcideva ṭhāne nivattitvā khandhagataṃ pātetukāmassa sato yaṃ ṭhānaṃ manussānaṃ sappaṭibhayaṃ,
tika-s0404t:89_10: purato gantvā tatheva pātessāmīti na hoti,
tika-s0404t:89_15: kālena ujumaggeneva ca gantukāmassa sato yaṃ ṭhānaṃ manussānaṃ sappaṭibhayaṃ,
tika-s0404t:89_16: purato gantvā tatheva evaṃ karissāmīti na hoti,
tika-s0404t:89_20: tathā leṇḍaṃ vā passāvaṃ vā vissajjetukāmassa idaṃ ṭhānaṃ susammaṭṭhaṃ ākiṇṇamanussaṃ ramaṇīyaṃ.
tika-s0404t:89_21: Imasmiṃ ṭhāne evarūpaṃ kātuṃ na yuttaṃ,
tika-s0404t:89_22: purato gantvā paṭicchannaṭṭhāne karissāmīti na hoti,
tika-s0404t:89_25: Yassa pana kismiñci ṭhāne maggā ukkamma nivattitvā paṭimaggaṃ ārohitukāmassa sato yaṃ ṭhānaṃ manussānaṃ sappaṭibhayaṃ,
tika-s0404t:89_26: purato gantvā tattheva evaṃ karissāmīti na hoti,
tika-s0404t:89_27: paṭimaggaṃ ārohitukāmaṭṭhāneyeva maggā ukkamma nivattitvā paṭimaggaṃ ārohati,
tika-s0404t:89_29: Iti imaṃ catubbidhampi kiriyaṃ sandhāyetaṃ vuttaṃ “yāni kho panassa tāni sāṭheyyāni…pe…
tika-s0404t:92_1: Pañcame yā kāci pariyatti vā sippaṃ vā yasmā asajjhāyantassa ananuyuñjantassa vinassati,
tika-s0404t:92_4: Yasmā pana gharāvāsaṃ vasantassa uṭṭhāyuṭṭhāya jiṇṇappaṭisaṅkharaṇādīni akarontassa gharaṃ nāma vinassati,
tika-s0404t:92_6: Yasmā gihissa vā pabbajitassa vā kosajjavasena sarīrappajagganaṃ vā parikkhārappaṭijagganaṃ vā akarontassa kāyo dubbaṇṇo hoti,
tika-s0404t:92_8: Yasmā pana gāvo rakkhantassa pamādavasena niddāyantassa vā kīḷantassa vā tā gāvo atitthapakkhandanādīhi
tika-s0404t:92_9: vā vāḷamigacorādiupaddavena vā paresaṃ sālikkhettādīni otaritvā khādanavasena vā vināsamāpajjanti,
tika-s0404t:92_10: sayampi daṇḍaṃ vā paribhāsaṃ vā pāpuṇāti,
tika-s0404t:92_11: pabbajitaṃ vā pana chadvārādīni arakkhantaṃ pamādavasena kilesā otaritvā sāsanā cāventi,
tika-s0404t:93_3: akkhīhipi na daṭṭhabbā”ti taṃ mātāpitaropi nīharanti,
tika-s0404t:93_7: Yassa hi khettakasanakāle “imasmiṃ khette sampanne salākabhattādīni dassāmī”ti cintetvāpi nipphanne sasse maccheraṃ uppajjitvā cāgacittaṃ nivāreti,
tika-s0404t:93_14: Te pana idhaloke paraloke ca malameva.
tika-s0404t:96_1: Navame asurāti devā viya na suranti na kīḷanti na virocantīti asurā.
tika-s0404t:96_6: Te tattha pavisantā nikkhamantā sinerupāde maṇḍapādīni nimminitvā kīḷantā abhiramanti.
tika-s0404t:96_8: Ime guṇe disvāti āha “ye disvā disvā asurā mahāsamudde abhiramantī”ti.
tika-s0404t:97_1: himavā tattha patiṭṭhitasamuddadahapabbatā tappabhavā nadiyoti etesu yaṃ yaṃ na manussagocaraṃ,
tika-s0404t:97_3: tasmā tattha sammohavidhamanatthaṃ “ayaṃ tāva jambudīpo”tiādi āraddhaṃ.
tika-s0404t:97_20: āyāmato pana ubbedhato viya dviyojanasatānevā”ti vadanti.
tika-s0404t:98_1: Supaṭiyattānīti tadupabhogisattānaṃ sādhāraṇakammunāva suṭṭhu paṭiyattāni susaṇṭhitāni honti.
tika-s0404t:98_5: Purimāni nāmagottānīti ettha nadī ninnagātiādikaṃ gottaṃ,
tika-s0404t:100_0: Mama sāvakāti sotāpannādike ariyapuggale sandhāya vadati.
tika-s0404t:100_1: Na saṃvasatīti uposathakammādivasena saṃvāsaṃ na karoti.
tika-s0404t:100_4: Sabbā hi sāsanasampatti yāvadeva anupādāya āsavehi cittassa vimuttiatthā.
tika-s0404t:101_1: Satipaṭṭhānādayo hi bhāviyamānā pubbabhāgepi anappakaṃ pītipāmojjaṃ nibbattenti,
tika-s0404t:104_0: Lokiyaratananibbattaṃ pana pītipāmojjaṃ na tassa kalabhāgampi agghati. Apica –
tika-s0404t:107_0: Yadi ca cittīkatādibhāvena ratanaṃ nāma hoti,
tika-s0404t:107_6: Āsannakāraṇañhi dānādiupanissayoti evaṃ ratijananaṭṭhena cittīkatādiatthena ca ratanabhāvo bodhipakkhiyadhammānaṃ sātisayo.
tika-s0404t:108_2: Ārammaṇassa pana kāyādivasena catubbidhattā vuttaṃ “cattāro satipaṭṭhānā”ti.
tika-s0404t:108_3: Tathā hi kāyavedanācittadhammesu subhasukhaniccaattasaññānaṃ pahānato asubhadukkhāniccānattabhāvaggahaṇato ca nesaṃ kāyānupassanādibhāvo vibhatto.
tika-s0404t:109_3: puggalassa vā sammadeva padhānabhāvakaraṇato sammappadhānaṃ vīriyassetaṃ adhivacanaṃ.
tika-s0404t:109_4: Tampi anuppannuppannānaṃ akusalānaṃ anuppādanappahānavasena anuppannuppannānaṃ kusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ uppādanaṭṭhāpanavasena
tika-s0404t:110_2: Ijjhanti vā tāya sattā iddhā vuddhā ukkaṃsagatā hontīti iddhi.
tika-s0404t:110_3: Iti paṭhamena atthena iddhi eva pādoti iddhipādo,
tika-s0404t:110_5: Dutiyena atthena iddhiyā pādo patiṭṭhā adhigamupāyoti iddhipādo.
tika-s0404t:110_6: Tena hi uparūparivisesasaṅkhātaṃ iddhiṃ pajjanti pāpuṇanti.
tika-s0404t:110_7: Svāyaṃ iddhipādo yasmā chandādike cattāro adhipatidhamme dhure jeṭṭhake katvā nibbattīyati,
tika-s0404t:111_1: Tattha assaddhiyaṃ abhibhavitvā adhimokkhalakkhaṇe indaṭṭhaṃ kāretīti saddhindriyaṃ.
tika-s0404t:111_5: aññāṇaṃ abhibhavitvā dassanalakkhaṇe indaṭṭhaṃ kāretīti paññindriyaṃ.
tika-s0404t:112_0: Tāniyeva assaddhiyādīhi anabhibhavanīyato akampiyaṭṭhena sampayuttadhammesu thirabhāvena ca balāni veditabbāni.
tika-s0404t:113_2: Yā hi esā dhammasāmaggī yāya lokuttaramaggakkhaṇe uppajjamānāya līnuddhaccapatiṭṭhānāyūhanakāmasukhattakilamathānuyogaucchedasassatābhinivesādīnaṃ
tika-s0404t:113_8: Tassā dhammasāmaggisaṅkhātāya bodhiyā aṅgātipi bojjhaṅgā jhānaṅgamaggaṅgādayo viya.
tika-s0404t:113_9: Yopesa vuttappakārāya dhammasāmaggiyā bujjhatīti katvā ariyasāvako “bodhī”ti vuccati.
tika-s0404t:113_10: Tassa bodhissa aṅgātipi bojjhaṅgā senaṅgarathaṅgādayo viya.
tika-s0404t:114_0: Ariyo aṭṭhaṅgiko maggoti taṃtaṃmaggavajjhehi kilesehi ārakattā,
tika-s0404t:114_5: Mārento kilese gacchati nibbānatthikehi vā maggīyati,
tika-s0404t:114_6: sayaṃ vā nibbānaṃ maggatīti maggoti evametesaṃ satipaṭṭhānādīnaṃ atthavibhāgo veditabbo.
tika-s0404t:115_0: Sotāpannoti maggasaṅkhātaṃ sotaṃ āpajjitvā pāpuṇitvā ṭhito,
tika-s0404t:115_2: Sotāpattiphalasacchikiriyāya paṭipannoti sotāpattiphalassa attapaccakkhakaraṇāya paṭipajjamāno paṭhamamaggaṭṭho,
tika-s0404t:115_4: Sakadāgāmīti sakideva imaṃ lokaṃ paṭisandhiggahaṇavasena āgamanasīlo dutiyaphalaṭṭho.
tika-s0404t:115_6: Yo pana saddhānusārī dhammānusārī ekabījītievamādiko ariyapuggalavibhāgo,
tika-s0404t:118_4: bhagavā bhikkhūnaṃ pātimokkhanti thero bhagavantaṃ pātimokkhuddesaṃ yāci.
tika-s0404t:118_9: Tato paṭṭhāya ovādapātimokkhaṃ anuddisitukāmo tassa vatthuṃ pākaṭaṃ kātuṃ.
tika-s0404t:118_11: Attano cetopariyañāṇena tassaṃ parisati bhikkhūnaṃ cittāni parijānanto tassa dussīlassa cittaṃ passi.
tika-s0404t:118_12: Yasmā pana citte diṭṭhe taṃsamaṅgīpuggalo diṭṭho nāma hoti,
tika-s0404t:118_13: tasmā “addasā kho āyasmā mahāmoggallāno taṃ puggalaṃ dussīla”ntiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0404t:118_14: Yatheva hi anāgate sattasu divasesu pavattaṃ paresaṃ cittaṃ cetopariyañāṇalābhī jānāti,
tika-s0404t:118_16: Majjhe bhikkhusaṅghassa nisinnanti saṅghapariyāpanno viya bhikkhusaṅghassa anto nisinnaṃ.
tika-s0404t:118_17: Diṭṭhosīti ayaṃ na pakatattoti bhagavatā diṭṭho asi.
tika-s0404t:118_19: tasmā natthi te tava bhikkhūhi saddhiṃ ekakammādisaṃvāso.
tika-s0404t:118_20: Yasmā pana so saṃvāso tava natthi,
tika-s0404t:119_0: Tatiyampi kho so puggalo tuṇhī ahosīti anekavāraṃ vatvāpi “thero sayameva nibbinno oramissatī”ti vā,
tika-s0404t:119_1: “idāni imesaṃ paṭipattiṃ jānissāmī”ti vā adhippāyena tuṇhī ahosi.
tika-s0404t:119_2: Bāhāyaṃ gahetvāti “bhagavatā mayā ca yāthāvato diṭṭho,
tika-s0404t:119_6: mā saṅghassa uposathantarāyo ahosī”ti taṃ bāhāyaṃ aggahesi,
tika-s0404t:119_8: Bahi dvārakoṭṭhakā nikkhāmetvāti dvārakoṭṭhakā dvārasālāto nikkhāmetvā.
tika-s0404t:119_16: parisā”ti vacanaṃ sutvā eva hi tena pakkamitabbaṃ siyā,
tika-s0404t:119_17: evaṃ apakkamitvā yāva bāhāgahaṇāpi nāma so moghapuriso āgamessati,
tika-s0404t:120_3: na ca tathāgatā aparisuddhāya parisāya uposathaṃ karonti,
tika-s0404t:120_6: Yaṃnūnāhaṃ ito paṭṭhāya bhikkhūnaṃyeva pātimokkhuddesaṃ anujāneyya”nti.
tika-s0404t:120_7: Evaṃ pana cintetvā bhikkhūnaṃyeva pātimokkhuddesaṃ anujāni.
tika-s0404t:120_10: Tattha na dānāhanti idāni ahaṃ uposathaṃ na karissāmi,
tika-s0404t:120_24: etaṃ buddhāna sāsana”nti imā pana tisso gāthā ovādapātimokkhaṃ nāma.
tika-s0404t:120_33: tasmā amhākampi bhagavā vīsativassamattaṃ imaṃ ovādapātimokkhaṃ uddisitvā imaṃ antarāyaṃ disvā tato paraṃ na uddisi.
tika-s0404t:120_36: Kāraṇañhi yathā tiṭṭhati ettha phalaṃ tadāyattavuttitāyāti “ṭhāna”nti vuccati,
tika-s0404t:121_3: Yvāyaṃ aparisuddhāya parisāya pātimokkhassa anuddeso vutto,
tika-s0404t:121_4: so imasmiṃ dhammavinaye acchariyo abbhuto dhammoti taṃ aparehipi sattahi acchariyabbhutadhammehi saddhiṃ
tika-s0404t:121_5: vibhajitvā dassetukāmo paṭhamaṃ tāva tesaṃ upamābhāvena mahāsamudde aṭṭha acchariyabbhutadhamme dassento
tika-s0404t:126_3: So hi rājapurisānaṃ hatthato yakkhassa hatthaṃ,
tika-s0404t:126_5: bhagavato hatthato puna rājapurisānaṃ hatthaṃ gatattā nāmato hatthako āḷavakoti jāto.
tika-s0404t:126_6: Tenāha “āḷavakayakkhassa hatthato hatthehi sampaṭicchitattā hatthakoti laddhanāmo rājakumāro”ti.
tika-s0404t:129_1: Aṭṭhame khīṇāsavassa sabbesaṃ saṅkhārānaṃ aniccatā asammohavasena kiccato maggapaññāya suppaṭividdhā,
tika-s0404t:129_4: Kilesavasena uppajjamāno hi pariḷāho vatthukāmasannissayo vatthukāmavisayo vāti dvepi sapariḷāhaṭṭhena aṅgārakāsu viyāti “aṅgārakāsūpamā”ti vuttā.
tika-s0404t:132_1: Navame yasmā mahiddhikapetā devāsurānaṃ āvāhaṃ gacchanti,
tika-s0404t:132_4: Petāsurā pana petā evāti tesaṃ petehi saṅgaho avuttasiddhova.
tika-s0404t:135_8: Santaguṇaniguhanenāti attani saṃvijjamānānaṃ jhānādiguṇānañceva bāhusaccaguṇassa dhutaṅgaguṇassa ca niguhanena chādanena.
tika-s0404t:135_10: No mahicchassāti mahatiyā icchāya samannāgatassa no sampajjati anudhammassapi anipphajjanato.
tika-s0404t:136_0: Sattehi kilesehi ca saṅgaṇanaṃ samodhānaṃ saṅgaṇikā,
tika-s0404t:136_1: sā āramitabbaṭṭhena ārāmo etassāti saṅgaṇikārāmo, tassa.
tika-s0404t:136_4: Tañca kho upadhiviveke ninnatāvasena “ayaṃ dhammo”ti vacanato.
tika-s0404t:136_8: katapaññāya hi ṭhito kammavasena bhavesu nānappakāro anatthoti jānanto kammakkhayakaraṃ ñāṇaṃ abhipattheti,
tika-s0404t:136_10: Mānādayo sattasantānaṃ saṃsāre papañcenti vitthārentīti papañcāti āha “taṇhāmānadiṭṭhipapañcarahitattā”tiādi.
tika-s0404t:141_4: Nanu bhayaṃ nāma laddhakāmatārāgādayo viya cetanāya avisuddhikaraṃ,
tika-s0404t:141_6: Nayidaṃ tādisaṃ vohārabhayādiṃ sandhāya vuttanti dassetuṃ “ayaṃ adāyako akārako”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0404t:141_7: Adāsi meti yaṃ pubbe kataṃ upakāraṃ cintetvā dīyati,
tika-s0404t:141_11: Sāhu dānanti dānaṃ nāmetaṃ paṇḍitapaññattanti sādhusamācāre ṭhatvā deti.
tika-s0404t:141_13: Dānañhi datvā taṃ paccavekkhantassa pāmojjapītisomanassādayo uppajjanti,
tika-s0404t:141_15: Idāni dānaṃ anukūladhammaparibrūhanena paccanīkadhammavidūrīkaraṇena ca bhāvanācittassa upasobhanāya
tika-s0404t:141_16: ca parikkhārāya ca hotīti “alaṅkāratthañceva parikkhāratthañca detī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0404t:141_18: Muducitto hoti laddhā dāyake “iminā mayhaṃ saṅgaho kato”ti,
tika-s0404t:142_0: Adantadamananti adantā anassavāpissa dānena dantā assavā honti,
tika-s0404t:142_2: Adānaṃ dantadūsakanti adānaṃ pubbe dantānaṃ assavānampi vighātuppādanena cittaṃ dūseti.
tika-s0404t:142_3: Unnamanti dāyakā piyaṃvadā ca paresaṃ garucittīkāraṭṭhānatāya.
tika-s0404t:143_0: Cittālaṅkāradānameva uttamaṃ anupakkiliṭṭhatāya suparisuddhatāya guṇavisesapaccayatāya ca.
tika-s0404t:146_4: Ṭhapetīti ekavārameva anuppajjitvā yathā upari tenevākārena pavattati,
tika-s0404t:146_11: Nippariyāyato uttari nāma paṇītaṃ majjhepi hīnamajjhimavibhāgassa labbhanatoti vuttaṃ “uttari abhāvitanti tato uparimaggaphalatthāya abhāvita”nti.
tika-s0404t:146_15: na dānamayassa puññassa kevalassa taṃsaṃvattanatādassanaparanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0404t:146_22: Yadi evaṃ dānaṃ tattha kimatthiyanti āha “dānaṃ panā”tiādi.
tika-s0404t:146_23: Dānena muducittoti baddhāghāte veripuggalepi attano dānasampaṭicchanena mudubhūtacitto.
tika-s0404t:149_2: attano santānaṃ punantīti vā puññāni ca tāni hetupaccayehi kattabbato kiriyā cāti puññakiriyā,
tika-s0404t:149_3: tāyeva ca tesaṃ tesaṃ piyamanāpatādiānisaṃsānaṃ vatthubhāvato puññakiriyavatthūni.
tika-s0404t:150_1: pūjāvasena vā attano deyyadhammassa parassa pariccāgacetanā dīyati etenāti dānaṃ,
tika-s0404t:150_6: rūpādīsu vā chasu ārammaṇesu taṃ taṃ dentassa tesaṃ uppādanato paṭṭhāya pubbabhāge pariccāgakāle pacchā
tika-s0404t:150_7: somanassacittena anussaraṇe cāti tīsu kālesu pavattacetanā dānamayaṃ puññakiriyavatthu nāma.
tika-s0404t:151_0: Niccasīlauposathasīlādivasena pañca aṭṭha dasa vā sīlāni samādiyantassa “sīlapūraṇatthaṃ pabbajissāmī”ti vihāraṃ gacchantassa pabbajantassa,
tika-s0404t:151_1: manorathaṃ matthakaṃ pāpetvā “pabbajito vatamhi sādhu suṭṭhū”ti āvajjentassa,
tika-s0404t:151_5: vīriyena ājīvaṃ sodhentassa ca pavattacetanā sīlati,
tika-s0404t:152_0: Paṭisambhidāyaṃ vuttena vipassanāmaggena cakkhuṃ aniccato dukkhato anattato vipassantassa, sotaṃ…pe…
tika-s0404t:152_10: jarāmaraṇaṃ aniccato dukkhato anattato vipassantassa yā cetanā,
tika-s0404t:152_11: yā ca pathavīkasiṇādīsu sabbāsu aṭṭhattiṃsāya ārammaṇesu pavattā jhānacetanā,
tika-s0404t:152_12: yā ca anavajjesu kammāyatanasippāyatanavijjāṭṭhānesu paricayamanasikārādivasena pavattā cetanā,
tika-s0404t:152_13: sabbā sā bhāveti etāyāti bhāvanāmayaṃ vuttanayena puññakiriyavatthu cāti bhāvanāmayaṃ puññakiriyavatthu.
tika-s0404t:153_0: Ekamekañcettha yathārahaṃ pubbabhāgato paṭṭhāya karontassa kāyakammaṃ hoti.
tika-s0404t:153_2: Kāyaṅgaṃ vācaṅgañca acopetvā manasā cintayantassa manokammaṃ.
tika-s0404t:153_4: dānapāramiṃ āvajjetvā vā dānakāle dānamayaṃ puññakiriyavatthu hoti.
tika-s0404t:153_5: Yathā hi kevalaṃ “annadānādīni demī”ti dānakāle dānamayaṃ puññakiriyavatthu hoti,
tika-s0404t:153_6: evaṃ “idaṃ dānamayaṃ sammāsambodhiyā paccayo hotū”ti dānapāramiṃ āvajjetvā dānakālepi dānasīseneva pavattitattā.
tika-s0404t:153_7: Vattasīse ṭhatvā dadanto “etaṃ dānaṃ nāma mayhaṃ kulavaṃsahetu paveṇicāritta”nti cārittasīsena vā dento cārittasīlattā sīlamayaṃ.
tika-s0404t:153_8: Khayato vayato sammasanaṃ paṭṭhapetvā dadato bhāvanāmayaṃ puññakiriyavatthu hoti.
tika-s0404t:153_9: Yathā hi deyyadhammapariccāgavasena vattamānāpi dānacetanā vattasīse ṭhatvā dadato sīlamayaṃ puññakiriyavatthu
tika-s0404t:153_10: hoti pubbābhisaṅkhārassa aparabhāge cetanāya ca tathāpavattattā.
tika-s0404t:156_1: Sattame viceyya detīti ettha dve vicinanāni dakkhiṇeyyavicinanaṃ,
tika-s0404t:156_3: Tesu vipannasīle ito bahiddhā pañcanavuti pāsaṇḍabhede ca dakkhiṇeyye pahāya sīlādiguṇasampannānaṃ sāsane
tika-s0404t:156_5: Lāmakalāmake paccaye apanetvā paṇītapaṇīte vicinitvā tesaṃ dānaṃ dakkhiṇāvicinanaṃ nāma.
tika-s0404t:159_8: Sabbaso kenacipi pakārena sādhūhi na kiṇṇāni na khittāni chaḍḍitānīti asaṃkiṇṇāni.
tika-s0404t:159_10: evaṃ etarahi anāgate cāti āha “asaṃkiṇṇapubbāni na saṃkiyanti na saṃkiyissantī”ti.
tika-s0404t:159_12: Na hi kadāci viññū samaṇabrāhmaṇā hiṃsādipāpadhammaṃ anujānanti.
tika-s0404t:159_13: Aparimāṇānaṃ sattānaṃ abhayaṃ detīti sabbesu bhūtesu nihitadaṇḍattā sakalassapi sattakāyassa bhayābhāvaṃ deti.
tika-s0404t:164_5: Mahatī daddarī vīṇāvisesopi ātatamevāti “cammapariyonaddhesū”ti visesanaṃ kataṃ.
tika-s0404t:164_9: Sabbaso pariyonaddhaṃ nāma caturassaambaṇaṃ paṇavādi ca.
tika-s0404t:165_0: Bhattāraṃ nātimaññatīti sāmikaṃ muñcitvā aññaṃ manasāpi na pattheti.
tika-s0404t:165_5: Idha parijano nāma sāmikassa ceva attano ca ñātijano.
tika-s0404t:168_2: Yo hi diṭṭhadhammikaṃ anatthaṃ parivajjanavasena abhibhavati,
tika-s0404t:168_4: so idhalokavijayāya paṭipanno nāma hoti paccatthikaniggaṇhanato sadatthasampādanato ca.
tika-s0404t:168_6: (Pasaṃsāvahato tayidaṃ pasaṃsāvahanaṃ kittisaddena idhaloke saddānaṃ cittatosanaviddheyyabhāvāpādanena
tika-s0404t:168_7: ca hotīti daṭṭhabbaṃ.) Susaṃvihitakammantoti yāgubhattapacanakālādīni anatikkamitvā tassa tassa sādhukaṃ
tika-s0404t:168_10: Yo hi samparāyikaṃ anatthaṃ parivajjanavasena abhibhavati,
tika-s0404t:175_2: Nāmakaraṇadivase panassā laddhasakkārā brāhmaṇā lakkhaṇasampattiṃ disvā “sace ayaṃ dhītaraṃ labhissati,
tika-s0404t:175_5: cakkavattirājā bhavissatīti ubhayathāpi mahatīyevassā pajā bhavissatī”ti byākariṃsu.
tika-s0404t:175_7: Tenāha “puttapajāya ceva dhītupajāya ca mahantattā evaṃladdhanāmā”ti.
tika-s0404t:178_1: Taṃtaṃpalobhanakiriyā kāyavācāhi parakkamantiyo ukkaṇṭhantūti sāsanaṃ pesenti nāmāti katvā vuttaṃ “sāsanaṃ pesetvā”ti.
tika-s0404t:178_3: Anabhiratiṃ vinodetvāti itthīnaṃ dosadassanamukhena kāmānaṃ vokārasaṃkilesavibhāvanena anabhiratiṃ vinodetvā.
tika-s0404t:179_1: tumhākaṃ hatthapādesu kiccaṃ asādhentesu hatthe ca pāde ca vaḍḍhetvā paṭijaggitāti attho.
tika-s0404t:179_2: Posikāti divasassa dve tayo vāre nahāpetvā bhojetvā pāyetvā tumhe posesi.
tika-s0404t:179_3: Thaññaṃ pāyesīti nandakumāro kira bodhisattato katipāheneva daharo,
tika-s0404t:179_4: tasmiṃ jāte mahāpajāpatī attano puttaṃ dhātīnaṃ datvā sayaṃ bodhisattassa dhātikiccaṃ sādhayamānā attano thaññaṃ pāyesi.
tika-s0404t:179_9: Tattha koci taruṇopi yuvā na hoti yathā atitaruṇo.
tika-s0404t:179_10: Koci yuvāpi maṇḍanakajātiko na hoti yathā upasantasabhāvo,
tika-s0404t:179_12: Idha pana daharo ceva yuvā ca maṇḍanakajātiko ca adhippeto,
tika-s0404t:180_0: Mātugāmassa pabbajitattāti idaṃ pañcavassasatato uddhaṃ aṭṭhatvā pañcasuyeva vassasatesu saddhammaṭṭhitiyā kāraṇanidassanaṃ.
tika-s0404t:180_1: Paṭisambhidāpabhedappattakhīṇāsavavaseneva vuttanti ettha paṭisambhidāppattakhīṇāsavaggahaṇena jhānānipi gahitāneva honti.
tika-s0404t:180_2: Na hi nijjhānakānaṃ sabbappakārasampatti ijjhatīti vadanti.
tika-s0404t:181_5: Idhāpi sāsanantaradhānakathāyaṃ “buddhānañhi parinibbānato vassasahassameva paṭisambhidā nibbattetuṃ sakkonti,
tika-s0404t:181_7: tato tāpi nibbattetuṃ asakkontā tisso vijjā nibbattenti,
tika-s0404t:181_8: gacchante gacchante kāle tāpi nibbattetuṃ asakkontā sukkhavipassakā honti.
tika-s0404t:182_1: Atha kāle gacchante paṭisambhidā pāpuṇituṃ na sakkhiṃsu,
tika-s0404t:182_3: Tato cha abhiññā pattuṃ asakkontā tisso vijjā pāpuṇiṃsu.
tika-s0404t:182_4: Idāni kāle gacchante tisso vijjā pāpuṇituṃ asakkontā āsavakkhayamattaṃ pāpuṇissanti,
tika-s0404t:182_8: gacchante kāle sotāpattiphalampi pattuṃ na sakkhissantī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0404t:182_10: tasmā tesaṃ tesaṃ bhāṇakānaṃ matameva ācariyena tattha tattha dassitanti gahetabbaṃ.
tika-s0404t:183_1: Pariyattimūlakaṃ sāsananti āha “na hi pariyattiyā asati paṭivedho atthī”tiādi.
tika-s0404t:186_1: Catutthe ekena bhoge bhuñjeyyāti ekena koṭṭhāsena bhoge bhuñjeyya,
tika-s0404t:186_3: Dvīhi kammanti dvīhi koṭṭhāsehi kasivaṇijjādikammaṃ payojeyya.
tika-s0404t:186_6: Āpadāsu bhavissatīti kulānañhi na sabbakālaṃ ekasadisaṃ vattati,
tika-s0404t:186_8: tasmā evaṃ āpadāsu uppannāsu bhavissatīti ekaṃ koṭṭhāsaṃ nidhāpeyyāti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0404t:186_9: Imesu pana catūsu koṭṭhāsesu kataraṃ koṭṭhāsaṃ gahetvā kusalaṃ kātabbanti?
tika-s0404t:186_11: Tato gaṇhitvā hi bhikkhūnampi kapaṇaddhikānampi dānaṃ dātabbaṃ,
tika-s0404t:186_15: nhāpitādīnaṃ vetanavasena ca viniyogopi upayogo eva.
tika-s0404t:190_1: Chaṭṭhe gabbhavāso idha uttarapadalopena gabbho vuttoti āha “gabbhoti gabbhavāso”ti.
tika-s0404t:193_1: Navame dānaṃ dadantānanti dakkhiṇeyyaṃ uddissa dānaṃ dentānaṃ.
tika-s0404t:193_5: Saṅghe dinnaṃ mahapphalanti ariyasaṅghe dinnaṃ vipphāraṭṭhānaṃ hoti,
tika-s0404t:198_6: Abhibhavitabbaṃ vā ārammaṇasaṅkhātaṃ āyatanaṃ etassāti abhibhāyatanaṃ.
tika-s0404t:198_7: Atha vā ārammaṇābhibhavanato abhitu ca taṃ āyatanañca yogino sukhavisesānaṃ adhiṭṭhānabhāvato manāyatanadhammāyatanabhāvato
tika-s0404t:198_12: Paṭipakkhabhāvena paccanīkadhamme abhibhavanti puggalassa ñāṇuttariyatāya ārammaṇāni abhibhavanti.
tika-s0404t:199_2: Na hi paṭibhāganimittārammaṇā appanā ajjhattavisayā sambhavati.
tika-s0404t:199_3: Taṃ pana ajjhattaparikammavasena laddhaṃ kasiṇanimittaṃ avisuddhameva hoti,
tika-s0404t:200_2: Parittavasenevāti vaṇṇavasena ābhoge vijjamānepi parittavaseneva idaṃ abhibhāyatanaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-s0404t:200_4: Vaṇṇābhoge satipi asatipi abhibhāyatanabhāvanā nāma tikkhapaññasseva sambhavati,
tika-s0404t:200_6: Abhibhavitvā samāpajjatīti ettha abhibhavanaṃ samāpajjanañca upacārajjhānādhigamasamanantarameva appanājhānuppādananti
tika-s0404t:201_0: Ettha ca keci “uppanne upacārajjhāne taṃ ārabbha ye heṭṭhimantena dve tayo javanavārā pavattanti,
tika-s0404t:201_2: tadanantarañca bhavaṅgaparivāsena upacārāsevanāya ca vinā appanā hoti,
tika-s0404t:201_6: nāpi mahaggatappamāṇajjhānesu viya upacārajjhāne ekantato paccavekkhaṇā icchitabbā,
tika-s0404t:201_7: tasmā upacārajjhānādhigamato paraṃ katipayabhavaṅgacittāvasāne appanaṃ pāpuṇanto “saha nimittuppādenevettha appanaṃ pāpetī”ti vutto.
tika-s0404t:202_0: Na antosamāpattiyaṃ tadā tathārūpassa ābhogassa asambhavato,
tika-s0404t:202_1: samāpattito vuṭṭhitassa ābhogo pubbabhāgabhāvanāya vasena jhānakkhaṇe pavattaṃ abhibhavanākāraṃ gahetvā pavattoti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0404t:202_2: Abhidhammaṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana “iminā panassa pubbabhogo kathito”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0404t:202_3: Antosamāpattiyaṃ tathā ābhogābhāve kasmā “jhānasaññāyapī”ti vuttanti āha “abhibhavana…pe… atthī”ti.
tika-s0404t:203_1: na ekaṅguladvaṅgulādivasena vaḍḍhiṃ pāpitānīti tathāvaḍḍhanassevettha asambhavato.
tika-s0404t:204_6: Abhidhamme pana “ajjhattaṃ arūpasaññī bahiddhā rūpāni passati parittāni suvaṇṇadubbaṇṇāni,
tika-s0404t:204_7: appamāṇāni suvaṇṇadubbaṇṇānī”ti evaṃ catunnaṃ abhibhāyatanānaṃ āgatattā abhidhammaṭṭhakathāyaṃ “kasmā
tika-s0404t:204_8: pana yathā suttante ajjhattaṃ rūpasaññī eko bahiddhā rūpāni passati parittānītiādi vuttaṃ,
tika-s0404t:204_9: evaṃ avatvā idha catūsupi abhibhāyatanesu ajjhattaṃ arūpasaññitāva vuttā”ti codanaṃ katvā “ajjhattarūpānaṃ
tika-s0404t:204_10: anabhibhavanīyato”ti kāraṇaṃ vatvā “tattha vā idha vā bahiddhā rūpāneva abhibhavitabbāni,
tika-s0404t:204_11: tasmā tāni niyamatova vattabbānīti tatrāpi idhāpi vuttāni,
tika-s0404t:204_12: ‘ajjhattaṃ rūpasaññī’ti idaṃ pana satthu desanāvilāsamattamevā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0404t:205_0: Ettha ca vaṇṇābhogarahitāni sahitāni ca sabbāni “parittāni suvaṇṇadubbaṇṇānī”ti vuttāni,
tika-s0404t:205_3: tāni ce kadāci vaṇṇavasena ābhujitāni honti suvaṇṇadubbaṇṇāni abhibhuyyā”ti.
tika-s0404t:205_5: Abhidhamme pana nippariyāyadesanattā vaṇṇābhogarahitāni visuṃ vuttāni,
tika-s0404t:205_8: tathā idha pariyāyadesanattā vimokkhānampi abhibhavanapariyāyo atthīti “ajjhattaṃ rūpasaññī”tiādinā paṭhamadutiyaabhibhāyatanesu paṭhamavimokkho,
tika-s0404t:205_11: Abhidhamme pana nippariyāyadesanattā vimokkhābhibhāyatanāni asaṅkarato dassetuṃ vimokkhe vajjetvā abhibhāyatanāni kathitāni.
tika-s0404t:205_12: Sabbāni ca vimokkhakiccāni jhānāni vimokkhadesanāyaṃ vuttāni.
tika-s0404t:205_13: Tadetaṃ “ajjhattaṃ rūpasaññī”ti āgatassa abhibhāyatanadvayassa abhidhamme abhibhāyatanesu avacanato “rūpī
tika-s0404t:205_14: rūpāni passatī”tiādīnañca sabbavimokkhakiccasādhāraṇavacanabhāvato vavatthānaṃ katanti viññāyati.
tika-s0404t:205_15: “Ajjhattarūpānaṃ anabhibhavanīyato”ti idaṃ abhidhamme katthacipi “ajjhattaṃ rūpāni passatī”ti avatvā
tika-s0404t:205_20: Yaṃ pana desanāvilāsahetukaṃ ajjhattaṃ arūpasaññitāya eva abhidhamme vacanaṃ,
tika-s0404t:205_21: na tassa aññaṃ kāraṇaṃ maggitabbanti dasseti.
tika-s0404t:206_0: Ajjhattarūpānaṃ anabhibhavanīyatā ca tesaṃ bahiddhārūpānaṃ viya avibhūtattā desanāvilāso ca yathāvuttavavatthānavasena
tika-s0404t:206_2: “Suvaṇṇadubbaṇṇānī”ti eteneva siddhattā na nīlādiabhibhāyatanāni vattabbānīti ce? Taṃ na.
tika-s0404t:206_4: Na hi tesaṃ parisuddhāparisuddhavaṇṇānaṃ parittatā vā appamāṇatā vā abhibhavanakāraṇaṃ,
tika-s0404t:206_6: Etesu ca parittādikasiṇarūpesu yaṃ yaṃ caritassa imāni abhibhāyatanāni ijjhanti,
tika-s0404t:209_2: Sabhāvo hi ñāṇena yāthāvato araṇīyato ñātabbato “attho”ti vuccati,
tika-s0404t:209_7: Etena satipi sabbassapi rūpāvacarajjhānassa vikkhambhanavasena paṭipakkhato vimuttabhāve yena bhāvanāvisesena
tika-s0404t:209_8: taṃ jhānaṃ sātisayaṃ paṭipakkhato vimuccitvā pavattati,
tika-s0404t:209_12: tathā paccanīkadhammehi suṭṭhu vimuttatāya eva aniggahitabhāvena nirāsaṅkatāya abhirativasena suṭṭhu adhimuccanaṭṭhenapi vimokkho.
tika-s0404t:209_14: Ayaṃ panatthoti ayaṃ adhimuccanaṭṭho pacchime vimokkhe nirodhe natthi.
tika-s0404t:210_1: taṃ yassa jhānassa hetubhāvena visiṭṭharūpaṃ hoti,
tika-s0404t:210_2: yena visiṭṭhena rūpena “rūpī”ti vucceyya rūpīsaddassa atisayatthadīpanato,
tika-s0404t:210_3: tadeva sasantatipariyāpannarūpassa vasena paṭiladdhajjhānaṃ idha paramatthato rūpibhāvasādhakanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0404t:211_0: Anto appanāyaṃ “subha”nti ābhogo natthīti iminā pubbābhogavasena tathā adhimutti siyāti dasseti.
tika-s0404t:211_2: Yasmā suvisuddhesu nīlādīsu vaṇṇakasiṇesu tattha katādhikārānaṃ abhirativasena suṭṭhu adhimuccanaṭṭho sambhavati,
tika-s0404t:211_3: tasmā aṭṭhakathāyaṃ tathā tatiyo vimokkho saṃvaṇṇito.
tika-s0404t:211_4: Yasmā pana mettādivasena pavattamānā bhāvanā satte appaṭikūlato dahanti,
tika-s0404t:211_7: Tayidaṃ ubhayampi tena tena pariyāyena vuttattā na virujjhatīti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0404t:212_1: Na hi catunnaṃ arūpakkhandhānaṃ ekadesopi tattha avasissati.
tika-s0404t:212_3: Uttamo vimokkho nāma ariyeheva samāpajjitabbato ariyaphalapariyosānattā diṭṭheva dhamme nibbānappattibhāvato ca.
tika-s0404t:218_8: Ādito tehi saddhiṃ satthu bhāsanaṃ ālāpo,
tika-s0404t:218_13: Tesanti padaṃ ubhayapadāpekkhaṃ “tesampi lakkhaṇasaṇṭhānaṃ viya satthu sarīrasaṇṭhānaṃ tesaṃ kevalaṃ paññāyati evā”ti.
tika-s0404t:218_17: Bhāsantaranti tesaṃ sattānaṃ bhāsāto aññaṃ bhāsaṃ.
tika-s0404t:218_20: desetīti idaṃ nanu attānaṃ jānāpetvā dhamme kathite tesaṃ sātisayo pasādo hotīti iminā adhippāyena vuttaṃ?
tika-s0404t:218_21: Yesaṃ attānaṃ ajānāpetvāva dhamme kathite pasādo hoti,
tika-s0404t:218_25: Evaṃ sutopīti evaṃ aviññātadesako aviññātāgamanopi suto dhammo attano dhammasudhammatāyeva anāgate paccayo hoti suṇantassa.
tika-s0404t:221_1: Dasame udenayakkhassa cetiyaṭṭhāneti udenassa nāma yakkhassa āyatanabhāvena iṭṭhakāhi kate mahājanassa cittīkataṭṭhāne.
tika-s0404t:221_6: Tathā hi sattambanti kikissa rañño dhītaro satta kumāriyo saṃvegajātā gehato nikkhamitvā tattha padhānaṃ padahiṃsu,
tika-s0404t:221_9: tasmiṃ adhivatthaṃ devataṃ bahū manussā putte patthenti,
tika-s0404t:221_13: iti sabbānevetāni buddhuppādato pubbadevatā pariggahetvā cetiyavohārena voharitāni,
tika-s0404t:221_15: Ramaṇīyāti ettha vesāliyā tāva bhūmibhāgasampattiyā sulabhapiṇḍatāya ramaṇīyabhāvo veditabbo.
tika-s0404t:221_16: Vihārānaṃ pana nagarato nātidūratāya naccāsannatāya gamanāgamanasampattiyā anākiṇṇavihāraṭṭhānatāya chāyudakasampattiyā
tika-s0404t:222_1: Punappunaṃ katāti bhāvanāya bahulīkaraṇena aparāparaṃ pavattitā.
tika-s0404t:222_2: Yuttayānaṃ viya katāti yathā yuttamājaññayānaṃ chekena sārathinā adhiṭṭhitaṃ yathāruci pavattati,
tika-s0404t:222_5: Vatthu viya katāti sabbaso upakkilesavisodhanena iddhivisayatāya patiṭṭhānabhāvato suvisodhitaparissayavatthu viya katā.
tika-s0404t:222_9: Suṭṭhu samāraddhāti iddhibhāvanāya sikhāppattiyā sammadeva saṃsevitā.
tika-s0404t:223_5: yo tesaṃ tesaṃ sattānaṃ tasmiṃ tasmiṃ bhavavisese purimasiddhabhavapatthanūpanissayavasena sarīrāvayavavaṇṇasaṇṭhānappamāṇādivisesā
tika-s0404t:223_8: So yathāsakaṃ khaṇamattāvaṭṭhāyīnampi attano sahajātānaṃ rūpārūpadhammānaṃ ṭhapanākāravuttitāya pavattanakāni
tika-s0404t:223_9: rūpārūpajīvitindriyāni yasmā na kevalaṃ tesaṃ khaṇaṭhitiyā eva kāraṇabhāvena anupālakāni,
tika-s0404t:223_10: atha kho yāva bhavaṅgupacchedā anupabandhassa avicchedahetubhāvenapi,
tika-s0404t:223_13: Taṃ pana devānaṃ nerayikānaṃ uttarakurukānañca niyataparicchedaṃ.
tika-s0404t:223_18: tassa ca yathā purimasiddhabhavapatthanāvasena taṃtaṃgatinikāyādīsu vaṇṇasaṇṭhānādivisesaniyamo siddho dassanānussavādīhi,
tika-s0404t:223_20: Evaṃ tāsu tāsu upapattīsu nibbattasattānaṃ yebhuyyena samappamāṇaṭṭhitikālaṃ dassanānussavehi labhitvā
tika-s0404t:223_21: taṃparamataṃ ajjhosāya pavattitabhavapatthanāvasena ādito paricchedaniyamo veditabbo.
tika-s0404t:223_22: Yasmā pana kammaṃ tāsu tāsu upapattīsu yathā taṃtaṃupapattiniyatavaṇṇādinibbattane samatthaṃ,
tika-s0404t:223_23: evaṃ niyatāyuparicchedāsu upapattīsu paricchedātikkamena vipākanibbattane samatthaṃ na hoti,
tika-s0404t:223_24: tasmā vuttaṃ “tasmiṃ tasmiṃ kāle yaṃ manussānaṃ āyuppamāṇaṃ,
tika-s0404t:224_0: Mahāsīvatthero pana “mahābodhisattānaṃ carimabhave paṭisandhidāyino kammassa asaṅkhyeyyāyukatāsaṃvattanasamatthataṃ
tika-s0404t:224_1: hadaye ṭhapetvā buddhānañca āyusaṅkhārassa parissayavikkhambhanasamatthatā pāḷiyaṃ āgatā evāti imaṃ bhaddakappameva
tika-s0404t:224_3: Khaṇḍiccādīhi abhibhuyyatīti etena yathā iddhibalena jarāya na paṭighāto,
tika-s0404t:224_4: evaṃ tena maraṇassapi na paṭighātoti atthato āpannamevāti.
tika-s0404t:224_6: kva ca nipatito”ti aññathā vuṭṭhitenapi theravādena aṭṭhakathāvacanameva samatthitanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0404t:225_1: Thūlasaññuppādanañhetaṃ “tiṭṭhatu bhagavā kappa”nti sakalaṃ kappaṃ avaṭṭhānayācanāya,
tika-s0404t:225_3: cattāro iddhipādā bhāvitā”tiādinā aññāpadesena attano caturiddhipādabhāvanānubhāvena kappaṃ avaṭṭhānasamatthatāvibhāvanaṃ.
tika-s0404t:225_6: yadidaṃ pariyāyaṃ muñcitvā ujukameva attano adhippāyavibhāvanaṃ.
tika-s0404t:225_7: Pariyuṭṭhitacittoti yathā kiñci atthānatthaṃ sallakkhetuṃ na sakkā,
tika-s0404t:225_9: So pana abhibhavo mahatā udakoghena appakassa udakassa ajjhottharaṇaṃ viya ahosīti vuttaṃ “ajjhotthaṭacitto”ti.
tika-s0404t:225_11: ariyehi vā aññopi yo koci puthujjano.
tika-s0404t:225_12: Puthujjanaggahaṇañcettha yathā sabbena sabbaṃ appahīnavipallāso mārena pariyuṭṭhitacitto kiñci atthānatthaṃ sallakkhetuṃ na sakkoti,
tika-s0404t:225_13: evaṃ thero bhagavatā katanimittobhāsaṃ sabbaso na sallakkhesīti dassanatthaṃ.
tika-s0404t:226_4: Tenāti yadipi itare aṭṭha vipallāsā pahīnā,
tika-s0404t:226_8: aññathā tena maddite sattānaṃ maraṇameva siyā.
tika-s0404t:226_16: Vibādhanādhippāyena pana idha “kiṃ sakkhissatī”ti vuttaṃ hadayamaddanassa adhikatattā.
tika-s0404t:226_17: Nimittobhāsanti ettha “tiṭṭhatu bhagavā kappa”nti sakalakappaṃ avaṭṭhānayācanāya “yassa kassaci, ānanda,
tika-s0404t:226_18: cattāro iddhipādā bhāvitā”tiādinā aññāpadesena attano caturiddhipādabhāvanānubhāvena kappaṃ avaṭṭhānasamatthatāvasena saññuppādanaṃ nimittaṃ.
tika-s0404t:226_19: Tathā pana pariyāyaṃ muñcitvā ujukameva attano adhippāyavibhāvanaṃ obhāso.
tika-s0404t:226_21: Attano aparādhahetuto sattānaṃ soko tanuko hoti,
tika-s0404t:226_23: Kiṃ pana thero mārena pariyuṭṭhitacittakāle pavattiṃ pacchā jānātīti?
tika-s0404t:227_1: ānandāti yasmā divāvihāratthāya idhāgato, tasmā, ānanda,
tika-s0404t:227_5: virāgavibandhanena vā jātinimittatāya tattha tattha jātaṃ mārento viya hotīti “māretīti māro”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0404t:227_9: Sattānaṃ anatthāvahaṃ paṭipattiṃ na muñcatīti namuci.
tika-s0404t:227_12: Sattamasattāhato paraṃ satta ahāni sandhāyāha “aṭṭhame sattāhe”ti na pana pallaṅkasattāhādi viya niyatakiccassa aṭṭhamasattāhassa nāma labbhanato.
tika-s0404t:227_13: Sattamasattāhassa hi parato ajapālanigrodhamūle mahābrahmuno sakkassa ca devarañño paṭiññātadhammadesanaṃ
tika-s0404t:227_14: bhagavantaṃ ñatvā “idāni satte dhammadesanāya mama visayaṃ samatikkamāpessatī”ti sañjātadomanasso hutvā
tika-s0404t:227_19: Evaṃ pana cintetvā bhagavantaṃ upasaṅkamitvā ekamantaṃ ṭhito “parinibbātu dāni, bhante,
tika-s0404t:227_23: Bhagavā cassa atibandhanādhippāyaṃ jānantopi taṃ anāvikatvā parinibbānassa akālabhāvameva pakāsento yācanaṃ paṭikkhipi.
tika-s0404t:228_1: Tatheva vinītāti maggavaseneva kilesānaṃ samucchedavinayena vinītā.
tika-s0404t:228_2: Tathā visāradāti ariyamaggādhigameneva satthusāsane vesārajjappattiyā visāradā,
tika-s0404t:228_3: sārajjakarānaṃ diṭṭhivicikicchādipāpadhammānaṃ vigamena visāradabhāvaṃ pattāti attho.
tika-s0404t:228_4: Yassa sutassa vasena vaṭṭadukkhato nissaraṇaṃ sambhavati,
tika-s0404t:228_5: taṃ idha ukkaṭṭhaniddesena sutanti adhippetanti āha “tepiṭakavasenā”ti.
tika-s0404t:228_10: Tamevāti yaṃ taṃ tepiṭakaṃ sotabbabhāvena “suta”nti vuttaṃ, tameva.
tika-s0404t:228_12: Dhārentīti suvaṇṇabhājane pakkhittasīhavasaṃ viya avinassantaṃ katvā suppaguṇasuppavattibhāvena dhārenti hadaye ṭhapenti.
tika-s0404t:228_13: Iti pariyattidhammavasena bahussutadhammadharabhāvaṃ dassetvā idāni paṭivedhadhammavasenapi taṃ dassetuṃ “atha vā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0404t:228_19: Anudhammanti tassā yathāvuttappaṭipadāya anurūpaṃ abhisallekhitaṃ appichatādidhammaṃ.
tika-s0404t:228_24: Attano ācariyavādanti attano ācariyassa sammāsambuddhassa vādaṃ.
tika-s0404t:229_10: Uttānīkarissantīti anuttānaṃ gambhīraṃ uttānaṃ pākaṭaṃ karissanti.
tika-s0404t:229_12: saddo kāraṇapariyāyo “hetumhi ñāṇaṃ dhammapaṭisambhidā”tiādīsu viyāti āha “sahetukena sakāraṇena vacanenā”ti.
tika-s0404t:229_15: evaṃ hetudāharaṇehi yathādhigatamatthaṃ sampādetvā dhammaṃ kathessanti.
tika-s0404t:229_18: Ettha ca “paññapessantī”tiādīhi chahi padehi cha atthapadāni dassitāni,
tika-s0404t:229_19: ādito pana dvīhi padehi cha byañjanapadāni.
tika-s0404t:229_20: Ettāvatā tepiṭakaṃ buddhavacanaṃ saṃvaṇṇanānayena saṅgahetvā dassitaṃ hoti.
tika-s0404t:230_5: Sabbapāliphullaṃ viya abhiññāsampattivasena abhiññāsampadāhi sāsanābhivuddhiyā matthakappattito.
tika-s0404t:230_14: Suṭṭhu pakāsitanti suṭṭhu sammadeva ādikalyāṇādibhāvena paveditaṃ.
tika-s0404t:231_0: Satiṃ sūpaṭṭhitaṃ katvāti ayaṃ kāyādivibhāgo attabhāvasaññito dukkhabhāro mayā ettakaṃ kālaṃ vahito,
tika-s0404t:231_2: etassa avahanatthañhi cirataraṃ kālaṃ ariyamaggasambhāro sambhato,
tika-s0404t:231_4: Yato ime kāyādayo asubhādito sabhāvādito sammadeva pariññātāti catubbidhampi sammāsatiṃ yatātathaṃ visaye suṭṭhu upaṭṭhitaṃ katvā.
tika-s0404t:231_5: Ñāṇena paricchinditvāti imassa attabhāvasaññitassa dukkhabhārassa vahane payojanabhūtaṃ attahitaṃ tāva bodhimūle eva parisamāpitaṃ,
tika-s0404t:231_8: ahampi visākhāpuṇṇamāyaṃ parinibbāyissāmīti evaṃ buddhañāṇena paricchinditvā sabbabhāgena nicchayaṃ katvā.
tika-s0404t:231_9: Āyusaṅkhāraṃ vissajjīti āyuno jīvitassa abhisaṅkhārakaṃ phalasamāpattidhammaṃ na samāpajjissāmīti vissajji.
tika-s0404t:231_10: Taṃvissajjaneneva tena abhisaṅkhariyamānaṃ jīvitasaṅkhāraṃ “na pavattessāmī”ti vissajji.
tika-s0404t:232_1: Tattha ṭhānamahantatāya bhūmicālassa mahantattaṃ dassetuṃ “tadā kira…pe…
tika-s0404t:232_3: Sā pana jābhikkhettabhūtā dasasahassī lokadhātu eva,
tika-s0404t:232_6: tadāpi tattikāya eva kampane kiṃ kāraṇaṃ?
tika-s0404t:232_9: Tathā hi purimabuddhānampi tāvattakameva jātikkhettaṃ ahosi.
tika-s0404t:232_14: Udakapariyantaṃ katvā chappakārapavedhanena avītarāge bhiṃsetīti bhiṃsano,
tika-s0404t:232_18: atha kho uppātabhāvena labbhamāno ākāsagato nigghosasaddo.
tika-s0404t:232_21: Tassa hi gajjabhāvena ākāsassa vassābhāvena sukkhagajjitasaññite sadde niccharante devadundubhisamaññā.
tika-s0404t:233_0: Pītivegavissaṭṭhanti “evaṃ cirataraṃ kālaṃ vahito ayaṃ attabhāvasaññito dukkhabhāro,
tika-s0404t:233_1: idāni na cirasseva nikkhipissāmī”ti sañjātasomanasso bhagavā sabhāveneva pītivegavissaṭṭhaṃ udānaṃ udānesi.
tika-s0404t:233_2: Evaṃ pana udānentena ayampi attho sādhito hotīti dassanatthaṃ aṭṭhakathāyaṃ “kasmā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0404t:234_3: Tathā hi taṃ parito khaṇḍitabhāvena “paritta”nti vuccati.
tika-s0404t:234_4: Paṭipakkhavikkhambhanato dīghasantānatāya vipulaphalatāya ca na tulaṃ na paricchinnaṃ.
tika-s0404t:234_5: Yehi kāraṇehi pubbe avisesato mahaggataṃ “atula”nti vuttaṃ,
tika-s0404t:234_6: tāni kāraṇāni rūpāvacarato arūpassa sātisayāni vijjantīti arūpāvacaraṃ “atula”nti vuttaṃ itarañca “tula”nti.
tika-s0404t:234_7: Appavipākanti tīsupi kammesu yaṃ tanuvipākaṃ hīnaṃ,
tika-s0404t:234_12: taṃ hīnaṃ ukkaṭṭhanti dvidhā bhinditvā dvīsupi bhāgesu pakkhipitabbaṃ.
tika-s0404t:234_13: Hīnattikavaṇṇanāyaṃ vuttanayena vā appabahuvipākataṃ niddhāretvā tassa vasena tulātulabhāvo veditabbo.
tika-s0404t:234_15: Niyakajjhattaratoti sasantānadhammesu vipassanāvasena gocarāsevanāya ca nirato.
tika-s0404t:234_17: na ca taṃ kāmādibhavābhisaṅkhārakanti tato visesanatthaṃ “sambhava”nti vatvā “bhavasaṅkhāra”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0404t:234_19: Kavacaṃ viya attabhāvaṃ pariyonandhitvā ṭhitaṃ attani sambhūtattā attasambhavaṃ kilesañca abhindīti kilesabhedasahabhāvikammossajjanaṃ
tika-s0404t:235_4: “Tulento tīrento”tiādinā saṅkhepato vuttamatthaṃ vitthārato dassetuṃ “pañcakkhandhā”tiādiṃ vatvā bhavasaṅkhārassa avasajjanākāraṃ sarūpato dasseti.
tika-s0404t:235_5: Evantiādinā pana udānagāthāvaṇṇanāyaṃ ādito vuttamatthaṃ nigamavasena dasseti.
tika-s0404t:236_5: bahalanti idaṃ tassa vātassa ubbedhappamāṇameva gahetvā vuttaṃ,
tika-s0404t:236_6: āyāmavitthārato pana dasasahassacakkavāḷappamāṇaṃ koṭisatasahassacakkavāḷappamāṇampi udakasandhārakavātaṃ upacchindatiyeva.
tika-s0404t:236_8: Puna vātoti ukkhepakavāte tathā katvā vigate udakasandhārakavāto puna ābandhitvā gaṇhāti.
tika-s0404t:236_11: Tato udakaṃ uggacchatīti tato ābandhitvā gahaṇato tena vātena uṭṭhāpitaṃ udakaṃ uggacchati upari gacchati.
tika-s0404t:236_14: Sakalā hi mahāpathavī tadā oggacchati ca uggacchati ca,
tika-s0404t:237_2: Tathā ca bhāvanā balavatī na hotīti āha “dubbalā”ti.
tika-s0404t:237_5: Sā hi thirā daḷhatarā hotīti āha “balavā”ti.
tika-s0404t:237_8: āposaññāya pana subhāvitāya pathavīkampo sukheneva ijjhatīti ayamettha adhippāyo veditabbo.
tika-s0404t:237_9: Saṃvejento vā dibbasampattiyā pamattaṃ sakkaṃ devarājānaṃ,
tika-s0404t:237_10: vīmaṃsanto vā tāvadeva samadhigataṃ attano iddhibalaṃ.
tika-s0404t:237_11: So kirāyasmā khuragge arahattaṃ patvā cintesi –
tika-s0404t:237_12: “atthi nu kho koci bhikkhu yena pabbajitadivaseyeva arahattaṃ patvā vejayanto pāsādo kampitapubbo”ti.
tika-s0404t:237_13: Tato “natthi kocī”ti ñatvā “ahaṃ kampessāmī”ti abhiññābalena vejayantamatthake ṭhatvā pādena paharitvā kampetuṃ nāsakkhi.
tika-s0404t:237_16: tvaṃ pūtigandheneva sīsena vejayantaṃ kampetuṃ icchasi,
tika-s0404t:238_0: Sāmaṇero “imā devatā mayā saddhiṃ keḷiṃ karonti,
tika-s0404t:238_2: kahaṃ nu kho me ācariyo sāmuddikamahānāgatthero”ti āvajjetvā “mahāsamudde udakaleṇaṃ māpetvā divāvihāraṃ
tika-s0404t:238_3: nisinno”ti ñatvā tattha gantvā theraṃ vanditvā aṭṭhāsi.
tika-s0404t:238_13: kapallapūvaṃ paccantaṃ antantena paricchinnanti iminā opammena jānāhī”ti āha.
tika-s0404t:238_15: ettakenā”ti vatvā “pāsādena patiṭṭhitokāsaṃ udakaṃ hotū”ti adhiṭṭhāya vejayantābhimukho agamāsi.
tika-s0404t:238_19: Sakko devarājā “mā mayhaṃ puttena saddhiṃ kathayittha,
tika-s0404t:238_20: idāni tena ācariyo laddho khaṇena pāsādaṃ kampessatī”ti āha.
tika-s0404t:238_27: Sāmaṇero pāsādaṃ yathāṭhāne ṭhapetvā pāsādamatthake ṭhatvā udānaṃ udānesi –
tika-s0404t:245_2: yadā bodhisatto tusitakāyā cavitvā mātukucchiṃ okkamatī”ti vatvā “ayañca dasasahassī lokadhātu saṅkampi sampakampi sampavedhī”ti,
tika-s0404t:245_5: yadā bodhisatto mātukucchimhā nikkhamatī”ti vatvā “ayañca dasasahassī lokadhātu saṅkampi sampakampi sampavedhī”ti
tika-s0404t:245_6: ca mahāsattassa gabbhokkantiyaṃ abhijātiñca dhammatāvasena mahāpadāne pathavīkampassa vuttattā itaresupi
tika-s0404t:245_7: catūsu ṭhānesu pathavīkampo dhammatāvasenevāti atthato vuttametanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0404t:246_0: Idāni nesaṃ pathavīkampānaṃ kāraṇato pavattiākārato ca vibhāgaṃ dassetuṃ “iti imesū”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0404t:246_8: Sādhukāradānavasenāti yathā anaññasādhāraṇappaṭivedhañāṇānubhāvena abhihatā mahāpathavī abhisambodhiyaṃ kampittha,
tika-s0404t:246_9: evaṃ anaññasādhāraṇena desanāñāṇānubhāvena abhihatā mahāpathavī kampittha,
tika-s0404t:246_10: taṃ panassā sādhukāradānaṃ viya hotīti “sādhukāradānavasenā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0404t:247_2: arahaṃ sammāsambuddho attano attabhāvasaññitaṃ khandhapañcakaṃ kappaṃ vā kappāvasesaṃ vā ṭhapetuṃ samatthopi
tika-s0404t:247_6: Taṃ panassā kāruññasabhāvasaṇṭhitā viya hotīti vuttaṃ “kāruññabhāvenā”ti.
tika-s0404t:248_0: Yasmā bhagavā parinibbānasamaye catuvīsatikoṭisatasahassasaṅkhā samāpattiyo samāpajji,
tika-s0404t:248_1: antarantarā phalasamāpattisamāpajjanena tassa pubbabhāge sātisayaṃ tikkhaṃ sūraṃ vipassanāñāṇañca pavattesi.
tika-s0404t:248_2: “Yadatthañca mayā evaṃ sucirakālaṃ anaññasādhāraṇo paramukkaṃsagato ñāṇasambhāro sambhato,
tika-s0404t:248_4: tassa vata me sikhāppattaphalabhūtā accantaniṭṭhā anupādisesaparinibbānadhātu ajja samijjhatī”ti bhiyyo
tika-s0404t:248_5: ativiya somanassappattassa bhagavato pītivipphārādiguṇavipulatarānubhāvo parehi asādhāraṇañāṇātisayo udapādi,
tika-s0404t:248_6: yassa samāpattibalasamupabrūhitassa ñāṇātisayassa ānubhāvaṃ sandhāya idaṃ vuttaṃ “dveme piṇḍapātā samasamaphalā samasamavipākā”tiādi,
tika-s0404t:248_8: taṃ panassā tassaṃ velāyaṃ ārodanākārappatti viya hotīti “aṭṭhamo ārodanenā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0404t:249_2: Pathavīdevatāya vasenāti ettha samuddadevatā viya mahāpathaviyā adhidevatā kira nāma atthi,
tika-s0404t:249_3: tādise kāraṇe sati tassā cittavasena ayaṃ mahāpathavī saṅkampati sampakampati sampavedhati.
tika-s0404t:249_6: tathā hi visākhapuṇṇamāyaṃ abhisambodhiatthaṃ bodhirukkhamūle nisinnassa lokanāthassa antarāyakaraṇatthaṃ upaṭṭhitaṃ mārabalaṃ vidhamituṃ –
tika-s0404t:252_0: Vacanasamanantaraṃ mahāpathavī bhijjitvā saparisaṃ māraṃ parivattesi.
tika-s0404t:252_3: dhammatāvasena pana vuttanayena siyāti sakkā vattuṃ.
tika-s0404t:252_5: so puññadhammassa vā ñāṇadhammassa vā ānubhāvasabhāvoti.
tika-s0404t:256_0: Ayaṃ pana mahāpathavī aparesupi aṭṭhasu ṭhānesu akampittha mahābhinikkhamane bodhimaṇḍūpasaṅkamane paṃsukūlaggahaṇe
tika-s0404t:256_3: Paṃsukūlaggahaṇe “dvisahassadīpaparivāre nāma cattāro mahādīpe pahāya pabbajitvā susānaṃ gantvā paṃsukūlaṃ
tika-s0404t:256_4: gaṇhantena dukkaraṃ bhagavatā kata”nti acchariyavegābhihatā akampittha.
tika-s0404t:256_7: Brahmajāle pana dvāsaṭṭhiyā diṭṭhigatesu vijaṭetvā niggumbaṃ katvā desiyamānesu sādhukāradānavasena akampitthāti veditabbā.
tika-s0404t:257_0: Na kevalañca etesuyeva ṭhānesu pathavī akampittha,
tika-s0404t:257_1: atha kho tīsu saṅgahesupi mahāmahindattherassa imaṃ dīpaṃ āgantvā jotivane nisīditvā dhammaṃ desitadivasepi akampittha.
tika-s0404t:257_2: Kalyāṇiyamahāvihāre ca piṇḍapātiyattherassa cetiyaṅgaṇaṃ sammajjitvā tattheva nisīditvā buddhārammaṇaṃ
tika-s0404t:257_3: pītiṃ gahetvā imaṃ suttantaṃ āraddhassa suttapariyosāne udakapariyantaṃ katvā akampittha.
tika-s0404t:257_6: Tesaṃ sajjhāyapariyosānepi udakapariyantameva katvā pathavī akampittha.
tika-s0404t:258_1: hetū aṭṭha paccayā mahato bhūmicālassa pātubhāvāyā”ti kasmā aṭṭheva hetū vuttāti?
tika-s0404t:258_3: Imeyeva hi aṭṭha hetū niyamanti, nāññe.
tika-s0404t:258_4: Te hi kadāci sambhavantīti aniyamabhāvato na gaṇitā.
tika-s0404t:259_2: hetū aṭṭha paccayā mahato bhūmicālassa pātubhāvāyāti.
tika-s0404t:259_3: Yaṃ vessantarena raññā mahādāne dīyamāne sattakkhattuṃ mahāpathavī kampitā,
tika-s0404t:259_4: tañca pana akālikaṃ kadācuppattikaṃ aṭṭhahi hetūhi vippamuttaṃ,
tika-s0404t:260_4: Yadi te muñcitvā añño megho pavassati,
tika-s0404t:260_5: na so megho gaṇīyati sammatehi meghehi,
tika-s0404t:260_8: vessantarena raññā mahādāne dīyamāne yaṃ sattakkhattuṃ mahāpathavī kampitā,
tika-s0404t:260_9: akālikaṃ etaṃ kadācuppattikaṃ aṭṭhahi hetūhi vippamuttaṃ,
tika-s0404t:261_1: himavantā pabbatā pañca nadisatāni sandanti, tesaṃ, mahārāja,
tika-s0404t:261_2: pañcannaṃ nadisatānaṃ daseva nadiyo nadigaṇanāya gaṇīyanti.
tika-s0404t:261_12: vessantarena raññā mahādāne dīyamāne yaṃ sattakkhattuṃ mahāpathavī kampitā,

tika-s0404t:327_13: yadicchasī”ti vuccamāno “sacassa tesu aññatarenapi rogo vūpasammati,
tika-s0404t:327_16: tattha te yāvajīvaṃ ussāho karaṇīyo”ti vacanaṃ anussaranto catumadhuraṃ paṭikkhipitvā muttaharītakena bhesajjaṃ karonto paramasantuṭṭhova hoti,
tika-s0404t:328_0: So evaṃpabhedo sabbopi santoso santuṭṭhīti pavuccati.
tika-s0404t:328_2: Tassā santuṭṭhiyā saddhiṃ sandassanādividhinā ānisaṃsavibhāvanavasena tappaṭipakkhassa atricchatādibhedassa
tika-s0404t:328_3: icchācārassa ādīnavavibhāvanavasena ca pavattā kathā santuṭṭhikathā.
tika-s0404t:329_13: evaṃ sabbiriyāpathesu sabbakiccesu gaṇasaṅgaṇikaṃ pahāya vivittavāso kāyaviveko nāma.
tika-s0404t:330_5: Tesu idhekacco bhikkhu suṇāti “amukasmiṃ ṭhāne gāme vā nigame vā itthī abhirūpā dassanīyā pāsādikā paramāya vaṇṇapokkharatāya samannāgatā”ti,
tika-s0404t:330_11: apica kho sāmaṃ passati itthiṃ abhirūpaṃ dassanīyaṃ pāsādikaṃ paramāya vaṇṇapokkharatāya samannāgataṃ,
tika-s0404t:330_16: Disvā pana aññamaññaṃ ālāpasallāpavasena uppanno kilesasanthavo samullapanasaṃsaggo nāma.
tika-s0404t:330_18: Attano pana santakaṃ yaṃ kiñci mātugāmassa datvā adatvā vā tena dinnassa vanabhaṅginiyādino paribhogavasena
tika-s0404t:331_0: Yopi cesa “gihīhi saṃsaṭṭho viharati ananulomikena saṃsaggena sahasokī sahanandī sukhitesu sukhito dukkhitesu
tika-s0404t:331_1: dukkhito uppannesu kiccakaraṇīyesu attanā vo yogaṃ āpajjatī”ti evaṃ vutto ananulomiko gihisaṃsaggo nāma,
tika-s0404t:331_3: taṃ sabbaṃ pahāya yvāyaṃ saṃsāre thirataraṃ saṃvegasaṅkhāresu tibbaṃ bhayasaññaṃ sarīre paṭikkūlasaññaṃ
tika-s0404t:331_4: sabbākusalesu jigucchāpubbaṅgamaṃ hirottappaṃ sabbakiriyāsu satisampajaññanti sabbaṃ paccupaṭṭhapetvā
tika-s0404t:332_12: So sabbopi yo bhikkhu gamane uppannakilesaṃ ṭhānaṃ pāpuṇituṃ na deti,
tika-s0404t:332_14: nisajjāya uppannaṃ sayanaṃ pāpuṇituṃ na deti,
tika-s0404t:332_15: tattha tattheva ajapadena daṇḍena kaṇhasappaṃ uppīḷetvā gaṇhanto viya tikhiṇena asinā amittaṃ gīvāya
tika-s0404t:332_16: paharanto viya sīsaṃ ukkhipituṃ adatvā vīriyabalena niggaṇhāti,
tika-s0404t:333_4: Vipassanāya pādakabhūtā saha upacārena aṭṭha samāpattiyo lokiyo samādhi,
tika-s0404t:333_14: Apare pana tadaṅgavikkhambhanasamucchedavimuttīnampi vasenettha atthaṃ saṃvaṇṇenti.
tika-s0404t:333_16: Iti imesaṃ sīlādīnaṃ saddhiṃ sandassanādividhinā anekākāravokāraānisaṃsavibhāvanavasena ceva tappaṭipakkhānaṃ
tika-s0404t:334_1: appiccha kathañca paresaṃ kattā”ti “santuṭṭho hoti itarītarena cīvarena,
tika-s0404t:334_2: itarītaracīvarasantuṭṭhiyā ca vaṇṇavādī”ti ca ādivacanato sayañca appicchatādiguṇasamannāgatena paresampi
tika-s0404t:334_4: Yā idha abhisallekhikādibhāvena visesetvā vuttā appicchakathādīti veditabbā.
tika-s0404t:335_2: sabbakālaṃ imaṃ kathaṃ sotuṃ vicāretuñca yathāsukhaṃ labhanto.
tika-s0404t:336_1: Akusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ pahānāyāti akosallasambhūtaṭṭhena akusalānaṃ pāpadhammānaṃ pajahanatthāya.
tika-s0404t:336_2: Kusalānaṃ dhammānanti kucchitānaṃ salanādiatthena anavajjaṭṭhena ca kusalānaṃ sahavipassanānaṃ maggaphaladhammānaṃ.
tika-s0404t:337_1: Udayatthagāminiyāti pañcannaṃ khandhānaṃ udayañca vayañca paṭivijjhantiyā.
tika-s0404t:337_2: Ariyāyāti vikkhambhanavasena kilesehi ārakā dūre ṭhitāya niddosāya.
tika-s0404t:337_4: Sammā dukkhakkhayagāminiyāti vaṭṭadukkhassa khepanato “dukkhakkhayo”ti laddhanāmaṃ ariyamaggaṃ sammā hetunā nayena gacchantiyā.
tika-s0404t:337_5: Imesu ca pana pañcasu dhammesu sīlaṃ vīriyaṃ paññā ca yogino ajjhattikaṃ aṅgaṃ,
tika-s0404t:337_14: “sīlavā bhavissatī”ti ettha yadetaṃ kalyāṇamittassa bhikkhuno sīlavantatāya bhavanaṃ sīlasampannattaṃ,
tika-s0404t:337_15: tassa bhikkhuno sīlasampannattā etaṃ tassa pāṭikaṅkhaṃ,
tika-s0404t:337_16: avassaṃbhāvī ekaṃseneva tassa tattha niyojanatoti adhippāyo.
tika-s0404t:338_0: Evaṃ bhagavā sadevake loke uttamakalyāṇamittasaṅkhātassa attano vacanaṃ anādiyitvā taṃ vanasaṇḍaṃ pavisitvā
tika-s0404t:338_1: tādisaṃ vippakāraṃ pattassa āyasmato meghiyassa kalyāṇamittatādinā sakalaṃ sāsanasampadaṃ dassetvā idānissa
tika-s0404t:338_2: tattha ādarajātassa pubbe yehi kāmavitakkādīhi upaddutattā kammaṭṭhānaṃ na sampajjati,
tika-s0404t:338_3: tassa tesaṃ ujuvipaccanīkabhūtattā ca bhāvanānayaṃ pakāsetvā tato paraṃ arahattassa kammaṭṭhānaṃ ācikkhanto “tena ca pana, meghiya,
tika-s0404t:338_4: bhikkhunā imesu pañcasu dhammesu patiṭṭhāya cattāro dhammā uttari bhāvetabbā”tiādimāha.
tika-s0404t:338_8: tesaṃ visodhanatthaṃ tato uddhaṃ cattāro dhammā bhāvetabbā uppādetabbā vaḍḍhetabbā ca.
tika-s0404t:339_0: Asubhāti ekādasasu asubhakammaṭṭhānesu yathārahaṃ yattha katthaci asubhabhāvanā.
tika-s0404t:339_6: Byāpādassa pahānāyāti vuttanayeneva uppannassa kopassa pajahanatthāya.
tika-s0404t:340_0: Aniccasaññinoti hutvā abhāvato udayabbayavantato pabhaṅguto tāvakālikato niccappaṭikkhepato ca “sabbe
tika-s0404t:340_2: Anattasaññā saṇṭhātīti asārakato avasavattanato parato rittato tucchato suññato ca “sabbe dhammā anattā”ti
tika-s0404t:340_3: evaṃ pavattaanattānupassanāsaṅkhātā anattasaññā citte saṇṭhahati atidaḷhaṃ patiṭṭhahati.
tika-s0404t:340_4: Aniccalakkhaṇe hi diṭṭhe anattalakkhaṇaṃ diṭṭhameva hoti.
tika-s0404t:340_5: Tīsu lakkhaṇesu hi ekasmiṃ diṭṭhe itaradvayaṃ diṭṭhameva hoti.
tika-s0404t:340_8: Anattalakkhaṇe sudiṭṭhe “asmī”ti uppajjanakamāno suppajahova hotīti āha “anattasaññī asmimānasamugghātaṃ pāpuṇātī”ti.
tika-s0404t:340_9: Diṭṭheva dhamme nibbānanti diṭṭheva dhamme imasmiṃyeva attabhāve apaccayaparinibbānaṃ pāpuṇāti.
tika-s0404t:340_11: vitthārato pana asubhādibhāvanānayo visuddhimagge vuttanayena veditabbo.
tika-s0404t:343_2: buddho sahasā apavisitvā yāva sā kathā niṭṭhāti,
tika-s0404t:343_8: yvāyaṃ carati mānaso”ti ettha rāgo mānasaṃ.
tika-s0404t:343_11: kālaṃ kayirā jane sutā”ti ettha arahattaṃ.
tika-s0404t:346_2: Samudānetabbāti sammā ñāyena anavajjauñchācariyādinā uddhamuddhamānetabbā pāpuṇitabbā.
tika-s0404t:346_3: Te pana samudānitā samāhatā nāma hontīti āha “samāharitabbā”ti.
tika-s0404t:346_6: Rattibhāgaṃ vā divasabhāgaṃ vāti bhummatthe upayogavacananti āha “rattikoṭṭhāse vā divasakoṭṭhāse vā”ti.
tika-s0404t:346_19: Taṃ puggalanti so puggaloti paccattavacanaṃ upayogavasena pariṇāmetvā taṃ puggalaṃ anāpucchā pakkamitabbanti attho.
tika-s0404t:346_22: Evarūpoti yaṃ nissāya bhikkhuno guṇehi vuddhiyeva pāṭikaṅkhā,
tika-s0404t:349_1: Sattame abhabbo khīṇāsavo bhikkhu sañcicca pāṇantiādi desanāsīsameva,
tika-s0404t:349_5: khīṇāsavo pana pāsaṃso kunthakipillikaghātādīnipi na karotīti.
tika-s0404t:349_6: Sannidhikārakaṃ kāme paribhuñjitunti yathā gihibhūto sannidhiṃ katvā vatthukāme paribhuñjati,
tika-s0404t:349_7: evaṃ tilataṇḍulasappinavanītādīni sannidhiṃ katvā idāni paribhuñjituṃ abhabboti attho.
tika-s0404t:349_8: Vatthukāme pana nidahitvā paribhuñjantā tannissitaṃ kilesakāmampi nidahitvā paribhuñjanti nāmāti āha “vatthukāmakilesakāme”ti.
tika-s0404t:349_9: Nanu ca khīṇāsavasseva vasanaṭṭhāne tilataṇḍulādayo paññāyantīti?
tika-s0404t:349_10: Na pana te attano atthāya nidhenti,
tika-s0404t:349_17: Seyyāthāpi pubbe agāriyabhūtoti yathā pubbe gihibhūto paribhuñjati,
tika-s0404t:349_19: Agāramajjhe vasantā hi sotāpannādayo yāvajīvaṃ gihibyañjanena tiṭṭhanti.
tika-s0404t:349_20: Khīṇāsavo pana arahattaṃ patvāva manussabhūto parinibbāti vā pabbajati vā.
tika-s0404t:349_21: Cātumahārājikādīsu kāmāvacaradevesu muhuttampi na tiṭṭhati. Kasmā?
tika-s0404t:349_23: Bhummadevattabhāve pana ṭhito arahattaṃ patvāpi tiṭṭhati vivekaṭṭhānasambhavā.
tika-s0404t:354_1: Dutiyassa paṭhame avāpurenti vivaranti dvāraṃ etenāti avāpuraṇaṃ.
tika-s0404t:354_6: usabho ca so chinnavisāṇo cāti usabhachinnavisāṇo.
tika-s0404t:354_9: Kaṇṭhe āsattenāti kenacideva paccatthikena ānetvā kaṇṭhe baddhena,
tika-s0404t:354_13: Evañhi so kāraṇe desiyamāne tato vigato nāma hoti.
tika-s0404t:357_0: 12. Dutiye bhavassa appamattakatā nāma ittarakālatāyāti āha “accharāsaṅghātamattampī”ti.
tika-s0404t:363_1: Catutthe samiddhīti therassa kira attabhāvo samiddho abhirūpo pāsādiko,
tika-s0404t:366_1: Pañcame mātāpettikasambhavassāti mātito ca pitito ca nibbattena mātāpettikena sukkasoṇitena sambhūtassa.
tika-s0404t:366_7: pacchimehi atthaṅgamoti evaṃ cātumahābhūtikassa kāyassa vaḍḍhiparihāninibbattibhedā dassitā.
tika-s0404t:369_2: Parittehi sakuṇḍehi taṇḍulehipi saddhiṃ vipakkabhattaṃ uttaṇḍulameva hoti.
tika-s0404t:369_4: biḷaṅgato nibbattanato tadeva kañjiyato jātanti kañjiyaṃ,
tika-s0404t:369_10: Deyyadhammaṃ asakkaronto hi uttaṇḍulādidosasamannāgataṃ āhāraṃ deti,
tika-s0404t:369_12: Puggalaṃ asakkaronto nisīdanaṭṭhānaṃ asammajjitvā yattha tattha vā nisīdāpetvā yaṃ vā taṃ vā dārakaṃ pesetvā deti.
tika-s0404t:369_17: Cittaṃ vā acchariyaṃ katvā paṭipatti cittīkaraṇaṃ sambhāvanakiriyā,
tika-s0404t:369_20: Yo hi chaḍḍetukāmo hutvā rogino sarīre odanādīni majjitvā vammike rogaṃ pakkhipanto viya deti,
tika-s0404t:369_22: Anāgamanadiṭṭhikoti “addhā imassa dānassa phalaṃ mama āgacchatī”ti evaṃ yassa kammassakatadiṭṭhi atthi,
tika-s0404t:369_25: phalaṃ pāṭikaṅkhaṃ hutvā na detīti attho.
tika-s0404t:370_2: Jātigottarūpabhogādiguṇānaṃ velā mariyādā natthi etasminti velāmo.
tika-s0404t:370_3: Atha vā yathāvuttaguṇānaṃ velā mariyādā amati osānaṃ gacchati etasminti velāmo,
tika-s0404t:370_4: velaṃ vā mariyādaṃ amati gacchati atikkamatīti velāmo.
tika-s0404t:370_13: Dukūlasandanānīti rajatabhājanādinissite dukūle khīrassa sandanaṃ etesanti dukūlasandanāni.
tika-s0404t:371_2: Saraṇaṃ nāma tiṇṇaṃ ratanānaṃ jīvitapariccāgamayaṃ puññaṃ sabbasampattiṃ deti,
tika-s0404t:371_4: “sace tvaṃ yathā gahitaṃ saraṇaṃ na bhindissasi,
tika-s0404t:371_5: evāhaṃ taṃ māremī”ti yadipi koci tiṇhena satthena jīvitā voropeyya,
tika-s0404t:371_8: saṅghaṃ na saṅghoti vadāmī”ti daḷhataraṃ katvā gahitassa vasena vuttaṃ.
tika-s0404t:371_11: Sabbesaṃ sattānaṃ jīvitadānādinihitadaṇḍatāya sakalalokiyalokuttaraguṇādhiṭṭhānato cassa mahapphalamahānisaṃsatā veditabbā.
