tika-s0404t:372_2: So ca na sakalo godohanakkhaṇo adhippetoti dassetuṃ “gāviyā ekavāraṃ thanaañchanamatta”nti attho vutto.
tika-s0404t:372_4: Gāviyā thanaṃ gahetvā ekakhīrabinduduhanakālamattampi gadduhanamattanti vadanti.
tika-s0404t:372_5: Ettakampi hi kālaṃ yo vasanagabbhapariveṇavihārūpacāraparicchedena vā aparimāṇāsu lokadhātūsu sabbasatte hitapharaṇaṃ mettacittaṃ bhāvetuṃ sakkoti.
tika-s0404t:377_3: Tesaṃ kira “ayaṃ mayhaṃ bhariyā”ti mamattaṃ na hoti,
tika-s0404t:377_4: mātaraṃ vā bhaginiṃ vā disvā chandarāgo na uppajjati.
tika-s0404t:377_5: Dhammatāsiddhassa sīlassa ānubhāvena putte diṭṭhamatte eva mātuthanato thaññaṃ paggharati,
tika-s0404t:377_6: tena saññāṇena nesaṃ mātari puttassa mātusaññā,
tika-s0404t:377_7: mātu ca putte puttasaññā paccupaṭṭhitāti keci.
tika-s0404t:378_0: Apicettha uttarakurukānaṃ puññānubhāvasiddho ayampi viseso veditabbo.
tika-s0404t:378_1: Tattha kira tesu tesu padesesu ghananicitapattasañchannasākhāpasākhā kūṭāgārasamā manoramā rukkhā tesaṃ manussānaṃ nivesanakiccaṃ sādhenti.
tika-s0404t:378_3: aññepi tattha rukkhā sujātā sabbadāpi pupphitaggā tiṭṭhanti.
tika-s0404t:378_4: Jalāsayāpi vikasitakamalakuvalayapuṇḍarīkasogandhikādipupphasañchannā sabbakālaṃ paramasugandhaṃ samantato pavāyantā tiṭṭhanti.
tika-s0404t:378_5: Sarīrampi tesaṃ atidīghādidosarahitaṃ ārohapariṇāhasampannaṃ jarāya anabhibhūtattā valitapalitādidosavirahitaṃ
tika-s0404t:378_7: Anuṭṭhānaphalūpajīvitāya na ca nesaṃ kasivaṇijjādivasena āhārapariyeṭṭhivasena dukkhaṃ atthi,
tika-s0404t:378_10: Yathā nāmettha gimhānaṃ pacchime māse paccūsavelāyaṃ samasītuṇho utu hoti,
tika-s0404t:378_11: evameva sabbakālaṃ tattha samasītuṇhova utu hoti,
tika-s0404t:378_12: na ca nesaṃ koci upaghāto vihesā vā uppajjati.
tika-s0404t:378_13: Akaṭṭhapākimeva sāliṃ akaṇaṃ athusaṃ suddhaṃ sugandhaṃ taṇḍulapphalaṃ paribhuñjanti.
tika-s0404t:378_14: Taṃ bhuñjantānaṃ nesaṃ kuṭṭhaṃ, gaṇḍo, kilāso, soso, kāso, sāso, apamāro,
tika-s0404t:378_15: jaroti evamādiko na koci rogo uppajjati,
tika-s0404t:378_16: na ca te khujjā vā vāmanā vā kāṇā vā kuṇī vā khañjā vā pakkhahatā vā vikalaṅgā vā vikalindriyā vā honti.
tika-s0404t:380_0: Sattāhikameva ca tattha itthipurisā kāmaratiyā viharanti.
tika-s0404t:380_5: Rattakañcukato kañcanapaṭimā viya dārakā mātukucchito amakkhitā eva semhādinā sukheneva nikkhamanti.
tika-s0404t:381_0: Mātā pana puttaṃ vā dhītaraṃ vā vijāyitvā te vicaraṇakappadese ṭhapetvā anapekkhā yathāruci gacchati.
tika-s0404t:381_1: Tesaṃ tattha sayitānaṃ ye passanti purisā vā itthiyo vā,
tika-s0404t:381_5: Evaṃ pana vaḍḍhentā katipayadivaseheva laddhabalā hutvā dārikā itthiyo upagacchanti,
tika-s0404t:381_7: Kapparukkhato eva ca tesaṃ tattha vatthābharaṇāni nipphajjanti.
tika-s0404t:381_8: Nānāvirāgavaṇṇavicittāni hi sukhumāni mudusukhasamphassāni vatthāni tattha tattha kapparukkhesu olambantāni tiṭṭhanti.
tika-s0404t:381_12: Tattha bahū phalarukkhā kumbhamattāni phalāni phalanti madhurarasāni,
tika-s0404t:381_13: yāni paribhuñjitvā te sattāhampi khuppipāsāhi na bādhīyanti.
tika-s0404t:382_0: Najjopi tattha suvisuddhajalā suppatitthā ramaṇīyā akaddamā vālukatalā nātisītā naccuṇhā surabhigandhīhi
tika-s0404t:382_1: jalajapupphehi sañchannā sabbakālaṃ surabhī vāyantiyo sandanti,
tika-s0404t:382_5: nahāyitukāmā ca nadititthe ekajjhaṃ vatthābharaṇāni ṭhapetvā nadiṃ otaritvā nhatvā uttiṇṇuttiṇṇā upariṭṭhimaṃ upariṭṭhimaṃ vatthābharaṇaṃ gaṇhanti,
tika-s0404t:382_8: Tato eva na tesaṃ koci viggaho vā vivādo vā.
tika-s0404t:382_9: Sattāhikā eva ca nesaṃ kāmaratikīḷā hoti,
tika-s0404t:382_13: Mate ca satte disvā na rodanti na socanti.
tika-s0404t:382_15: Tāvadeva ca nesaṃ tathārūpā sakuṇā upagantvā mataṃ dīpantaraṃ nenti,
tika-s0404t:382_16: tasmā susānaṃ vā asuciṭṭhānaṃ vā tattha natthi,
tika-s0404t:382_17: na ca tato matā nirayaṃ vā tiracchānayoniṃ vā pettivisayaṃ vā upapajjanti.
tika-s0404t:382_18: Dhammatāsiddhassa pañcasīlassa ānubhāvena te devaloke nibbattantīti vadanti.
tika-s0404t:385_1: Tatiye esanataṇhāti bhogānaṃ pariyesanavasena pavattā taṇhā.
tika-s0404t:385_4: āsayato payogato ca pariyesanā tathāpavatto cittuppādo.
tika-s0404t:385_8: tampi atthato pariyesanāya laddhameva nāma tathārūpassa kammassa pubbekatattā eva labbhanato.
tika-s0404t:386_1: Sukhaṃ sabhāvato samudayato atthaṅgamato ādīnavato nissaraṇato ca yāthāvato jānitvā pavattañāṇaṃva sukhavinicchayaṃ.
tika-s0404t:386_3: “Subhaṃ sukha”ntiādikaṃ ārammaṇe abhūtākāraṃ vividhaṃ ninnabhāvena cinoti āropetīti vinicchayo,
tika-s0404t:386_6: Imasmiṃ pana sutte vitakkoyeva āgatoti yojanā.
tika-s0404t:386_12: Vitakkeneva vinicchinantīti etena “vinicchinati etenāti vinicchayo”ti vinicchayasaddassa karaṇasādhanamāha.
tika-s0404t:387_2: Svāyaṃ anāsevanatāya mando hutvā pavatto idhādhippetoti āha “dubbalarāgassādhivacana”nti.
tika-s0404t:387_4: “Mayhaṃ ida”nti hi taṇhāgāho yebhuyyena attaggāhasannissayova hoti.
tika-s0404t:387_7: Taṇhādiṭṭhivasena pariggahakaraṇanti ahaṃ mamanti balavasanniṭṭhānavasena abhiniviṭṭhassa attattaniyaggāhavatthuno
tika-s0404t:387_10: Attanā pariggahitassa vatthuno yassa vasena parehi sādhāraṇabhāvassa asahamāno hoti puggalo,
tika-s0404t:387_13: Saddalakkhaṇena pana yassa dhammassa vasena macchariyayogato puggalo maccharo,
tika-s0404t:387_17: Macchariyassa balavabhāvato ādarena rakkhaṇaṃ ārakkhoti āha “dvāra…pe…
tika-s0404t:388_16: Tenāha bhagavā “aneke pāpakā akusalā dhammā sambhavantī”ti.
tika-s0404t:391_3: Yasmā te te sattanivāsā tappariyāpannānaṃ sattānaṃ tāya eva tappariyāpannatāya ādhāro viya vattabbataṃ arahanti.
tika-s0404t:391_10: yo mayā anāvutthapubbo iminā dīghena addhunā aññatra suddhāvāsehi devehī”ti vacanato.
tika-s0404t:391_11: Yadi evaṃ te kasmā idha na gahitāti tattha kāraṇamāha “asabbakālikattā”tiādi.
tika-s0404t:391_12: Vehapphalā pana catuttheyeva sattāvāse bhajantīti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0404t:394_1: Chaṭṭhe pamāṇamajjhimassa purisassa catuvīsataṅguliko hattho kukku,
tika-s0404t:394_3: Aṭṭha kukkū upari nemassāti aṭṭha hatthā āvāṭassa upari uggantvā ṭhitā bhaveyyuṃ.
tika-s0404t:397_7: bhāyitabbena vā bhayaṃ eva verappasavaṭṭhena veranti ca laddhanāmā cetanādayo.
tika-s0404t:397_11: tato eva cete bhāyitabbā verasañjanakā nāmāti.
tika-s0404t:397_12: Sotassa ariyamaggassa ādito pajjanaṃ paṭipatti adhigamo sotāpatti.
tika-s0404t:397_13: Tadatthāya tattha patiṭṭhitassa ca aṅgāni sotāpattiyaṅgāni.
tika-s0404t:397_14: Duvidhañhi sotāpattiyaṅgaṃ sotāpattiatthāya ca aṅgaṃ kāraṇaṃ,
tika-s0404t:397_17: Paṭiladdhaguṇassa ca sotāpattiṃ patvā ṭhitassa aṅgaṃ,
tika-s0404t:397_18: yaṃ “sotāpannassa aṅga”ntipi vuccati “sotāpanno aṅgīyati ñāyati etenā”ti katvā,
tika-s0404t:398_0: Khīṇanirayotiādīsu āyatiṃ tattha anuppajjanatāya khīṇo nirayo mayhati,
tika-s0404t:398_6: Sambodhiparāyaṇoti uparimaggattayasaṅkhāto sambodhi paraṃ ayanaṃ mayhanti sohaṃ sambodhiparāyaṇo,
tika-s0404t:399_6: Ekena hi ekassa pitā mārito hoti.
tika-s0404t:399_7: So cinteti “etena kira me pitā mārito,
tika-s0404t:399_8: ahampi taṃyeva māressāmī”ti nisitaṃ satthaṃ ādāya carati.
tika-s0404t:399_10: idaṃ bāhiraṃ veraṃ nāma tassa verassa mūlabhūtato verakārakapuggalato bahibhāvattā.
tika-s0404t:399_11: Yā pana itarassa “ayaṃ kira maṃ māressāmīti carati,
tika-s0404t:399_12: ahameva naṃ paṭhamataraṃ māressāmī”ti cetanā uppajjati,
tika-s0404t:399_15: Yā pana taṃ niraye uppannaṃ disvā “etaṃ paharissāmī”ti jalitaṃ ayamuggaraṃ gaṇhantassa nirayapālassa cetanā uppajjati,
tika-s0404t:399_17: Yā cassa “ayaṃ niddosaṃ maṃ paharissāmīti āgacchati,
tika-s0404t:399_18: ahameva naṃ paṭhamataraṃ paharissāmī”ti cetanā uppajjati,
tika-s0404t:399_27: surāmadamattena idaṃ nāma kata”ntiādinā nayena verappavatti veditabbā.
tika-s0404t:400_2: Tāni hi ariyānaṃ kantāni piyāni bhavanti,
tika-s0404t:400_6: taṃ sabbaṃ visuddhimagge anussatiniddese vuttanti veditabbaṃ.
tika-s0404t:403_1: Navame vasati ettha phalaṃ tannimittatāya pavattatīti vatthu,
tika-s0404t:403_6: Atha vā yo paccayavisesena uppajjamāno āghāto savisaye baddho viya na vigacchati,
tika-s0404t:403_9: Taṃ panassa paccayavasena nibbattanaṃ uppādanamevāti vuttaṃ “uppādetī”ti.
tika-s0404t:406_1: Dasame taṃ kutettha labbhāti ettha tanti kiriyāparāmasanaṃ.
tika-s0404t:406_2: Padajjhāhārena ca attho veditabboti “taṃ anatthacaraṇaṃ mā ahosī”tiādimāha.
tika-s0404t:406_5: Te kassa ruciyā dukkhitā sukhitā vā bhavanti,
tika-s0404t:406_8: Atha vā taṃ kopakāraṇaṃ ettha puggale kuto labbhā paramatthato kujjhitabbassa kujjhanakassa ca abhāvato.
tika-s0404t:406_13: Lābhā nāma ke siyuṃ aññatra anatthuppattito.
tika-s0404t:417_1: Dutiye chātaṃ vuccati taṇhādiṭṭhiyo kāmānaṃ pātabbato tāsaṃ vasena vattanato,
tika-s0404t:420_12: So hi appaguṇatāya na suppatiṭṭhitatāya saussāhopi vināsato asāmatthiyato ca jhānadvayato parihīno.
tika-s0404t:423_1: Pañcame aniccatoti iminā niccappaṭikkhepato tesaṃ aniccatamāha.
tika-s0404t:423_2: Tato eva udayavayavantato vipariṇāmato tāvakālikato ca te aniccāti jotitaṃ hoti.
tika-s0404t:423_4: taṃ udayavayaparicchinnajarāya maraṇena cāti dvedhā vipariṇataṃ ittarakkhaṇameva ca hoti.
tika-s0404t:423_7: Tato eva ca abhiṇhappaṭipīḷanato dukkhavatthuto ca te dukkhāti jotitaṃ hoti.
tika-s0404t:423_8: Udayavayavantatāya hi te abhiṇhappaṭipīḷanato nirantaradukkhatāya dukkhasseva ca adhiṭṭhānabhūto.
tika-s0404t:423_10: Dukkhatāsūlayogato kilesāsucipaggharato uppādajarābhaṅgehi uddhumātapakkabhijjanato ca gaṇḍato.
tika-s0404t:423_18: Rūpādidhammāpi yathā na ettha attā atthīti anattā,
tika-s0404t:423_19: evaṃ sayampi attā na hontīti anattā.
tika-s0404t:423_20: Tena abyāpārato nirīhato tucchato anattāti dīpitaṃ hoti.
tika-s0404t:424_0: Lakkhaṇattayameva sukhāvabodhanatthaṃ ekādasahi padehi vibhajitvā gahitanti dassetuṃ “yasmā aniccato”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0404t:424_1: Antosamāpattiyanti samāpattīnaṃ sahajātatāya samāpattīnaṃ abbhantare cittaṃ paṭisaṃharatīti tappaṭibaddhachandarāgādikilesavikkhambhanena
tika-s0404t:424_10: Yathā vipassanā “etaṃ santaṃ etaṃ paṇīta”ntiādinā asaṅkhatāya dhātuyā cittaṃ upasaṃharati,
tika-s0404t:424_11: evaṃ maggo nibbānaṃ sacchikiriyābhisamayavasena abhisamento tattha labbhamāne sabbepi visese asammohato paṭivijjhanto tattha cittaṃ upasaṃharati.
tika-s0404t:425_0: So tattha ṭhitoti so adandhavipassako yogī tattha tāya aniccādilakkhaṇattayārammaṇāya vipassanāya ṭhito.
tika-s0404t:425_1: Sabbasoti sabbattha tassa tassa maggassa adhigamāya nibbattitasamathavipassanāsu.
tika-s0404t:425_2: Asakkonto anāgāmī hotīti heṭṭhimamaggāvahāsu eva samathavipassanāya chandarāgaṃ pahāya aggamaggāvahāsu
tika-s0404t:426_0: Samatikkantattāti samathavasena vipassanāvasena cāti sabbathāpi rūpassa samatikkantattā.
tika-s0404t:426_3: Taṃ atikkammāti idaṃ yo paṭhamaṃ pañcavokāraekavokārapariyāpanne dhamme sammadeva sammasitvā te vissajjetvā
tika-s0404t:429_1: Chaṭṭhe okāsaṃ avasaraṃ adhigacchati etenāti okāsādhigamo,
tika-s0404t:429_4: Ettha ca dīghanikāyeneva pana suttantadesanāyaṃ paṭhamajjhānaṃ,
tika-s0404t:429_7: Tattha paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ pañca nīvaraṇāni vikkhambhetvā attano okāsaṃ gahetvā tiṭṭhatīti “paṭhamo okāsādhigamo”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0404t:429_8: Catutthajjhānaṃ pana sukhadukkhaṃ vikkhambhetvā attano okāsaṃ gahetvā tiṭṭhatīti dutiyo okāsādhigamo.
tika-s0404t:429_9: Arahattamaggo sabbakilese vikkhambhetvā attano okāsaṃ gahetvā tiṭṭhatīti “tatiyo okāsādhigamo”ti vutto.
tika-s0404t:429_10: Idha pana vakkhamānāni tīṇi arūpajjhānāni sandhāya “okāsādhigamo”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0404t:429_11: Tesaṃyeva ca gahaṇe kāraṇaṃ sayameva vakkhati.
tika-s0404t:430_0: Sattānaṃ visuddhiṃ pāpanatthāyāti rāgādīhi malehi abhijjhāvisamalobhādīhi ca upakkilesehi kiliṭṭhacittānaṃ
tika-s0404t:430_3: Atthaṃ gamanatthāyāti kāyikadukkhassa ca cetasikadomanassassa cāti imesaṃ dvinnaṃ atthaṅgamāya,
tika-s0404t:430_6: taṃ vā ñāyati paṭivijjhīyati etenāti ñāyo,
tika-s0404t:431_0: Rāgānugato samādhi abhinato nāma hoti ārammaṇe abhimukhābhāvena pavattiyā,
tika-s0404t:431_2: tadubhayappaṭikkhepena “na cābhinato na cāpanato”ti vuttanti āha “rāgavasenā”tiādi.
tika-s0404t:431_3: Na sasaṅkhāraniggayhavāritagatoti lokiyajjhānacittāni viya na sasaṅkhārena sappayogena tadaṅgappahānavikkhambhanappahānavasena
tika-s0404t:434_1: Sattame lokāyatavādakāti āyatiṃ hitaṃ loko na yatati na viruhati etenāti lokāyataṃ,
tika-s0404t:434_3: Tañhi ganthaṃ nissāya sattā puññakiriyāya cittampi na uppādenti,
tika-s0404t:435_3: So eva usuṃ saraṃ asati khipatīti issāso.
tika-s0404t:435_7: Yāva kaṇḍappamāṇāti dīghato yattakaṃ kaṇḍassa pamāṇaṃ,
tika-s0404t:435_8: tattake dhanudaṇḍe ukkhittamatte āropitesuyeva jiyādaṇḍesu so ce bhāro pathavito muccati,
tika-s0404t:435_9: evaṃ idaṃ dvisahassathāmaṃ nāma dhanūti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0404t:435_12: Īdiso pana tattha vasibhūto katahattho nāma hotīti āha “ciṇṇavasibhāvo”ti.
tika-s0404t:435_13: Kataṃ rājakulādīsu upecca asanaṃ etena so katūpāsanoti āha “rājakulādīsu dassitasippo”ti.
tika-s0404t:435_14: Evaṃ katanti evaṃ antosusirakaraṇādinā sallahukaṃ kataṃ.
tika-s0404t:438_4: sakko kira magadharaṭṭhe macalagāmake magho nāma māṇavo hutvā tettiṃsa purise gahetvā kalyāṇakammaṃ karonto
tika-s0404t:438_5: satta vatapadāni pūretvā tattha kālaṅkato devaloke nibbatti.
tika-s0404t:438_6: Taṃ balavakammānubhāvena saparisaṃ sesadevatā dasahi ṭhānehi adhigaṇhantaṃ disvā “āgantukadevaputtā āgatā”ti nevāsikā gandhapānaṃ sajjayiṃsu.
tika-s0404t:438_7: Sakko sakaparisāya saññaṃ adāsi “mārisā mā gandhapānaṃ pivittha,
tika-s0404t:438_10: Nevāsikadevatā suvaṇṇasarakehi upanītaṃ gandhapānaṃ yāvadatthaṃ pivitvā mattā tattha tattha suvaṇṇapathaviyaṃ patitvā sayiṃsu.
tika-s0404t:438_11: Sakko “gaṇhatha puttahatāya putte”ti te pādesu gahetvā sinerupāde khipāpesi.
tika-s0404t:438_12: Sakkassa puññatejena tadanuvattakāpi sabbe tattheva patiṃsu.
tika-s0404t:438_17: Atha nesaṃ kammapaccayautusamuṭṭhānaṃ sinerussa heṭṭhimatale dasayojanasahassaṃ asurabhavanaṃ nibbatti.
tika-s0404t:438_18: Sakko tesaṃ nivattitvā anāgamanatthāya ārakkhaṃ ṭhapesi.
tika-s0404t:443_0: Dve nagarāni hi yuddhena gahetuṃ asakkuṇeyyatāya ayujjhapurāni nāma jātāni devanagarañca asuranagarañca.
tika-s0404t:443_2: atha devehi palāyitvā devanagaraṃ pavisitvā dvāre pidahite asurānaṃ satasahassampi kiñci kātuṃ na sakkoti.
tika-s0404t:443_4: athāsurehi palāyitvā asuranagarassa dvāre pidahite sakkānaṃ satasahassampi kiñci kātuṃ na sakkoti.
tika-s0404t:443_5: Iti imāni dve nagarāni ayujjhapurāni nāma.
tika-s0404t:443_6: Tesaṃ antarā etesu uragādīsu pañcasu ṭhānesu sakkena ārakkhā ṭhapitā.
tika-s0404t:443_20: Caturo ca mahattāti cattāro mahārājāno vuttā,
tika-s0404t:443_22: tasmā yadi asurā kupitāvilacittā devapuraṃ upayanti yujjhituṃ.
tika-s0404t:444_1: tasmā antarā attānaṃ ajānitvā pāṭaliyā pupphitāya “na idaṃ devanagaraṃ,
tika-s0404t:444_6: tena saddhiṃ yujjhissāmā”ti hatthiassarathe āruyha suvaṇṇarajatamaṇiphalakāni gahetvā yuddhasajjā hutvā
tika-s0404t:444_7: asurabheriyo vādentā mahāsamudde udakaṃ dvidhā bhetvā uṭṭhahanti.
tika-s0404t:444_8: Te deve vuṭṭhe vammikamakkhikā vammikaṃ viya sineruṃ āruhituṃ ārabhanti.
tika-s0404t:444_9: Atha nesaṃ paṭhamaṃ nāgehi saddhiṃ yuddhaṃ hoti.
tika-s0404t:444_10: Tasmiṃ kho pana yuddhe na kassaci chavi vā cammaṃ vā chijjati,
tika-s0404t:444_12: kevalaṃ kumārakānaṃ dārumeṇḍakayuddhaṃ viya aññamaññasantāsanamattameva hoti.
tika-s0404t:444_13: Koṭisatāpi koṭisahassāpi nāgā tehi saddhiṃ yujjhitvā te asurapuraṃyeva pavesetvā nivattanti.
tika-s0404t:444_15: atha nāgā osakkitvā dutiye ālinde supaṇṇehi saddhiṃ ekatova hutvā yujjhanti.
tika-s0404t:444_17: Yadā pana tāni pañcapi ṭhānāni asurā maddanti,
tika-s0404t:444_18: tadā ekato sampiṇḍitānipi tāni pañca balāni osakkanti.
tika-s0404t:444_19: Atha cattāro mahārājāno gantvā sakkassa taṃ pavattiṃ ārocenti.
tika-s0404t:444_20: Sakko tesaṃ vacanaṃ sutvā diyaḍḍhayojanasatikaṃ vejayantarathaṃ āruyha sayaṃ vā nikkhamati,
tika-s0404t:444_22: Yadā devā puna apaccāgamanāya asure jiniṃsu,
tika-s0404t:444_23: tadā sakko asure palāpetvā pañcasu ṭhānesu ārakkhaṃ datvā vediyapāde vajirahatthā indapaṭimāyo ṭhapesi.
tika-s0404t:444_24: Asurā kālena kālaṃ uṭṭhahitvā paṭimāyo disvā “sakko appamatto tiṭṭhatī”ti tatova nivattanti.
tika-s0404t:444_25: Idha pana yadā asurānaṃ jayo ahosi,
tika-s0404t:445_1: Asurā kira devehi parājitā palāyantā cakkavāḷapabbatābhimukhaṃ gantvā cakkavāḷamahāsamuddapiṭṭhiyaṃ rajatapaṭṭavaṇṇe
tika-s0404t:445_2: vālikāpuline yattha paṇṇakuṭiyo māpetvā isayo vasanti,
tika-s0404t:445_3: tattha gantvā isīnaṃ assamapadena gacchantā “sakko imehi saddhiṃ mantetvā amhe nāseti,
tika-s0404t:445_4: gaṇhatha puttahatāya putte”ti kupitā assamapade pānīyaghaṭacaṅkamanapaṇṇasālādīni viddhaṃsenti.
tika-s0404t:445_5: Isayo araññato phalāphalaṃ ādāya āgatā disvā puna dukkhena paṭipākatikaṃ karonti,
tika-s0404t:445_6: tepi punappunaṃ tatheva parājitā gantvā vināsenti.
tika-s0404t:456_1: Pañcamassa paṭhame udāyīti tayo therā udāyī nāma kāḷudāyī, lāḷudāyī,
tika-s0404t:456_10: Paṭilīnā nāma pahīnamānā vuccanti mānussayavasena uṇṇatābhāvato.
tika-s0404t:456_15: bhikkhuno asmimāno pahīno hoti ucchinnamūlo tālāvatthukato anabhāvaṃgato āyatiṃ anuppādadhammo”ti.
tika-s0404t:464_5: añño eva panānena nipphādetabbo samādhiādiguṇoti dasseti.
tika-s0404t:464_7: tāva taruṇavipassanā”ti hi vacanato upakkilesavimuttaudayabbayañāṇato paraṃ ayañca vipassanā virajjati
tika-s0404t:464_8: yogāvacaro viratto puriso viya bhariyāya saṅkhārato etenāti virāgo.
tika-s0404t:467_1: Dutiye saṃsāramahoghassa paratīrabhāvato yo naṃ adhigacchati,
tika-s0404t:467_3: Tabbidūratāya natthi ettha pāranti apāraṃ, saṃsāro.
tika-s0404t:470_1: Chaṭṭhe santaṃ santanti appetvā nisinnassātiādīsu santaṃ santaṃ paṇītaṃ paṇītantiādīni vadati.
tika-s0404t:470_2: Iminā pana ākārena taṃ paṭivijjhitvā tattha cittaṃ upasaṃharato phalasamāpattisaṅkhāto cittuppādo tathā pavattatīti veditabbo.
tika-s0404t:475_1: Dutiyassa paṭhame nātidūranti gocaraṭṭhānato aḍḍhagāvutato orabhāgatāya nātidūraṃ.
tika-s0404t:475_2: Nāccāsannanti pacchimena pamāṇena gocaraṭṭhānato pañcadhanusatikatāya na atiāsannaṃ.
tika-s0404t:475_3: Tāya ca pana nātidūranāccāsannatāya gocaraṭṭhānapaṭiparissayādirahitamaggatāya ca gamanassa ca āgamanassa ca yuttarūpattā gamanāgamanasampannaṃ.
tika-s0404t:476_3: Tamuggahadhāraṇena sammadeva garūnaṃ santike āgamitabhāvena ca āgato pariyattidhammasaṅkhāto āgamo etesanti āgatāgamā.
tika-s0404t:476_8: Atthaparipucchāya paripañhati vīmaṃsati vicāreti. Idaṃ, bhante, kathaṃ,
tika-s0404t:476_10: Avivaṭañceva pāḷiyā atthaṃ padesantarapāḷidassanena āgamato vivaranti.
tika-s0404t:476_12: Kaṅkhāṭhāniyesu dhammesu saṃsayuppattiyā hetutāya gaṇṭhiṭṭhānabhūtesu pāḷippadesesu yāthāvato vinicchayappadānena kaṅkhaṃ paṭivinodenti.
tika-s0404t:477_0: Ettha ca nātidūraṃ nāccāsannaṃ gamanāgamanasampannanti ekaṃ aṅgaṃ,
tika-s0404t:480_1: Pañcame kārāpakaappamādo nāma “ime akusalā dhammā pahātabbā,
tika-s0404t:480_2: ime kusalā dhammā upasampādetabbā”ti taṃtaṃparivajjetabbavajjanasampādetabbasampādanavasena pavatto appamādo.
tika-s0404t:480_5: Ayañcāti ca esāti ca appamādameva vadati.
tika-s0404t:481_9: Vassikāya pupphaṃ vassikaṃ yathā “āmalakiyā phalaṃ āmalaka”nti.
tika-s0404t:484_1: Sattame yehi sīlādīhi samannāgato bhikkhu dhammasaraṇatāya dhammeneva nāthati āsīsati abhibhavatīti nātho vuccati,
tika-s0404t:484_2: te tassa nāthabhāvakarā dhammā nāthakaraṇāti vuttāti āha “attano sanāthabhāvakarā patiṭṭhakarāti attho”ti.
tika-s0404t:484_9: So vuttanayena kalyāṇo assa atthīti tassa atthitāmattaṃ kalyāṇamittapadena vuttaṃ.
tika-s0404t:484_10: Assa tena sabbakālaṃ avijahitavāsoti taṃ dassetuṃ “kalyāṇasahāyo”ti vuttanti āha “tevassā”ti.
tika-s0404t:484_14: samodhāne pana cittena ceva kāyena ca sampavaṅko.
tika-s0404t:484_15: Sukhaṃ vaco etasmiṃ anukūlagāhimhi ādaragāravavati puggaleti suvaco.
tika-s0404t:485_1: Tatrupagamaniyāyāti tatra tatra mahante khuddake ca kamme sādhanavasena upāyena upagacchantiyā,
tika-s0404t:485_2: tassa tassa kammassa nipphādane samatthāyāti attho.
tika-s0404t:485_3: Tatrupāyāyāti vā tatra tatra kamme sādhetabbe upāyabhūtāya.
tika-s0404t:486_0: Dhamme assa kāmoti dhammakāmoti byadhikaraṇānampi bāhirattho samāso hotīti katvā vuttaṃ.
tika-s0404t:486_3: Dhammoti pariyattidhammo adhippetoti āha “tepiṭakaṃ buddhavacanaṃ piyāyatīti attho”ti.
tika-s0404t:486_8: Tena sayañca sakkaccaṃ desetukāmo hotīti yojanā.
tika-s0404t:486_9: Abhidhammo satta pakaraṇāni “adhiko abhivisiṭṭho ca pariyattidhammo”ti katvā.
tika-s0404t:486_15: Kilesavūpasamakaraṇaṃ pubbabhāgiyā tisso sikkhā saṅkhepato vivaṭṭanissito samatho vipassanā ca.
tika-s0404t:486_20: Kusalesu dhammesūti vā nipphādetabbe bhummaṃ yathā “cetaso avūpasame ayonisomanasikārapadaṭṭhāna”nti.
tika-s0404t:489_1: Navame ariyānaṃ eva āvāsāti ariyāvāsā anariyānaṃ tādisānaṃ asambhavato.
tika-s0404t:489_3: Te ca yasmā tehi sabbakālaṃ avijahitavāsā eva,
tika-s0404t:489_9: adhivāseti parivajjeti vinodetī”ti vuttesu apassenesu vinodanañca maggakiccāneva,
tika-s0404t:492_1: Dasame kasmā pana bhagavā kurusu viharanto imaṃ suttaṃ abhāsīti āha “yasmā”tiādi.
tika-s0404t:492_2: Kururaṭṭhaṃ kira tadā tannivāsisattānaṃ yonisomanasikāravantatādinā yebhuyyena suppaṭipannatāya pubbe
tika-s0404t:492_3: ca katapuññatābalena vā tadā utuādisampattiyuttameva ahosi.
tika-s0404t:492_4: Keci pana “pubbe pavattakuruvattadhammānuṭṭhānavāsanāya uttarakuru viya yebhuyyena utuādisampannameva hoti.
tika-s0404t:492_5: Bhagavato kāle sātisayaṃ utusappāyādiyuttaṃ raṭṭhaṃ ahosī”ti vadanti.
tika-s0404t:492_6: Tattha bhikkhū bhikkhuniyo upāsakā upāsikāyo utupaccayādisampannattā tassa raṭṭhassa sappāyautupaccayasevanena niccaṃ kallasarīrā kallacittā ca honti.
tika-s0404t:492_7: Te cittasarīrakallatāya anuggahitapaññābalā gambhīrakathaṃ paṭiggahetuṃ samatthā paṭiccasamuppādanissitānaṃ gambhīrapaññānañca kārakā honti.
tika-s0404t:493_0: Yuttappayuttāti satipaṭṭhānabhāvanāya yuttā ceva payuttā ca.
tika-s0404t:493_1: Tasmiñhi janapade catasso parisā pakatiyāva satipaṭṭhānabhāvanānuyogamanuyuttā viharanti,
tika-s0404t:493_5: tvaṃ kataraṃ satipaṭṭhānabhāvanaṃ manasi karosī”ti pucchitā “na kiñcī”ti vadati,
tika-s0404t:493_8: Atha naṃ “mā dāni puna evamakāsī”ti ovaditvā aññataraṃ satipaṭṭhānaṃ uggaṇhāpenti.
tika-s0404t:493_9: Yā pana “ahaṃ asukaṃ satipaṭṭhānaṃ nāma manasi karomī”ti vadati,
tika-s0404t:493_10: tassā “sādhu sādhū”ti sādhukāraṃ datvā “tava jīvitaṃ sujīvitaṃ,
tika-s0404t:494_1: eko kira naṭako suvapotakaṃ gahetvā sikkhāpento vicarati.
tika-s0404t:494_2: So bhikkhuniupassayaṃ upanissāya vasitvā gamanakāle suvapotakaṃ pamussitvā gato.
tika-s0404t:494_5: Taṃ ekadivasaṃ purato nisinnaṃ disvā mahātherī āha “buddharakkhitā”ti. Kiṃ, ayyoti.
tika-s0404t:494_8: pabbajitānaṃ santike vasantena nāma vissaṭṭhaattabhāvena bhavituṃ na vaṭṭati,
tika-s0404t:494_12: So theriyā ovāde ṭhatvā “aṭṭhi aṭṭhī”ti sajjhāyanto carati.
tika-s0404t:495_0: Taṃ ekadivasaṃ pātova toraṇagge nisīditvā bālātapaṃ tapamānaṃ eko sakuṇo nakhapañjarena aggahesi.
tika-s0404t:495_4: mocema na”nti leḍḍuādīni gahetvā anubandhitvā mocesuṃ.
tika-s0404t:495_5: Taṃ ānetvā purato ṭhapitaṃ therī āha,
tika-s0404t:496_0: Dīghanikāyādīsu mahānidānādīnīti dīghanikāye mahānidānaṃ satipaṭṭhānaṃ majjhimanikāye satipaṭṭhānaṃ sāropamaṃ
tika-s0404t:497_2: Ñāṇasampayuttacittāni labbhanti tehi vinā sampajānatāya asambhavato.
tika-s0404t:497_3: Mahācittānīti aṭṭhapi mahākiriyacittāni labbhanti “satatavihārā”ti vacanato ñāṇuppattipaccayarahitakālepi pavattijotanato.
tika-s0404t:497_4: Dasa cittānīti aṭṭha mahākiriyacittāni hasituppādavoṭṭhabbanacittehi saddhiṃ dasa cittāni labbhanti.
tika-s0404t:497_6: “Upekkhako viharatī”ti vacanato chaḷaṅgupekkhāvasena āgatānaṃ imesaṃ satatavihārānaṃ somanassaṃ kathaṃ labbhatīti āha “āsevanavasena labbhatī”ti.
tika-s0404t:497_7: Kiñcāpi khīṇāsavo iṭṭhāniṭṭhepi ārammaṇe majjhatto viya bahulaṃ upekkhako viharati attano parisuddhapakatibhāvāvijahanato.
tika-s0404t:497_8: Kadāci pana tathā cetobhisaṅkhārābhāve yaṃ taṃ sabhāvato iṭṭhaṃ ārammaṇaṃ,
tika-s0404t:497_9: tattha yāthāvasabhāvaggahaṇavasenapi arahato cittaṃ somanassasahagataṃ hutvā pavattateva,
tika-s0404t:498_3: Pāṭekkasaccānīti tehi tehi diṭṭhigatikehi pāṭiyekkaṃ gahitāni “idameva sacca”nti abhiniviṭṭhāni diṭṭhisaccādīni.
tika-s0404t:498_4: Tānipi hi “idameva sacca”nti gahaṇaṃ upādāya “saccānī”ti voharīyanti.
tika-s0404t:499_0: Natthi etāsaṃ vayo vekallanti avayāti āha “anūnā”ti,
tika-s0404t:499_5: Adhigate hi aggaphale sabbaso rāgādīnaṃ anuppādadhammataṃ pajānāti,
tika-s0404t:504_6: na tādisāni tadaññesaṃ kadācipi uppajjantīti aññehi asādhāraṇānīti.
tika-s0404t:504_8: Imameva hi yathāvuttalesaṃ apekkhitvā tadabhāvato āsayānusayañāṇādīsu eva asādhāraṇasamaññā niruḷhā.
tika-s0404t:505_0: Pakatihatthikulanti giricaranadicaravanacarādippabhedā gocariyakālāvakanāmā sabbāpi balena pākatikā hatthijāti.
tika-s0404t:505_3: Ekassāti ca tathā heṭṭhā kathāyaṃ āgatattā desanāsotena vuttaṃ.
tika-s0404t:505_5: Tā bahū nānāvidhā ito uppajjantīti nārāyanaṃ, vajiraṃ,
tika-s0404t:506_2: tattha pana nidānavagge sattasattati āgatāni catucattārīsañca.
tika-s0404t:506_3: Tesattati pana paṭisambhidāmagge sutamayādīni āgatāni dissanti,
tika-s0404t:506_6: aññattha ca “pubbante ñāṇa”ntiādinā brahmajālādīsu ca “tayidaṃ tathāgato pajānāti ‘imāni diṭṭhiṭṭhānāni
tika-s0404t:506_7: evaṃ gahitānī’ti”ādinā vuttāni anekāni ñāṇappabhedāni saṅgaṇhāti.
tika-s0404t:506_8: Yāthāvappaṭivedhato sayañca akampiyaṃ puggalañca taṃsamaṅginaṃ neyyesu adhibalaṃ karotīti āha “akampiyaṭṭhena upatthambhanaṭṭhena cā”ti.
tika-s0404t:507_5: Idaṃ panāti buddhānaṃ ṭhānaṃ sabbaññutameva vadati.
tika-s0404t:507_6: Tiṭṭhamānovāti avadantopi tiṭṭhamānova paṭijānāti nāmāti attho.
tika-s0404t:508_3: tatra vata maṃ bhayaṃ vā sārajjaṃ vā okkamissatīti nimittametaṃ,
tika-s0404t:508_6: Abhītanādaṃ nadatīti parato dassitañāṇayogena dasabalohanti abhītanādaṃ nadati.
tika-s0404t:509_0: Paṭivedhaniṭṭhattā arahattamaggañāṇaṃ paṭivedhoti “phalakkhaṇe uppannaṃ nāmā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0404t:509_1: Tena paṭiladdhassapi desanāñāṇassa kiccanipphatti parassa avabujjhanamattena hotīti “aññāsikoṇḍaññassa sotāpattiphalakkhaṇe pavattaṃ nāmā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0404t:509_2: Tato paraṃ pana yāva parinibbānā desanāñāṇapavatti tasseva pavattitassa dhammacakkassa ṭhānanti veditabbaṃ
tika-s0404t:510_4: na gatinivattīti āha “uppajjati ceva pavattati cā”ti.
tika-s0404t:511_1: tāni pana samādiyitvā katāni hontīti āha “samādiyitvā katāna”nti.
tika-s0404t:511_2: Kammameva vā kammasamādānanti etena samādānasaddassa apubbatthābhāvaṃ dasseti muttagatasadde gatasaddassa viya.
tika-s0404t:512_4: Bahūsupi manussesu ekameva pāṇaṃ ghātentesu kāmaṃ sabbesampi cetanā tassevekassa jīvitindriyārammaṇā,
tika-s0404t:512_6: Tesu hi eko ādarena chandajāto karoti,
tika-s0404t:512_7: eko “ehi tvampi karohī”ti parehi nippīḷito karoti,
tika-s0404t:512_8: eko samānacchando viya hutvā appaṭibāhamāno vicarati.
tika-s0404t:512_9: Tesu eko teneva kammena niraye nibbattati,
tika-s0404t:512_12: Taṃ tathāgato āyūhanakkhaṇeyeva “iminā nīhārena āyūhitattā esa niraye nibbattissati,
tika-s0404t:512_24: Tesu ca kammesu “idaṃ kammaṃ paṭisandhiṃ ākaḍḍhissati,
tika-s0404t:512_25: idaṃ aññena dinnāya paṭisandhiyā upadhivepakkaṃ bhavissatī”ti jānāti.
tika-s0404t:513_0: Tathā sakalagāmavāsikesu ekato piṇḍapātaṃ dadamānesu kāmaṃ sabbesampi cetanā piṇḍapātārammaṇāva,
tika-s0404t:513_2: Tesu hi eko ādarena karotīti sabbaṃ purimasadisaṃ,
tika-s0404t:513_18: esa bhummadevesū”tiādinā tattha tattha hīnapaṇītasuvaṇṇadubbaṇṇaappaparivāramahāparivāratādibhedaṃ taṃ taṃ visesaṃ āyūhanakkhaṇeyeva jānāti.
tika-s0404t:514_0: Tathā vipassanaṃ paṭṭhapentesuyeva “iminā nīhārena esa kiñci sallakkhetuṃ na sakkhissati,
tika-s0404t:514_14: esa jhānaṃ pādakaṃ katvā vipassanaṃ paṭṭhapetvā arahattaṃ gaṇhissatī”ti jānāti.
tika-s0404t:515_0: Kāmanato kāmetabbato kāmappaṭisaṃyuttato ca dhātu kāmadhātu. Ādi-
tika-s0404t:515_3: Khandhāyatanadhātulokanti anekadhātuṃ nānādhātuṃ khandhalokaṃ āyatanalokaṃ dhātulokaṃ yathābhūtaṃ pajānātīti yojanā.
tika-s0404t:515_21: dve cātubhūmakā”tiādinā dhātulokassa anekasabhāvaṃ nānāsabhāvañca pajānāti.
tika-s0404t:515_23: atha kho anupādinnakasaṅkhāralokassapi “imāya nāma dhātuyā ussannattā imassa rukkhassa khandho seto,
tika-s0404t:515_30: imassa pupphaṃ nīlaṃ pītaṃ lohitaṃ odātaṃ sugandhaṃ duggandhaṃ,
tika-s0404t:515_31: imassa phalaṃ khuddakaṃ mahantaṃ dīghaṃ vaṭṭaṃ susaṇṭhānaṃ dussaṇṭhānaṃ maṭṭhaṃ pharusaṃ sugandhaṃ duggandhaṃ
tika-s0404t:515_33: imassa kaṇṭako tikhiṇo kuṇṭho ujuko kuṭilo tambo kāḷo odāto hotī”tiādinā pajānāti.
tika-s0404t:516_2: So pana hīnapaṇītatāsāmaññena pāḷiyaṃ dvidhāva vuttopi hīnapaṇītādibhedena anekavidhoti āha “hīnādīhi adhimuttīhi nānādhimuttikabhāva”nti.
tika-s0404t:516_4: te te taṃtadadhimuttike eva sevanti bhajanti payirupāsanti dhātusabhāgato.
tika-s0404t:516_9: Taṃ nesaṃ nānādhimuttikataṃ bhagavā yathābhūtaṃ pajānātīti.
tika-s0404t:517_0: Vuddhiṃ hāniñcāti paccayavisesena sāmatthiyato adhikataṃ anadhikatañca.
tika-s0404t:517_3: Āsayajānanādinā yehi indriyehi paroparehi sattā kalyāṇapāpāsayādikā honti,
tika-s0404t:517_11: Taṃ pana bhagavā sattānaṃ āsayaṃ jānanto tesaṃ tesaṃ diṭṭhigatānaṃ vipassanāmaggañāṇānañca appavattikkhaṇepi jānāti.
tika-s0404t:519_0: Paṭhamādīnaṃ catunnaṃ jhānānanti rūpāvacarānaṃ paṭhamādīnaṃ paccanīkajjhāpanaṭṭhena ārammaṇūpanijjhāpanaṭṭhena ca jhānānaṃ.
tika-s0404t:519_2: Aṭṭhannaṃ vimokkhānanti ettha paṭipāṭiyā satta appitappitakkhaṇe paccanīkadhammehi vimuccanato ārammaṇe ca adhimuccanato vimokkhā nāma.
tika-s0404t:519_3: Aṭṭhamo pana sabbaso saññāvedayitehi vimuttattā apagamavimokkho nāma.
tika-s0404t:519_6: Nayadvayepi upari tīsu jhānesu samādhi avitakkaavicāro.
tika-s0404t:519_10: Hānabhāgiyadhammanti appaguṇehi paṭhamajjhānādīhi vuṭṭhitassa saññāmanasikārānaṃ kāmādianupakkhandanaṃ.
tika-s0404t:519_11: Visesabhāgiyadhammanti paguṇehi paṭhamajjhānādīhi vuṭṭhitassa saññāmanasikārānaṃ dutiyajjhānādipakkhandanaṃ.
tika-s0404t:519_12: Iti saññāmanasikārānaṃ kāmādidutiyajjhānādipakkhandanāni hānabhāgiyavisesabhāgiyā dhammāti dassitāni.
tika-s0404t:519_13: Tehi pana jhānānaṃ taṃsabhāvatā ca dhammasaddena vuttā.
tika-s0404t:519_16: Tañhi paṭhamajjhānādīhi vuṭṭhahitvā dutiyajjhānādiadhigamassa paccayattā “vuṭṭhāna”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0404t:519_17: Keci pana “nirodhato phalasamāpattiyā vuṭṭhānanti pāḷi natthī”ti vadanti.
tika-s0404t:519_18: Te “nirodhā vuṭṭhahantassa nevasaññānāsaññāyatanaṃ phalasamāpattiyā anantarapaccayena paccayo”ti imāya pāḷiyā paṭisedhetabbā.
tika-s0404t:519_20: kammaṭṭhānaṃ samānaṃ eva “na kammaṭṭhāna”nti saññī hoti,
tika-s0404t:520_0: Na tathā daṭṭhabbanti yathā paravādinā vuttaṃ,
tika-s0404t:520_2: Sakasakakiccameva jānātīti ṭhānāṭṭhānajānanādisakasakameva kiccaṃ kātuṃ jānāti,
tika-s0404t:520_9: “Imāya nāma dhātuyā ussannattā”tiādinā tathā ceva saṃvaṇṇitaṃ.
tika-s0404t:520_11: Appetuṃ na sakkoti aṭṭhamanavamabalāni viya taṃsadisaṃ,
tika-s0404t:520_15: Yadipi hi jhānādipaccavekkhaṇañāṇaṃ sattamabalanti tassa savitakkasavicāratā vuttā,
tika-s0404t:520_16: tathāpi jhānādīhi vinā paccavekkhaṇā natthīti jhānādisahagataṃ ñāṇaṃ tadantogadhaṃ katvā evaṃ vuttanti veditabbaṃ.
tika-s0404t:520_17: Atha vā sabbaññutaññāṇaṃ jhānādikiccaṃ viya na sabbaṃ balakiccaṃ kātuṃ sakkotīti dassetuṃ “jhānaṃ hutvā appetuṃ,
tika-s0404t:520_18: iddhi hutvā vikubbituñca na sakkotī”ti vuttaṃ,
tika-s0404t:520_19: na pana kassaci balassa jhānaiddhibhāvatoti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0404t:521_0: Evaṃ kiccavisesavasenapi dasabalañāṇasabbaññutaññāṇavisesaṃ dassetvā idāni vitakkattikabhūmantaravasenapi taṃ dassetuṃ “apicā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0404t:522_4: Anadhigamassa pana tadubhayampi yathākkamaṃ aṭṭhānaṃ ṭhānañcāti tattha kāraṇaṃ dassento “lokiya…pe…
tika-s0404t:522_6: Tattha lokiyasammādiṭṭhiyā ṭhiti āsavakkhayādhigamassa ṭhānaṃ kilesāvaraṇābhāvassa kāraṇattā.
tika-s0404t:522_7: Sā hi tasmiṃ sati na hoti,
tika-s0404t:522_9: Etena tassā aṭṭhitiyā tassa aṭṭhānatā vuttā eva.
tika-s0404t:522_21: Buddhānaṃ pana yadipi āsavakkhayañāṇādhigamato pageva dibbacakkhuñāṇādhigamo,
tika-s0404t:522_23: Sesābhiññāttaye cetopariyañāṇaṃ dibbacakkhuñāṇādhigamena pattanti ca vattabbataṃ labhatīti tathā vuttanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0404t:525_2: Dāsādīsu sirivaḍḍhakādisaddā viya vacanamattameva adhikāraṃ katvā pavattiyā adhivacanaṃ paññatti.
tika-s0404t:528_3: asubhanimittādīsu viya ekadese aṭṭhatvā anavasesato gahetabbaṭṭhenāti attho.
tika-s0404t:528_4: Tadārammaṇānaṃ dhammānanti taṃ kasiṇaṃ ārabbha pavattanakadhammānaṃ.
tika-s0404t:528_10: Paricchinditvāti idaṃ “uddhaṃ adho tiriya”nti etthāpi yojetabbaṃ.
tika-s0404t:528_11: Paricchinditvā eva hi sabbattha kasiṇaṃ vaḍḍhetabbaṃ.
tika-s0404t:528_12: Tena tena vā kāraṇenāti tena tena upariādīsu kasiṇavaḍḍhanakāraṇena.
tika-s0404t:528_14: Yathā dibbacakkhunā uddhaṃ ce rūpaṃ daṭṭhukāmo,
tika-s0404t:528_15: uddhaṃ ālokaṃ pasāreti. Adho ce, adho.
tika-s0404t:528_22: Na hi aññena pasāritakasiṇaṃ tato aññena pasāritakasiṇabhāvaṃ upagacchati,
tika-s0404t:528_25: Na hi udakena ṭhitaṭṭhāne sasambhārapathavī atthi.
tika-s0404t:529_0: Ekadese aṭṭhatvā anavasesapharaṇaṃ pamāṇassa aggahaṇato appamāṇaṃ.
tika-s0404t:529_3: Tattha cetasā pharantoti bhāvanācittena ārammaṇaṃ karonto.
tika-s0404t:529_4: Bhāvanācittañhi kasiṇaṃ parittaṃ vā vipulaṃ vā sakalameva manasi karoti,
tika-s0404t:529_11: Evaṃ yattakaṃ ṭhānaṃ ākāsaṃ hutvā upaṭṭhitaṃ,
tika-s0404t:529_12: tattakaṃ sakalameva pharitvā viññāṇassa pavattanato āgamanavasena viññāṇakasiṇepi uddhaṃadhotiriyatā
tika-s0404t:529_13: vuttāti āha “kasiṇugghāṭimākāsavasena tattha pavattaviññāṇe uddhaṃadhotiriyatā veditabbā”ti.
tika-s0404t:532_4: Sā hi kilesasenā accharāsaṅghātasabhāvāpi paṭipatthayamānā piyāyitabbaicchitabbarūpasabhāvato piyarūpasātarūpā nāma attano kiccavasena.
tika-s0404t:532_5: Ahaṃ ekova jhāyantoti ahaṃ gaṇasaṅgaṇikāya kilesasaṅgaṇikāya ca abhāvato eko asahāyo lakkhaṇūpanijjhānena jhāyanto.
tika-s0404t:532_8: piyarūpaṃ sātarūpaṃ senaṃ jinitvā ahaṃ ekova jhāyanto “atthassa pattiṃ hadayassa santi”nti saṅkhaṃ gataṃ arahattasukhaṃ paṭivijjhiṃ,
tika-s0404t:532_10: teneva ca me kāraṇena kenaci saddhiṃ sakkhī na sampajjatīti.
tika-s0404t:535_4: Na ceva sampāyissantīti na ceva sammadeva pakārehi gahessanti ñāpessanti.
tika-s0404t:535_8: Aññathā ārādhanaṃ nāma natthīti iminā sapaccayanāmarūpānaṃ yāthāvato avabodho eva ito bāhirakānaṃ natthi,
tika-s0404t:536_2: Eko uddesoti ekaṃ uddisanaṃ atthassa saṃkhittavacanaṃ.
tika-s0404t:536_4: Hetunāti “antavantato anaccantikato tāvakālikato niccappaṭikkhepato”ti evamādinā nayena yathā ime saṅkhārā etarahi,
tika-s0404t:536_5: evaṃ atīte anāgate ca aniccā saṅkhatā paṭiccasamuppannā khayadhammā vayadhammā virāgadhammāti atītānāgatesu nayena.
tika-s0404t:537_1: Te pana bhavabhedato saṅkhepeneva bhinditvā dassento “kāmabhavādīsū”tiādimāha.
tika-s0404t:537_2: Byadhikaraṇānampi bāhiratthasamāso hoti yathā “urasilomo”ti āha “āhārato ṭhiti etesanti āhāraṭṭhitikā”ti.
tika-s0404t:537_4: āhāro ṭhiti etesanti āhāraṭṭhitikāti evaṃ vā ettha samāsaviggaho daṭṭhabbo.
tika-s0404t:537_7: Paccayattho hettha āhārasaddo “ayamāhāro anuppannassa vā kāmacchandassa uppādāyā”tiādīsu viya.
tika-s0404t:537_8: Evañhi “sabbe sattā”ti iminā asaññasattā pariggahitā honti.
tika-s0404t:537_16: bhikkhu sammā nibbindamāno sammā virajjamāno sammā vimuccamāno sammā pariyantadassāvī sammadatthaṃ abhisamecca diṭṭheva dhamme dukkhassantakaro hoti.
tika-s0404t:537_19: Yvāyaṃ puggalādhiṭṭhānāya kathāya sabbesaṃ saṅkhārānaṃ paccayāyattavuttitāya āhārapariyāyena sāmaññato paccayadhammo vutto,
tika-s0404t:538_0: Codako vuttampi atthaṃ yāthāvato appaṭivijjhamāno neyyatthaṃ suttapadaṃ nītatthato dahanto “sabbe sattā”ti vacanamatte ṭhatvā “nanu cā”tiādinā codeti.
tika-s0404t:538_1: Ācariyo aviparītaṃ tattha yathādhippetamatthaṃ pavedento “na virujjhatī”ti vatvā “tesañhi jhānaṃ āhāro hotī”ti āha.
tika-s0404t:538_3: Pāḷiyaṃ pana “anāhārā”ti vacanaṃ asaññabhave catunnaṃ āhārānaṃ abhāvaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ,
tika-s0404t:538_5: Evaṃ santepīti idaṃ sāsane yesu dhammesu visesato āhārasaddo niruḷho,
tika-s0404t:538_9: imāya āhārapāḷiyā virodho āpannoti dassetuṃ āraddhaṃ.
tika-s0404t:538_13: Yathā hi kabaḷīkārāhāro ojaṭṭhamakarūpāharaṇena rūpakāyaṃ upatthambhenti,
tika-s0404t:538_15: tasmā satipi janakabhāve upatthambhakabhāvo ojādīsu sātisayo labbhamāno mukhyo āhāraṭṭhoti te eva nippariyāyena āhāralakkhaṇā dhammā vuttā.
tika-s0404t:539_0: Idhāti imasmiṃ sutte pariyāyena paccayo āhāroti vutto,
tika-s0404t:539_1: sabbo paccayadhammo attano phalaṃ āharatīti imaṃ pariyāyaṃ labhatīti.
tika-s0404t:539_6: Nippariyāyāhāropi gahitova hotīti yāvatā sopi paccayabhāveneva janako upatthambhako ca hutvā taṃ taṃ phalaṃ āharatīti vattabbataṃ labhatīti.
tika-s0404t:540_1: nippariyāyāhāroti dvīsu āhāresu asaññabhave yadipi nippariyāyāhāro na labbhati,
tika-s0404t:540_3: Idāni tamevatthaṃ vitthārato dassetuṃ “anuppanne hi buddhe”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0404t:540_4: Uppanne buddhe titthakaramatanissitānaṃ jhānabhāvanāya asijjhanato “anuppanne buddhe”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0404t:540_5: Sāsanikā tādisaṃ jhānaṃ na nibbattentīti “titthāyatane pabbajitā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0404t:540_6: Titthiyā hi upapattivisese vimuttisaññino saññāvirāgāvirāgesu ādīnavānisaṃsadassinova hutvā asaññasamāpattiṃ nibbattetvā akkhaṇabhūmiyaṃ uppajjanti,
tika-s0404t:540_8: Vāyokasiṇe parikkammaṃ katvāti vāyokasiṇe paṭhamādīni tīṇi jhānāni nibbattetvā tatiyajjhāne ciṇṇavasī
tika-s0404t:540_9: hutvā tato vuṭṭhāya catutthajjhānādhigamāya parikammaṃ katvā.
tika-s0404t:541_0: Kasmā panettha vāyokasiṇeyeva parikammaṃ vuttanti? Vuccate,
tika-s0404t:541_1: yatheva hi rūpapaṭibhāgabhūtesu kasiṇavisesesu rūpavibhāvanena rūpavirāgabhāvanāsaṅkhāto arūpasamāpattiviseso sacchikarīyati,
tika-s0404t:541_2: evaṃ aparibyattaviggahatāya arūpapaṭibhāgabhūte kasiṇavisese arūpavibhāvanena arūpavirāgabhāvanā saṅkhāto rūpasamāpattiviseso adhigamīyatīti.
tika-s0404t:541_6: dhi vatetaṃ citta”ntiādinā ca nayena arūpappavattiyā ādīnavadassanena tadabhāve ca santapaṇītabhāvasanniṭṭhānena
tika-s0404t:541_16: evaṃ arūpavirāgabhāvanāpīti vuccamāne na koci virodho.
tika-s0404t:541_17: Titthiyeheva pana tassā samāpattiyā paṭipajjitabbatāya tesañca visayapathe sūpanibandhanasseva tassa
tika-s0404t:541_18: jhānassa paṭipattito diṭṭhivantehi pubbācariyehi catuttheyeva bhūtakasiṇe arūpavirāgabhāvanāparikammaṃ
tika-s0404t:541_20: Kiñca vaṇṇakasiṇesu viya purimabhūtakasiṇattayepi vaṇṇappaṭicchāyāva paṇṇatti ārammaṇaṃ jhānassa lokavohārānurodheneva pavattito.
tika-s0404t:541_21: Evañca katvā visuddhimagge pathavīkasiṇassa ādāsacandamaṇḍalūpamavacanañca samatthitaṃ hoti,
tika-s0404t:541_22: catutthaṃ pana bhūtakasiṇaṃ bhūtappaṭicchāyameva jhānassa gocarabhāvaṃ gacchatīti tassevaṃ arūpapaṭibhāgatā
tika-s0404t:542_2: Dhi vatetaṃ cittanti etaṃ mama cittaṃ jigucchitaṃ vata hotu.
tika-s0404t:542_8: Khantiṃ ruciṃ uppādetvāti cittassa abhāvo eva sādhu suṭṭhūti imaṃ diṭṭhinijjhānakkhantiṃ tattha ca abhiruciṃ uppādetvā.
tika-s0404t:542_10: Titthāyatane pabbajitasseva tathā jhānabhāvanā hotīti āha “manussaloke”ti.
tika-s0404t:542_11: Paṇihito ahosīti maraṇassa āsannakāle ṭhapito ahosi.
tika-s0404t:542_13: yāva bhedā tenevākārena tiṭṭheyyāti āha “tena iriyāpathenā”tiādi.
tika-s0404t:542_16: Kathaṃ pana acetanānaṃ nesaṃ paccayāhārassa upakappananti codanaṃ sandhāya tattha nidassanaṃ dassento “yathā”tiādimāha.
tika-s0404t:542_19: Tāva tiṭṭhantīti ukkaṃsato pañca mahākappasatāni tiṭṭhanti.
tika-s0404t:543_0: Ye uṭṭhānavīriyena divasaṃ vītināmetvā tassa nissandaphalamattaṃ kiñcideva labhitvā jīvikaṃ kappenti,
tika-s0404t:543_5: puññaphalassa pana lesopi natthīti vuttaṃ “ye pana nerayikā…pe…
tika-s0404t:543_8: na yassa kassaci phalassāti adhippāyena “kiṃ pañca āhārā atthī”ti codeti.
tika-s0404t:543_9: Ācariyo nippariyāyāhāre adhippete “siyā tava codanā avasarā,
tika-s0404t:543_10: sā pana ettha anavasarā”ti ca dassento “pañca,
tika-s0404t:543_11: na pañcāti idaṃ na vattabba”nti vatvā pariyāyāhārasseva panettha adhippetabhāvaṃ dassento “nanu paccayo āhāro’ti vuttameta”nti āha.
tika-s0404t:543_12: Tasmāti yassa kassaci paccayassa āhāroti icchitattā.
tika-s0404t:547_1: Aṭṭhame evaṃnāmaketi kajaṅgalāti evaṃ itthiliṅgavasena laddhanāmake majjhimappadesassa mariyādabhūte nagare.
tika-s0404t:547_9: Nanu ca “eso ceva tassa attho”ti kasmā vuttaṃ.
tika-s0404t:547_19: ariyo aṭṭhaṅgiko maggoti dassitadhammā aññoyevattho bhikkhuniyā dassitoti codanaṃ sandhāyāha “kiñcāpī”tiādi.
tika-s0404t:550_6: Upassutivasena yujjhitabbākāraṃ ñatvāti jetavane kira dattatthero dhanuggahatissattheroti dve mahallakattherā vihārapaccante paṇṇasālāya vasanti.
tika-s0404t:550_7: Tesu dhanuggahatissatthero pacchimayāme pabujjhitvā uṭṭhāya nisinno dattattheraṃ āmantetvā “ayaṃ te mahodaro kosalo bhuttabhattameva pūtiṃ karoti,
tika-s0404t:550_9: parājitotveva vadāpetī”ti vatvā tena “kiṃ pana kātuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti vutte – “bhante,
tika-s0404t:550_10: yuddho nāma padumabyūho cakkabyūho sakaṭabyūhoti tayo byūhā honti,
tika-s0404t:550_11: ajātasattuṃ gaṇhitukāmena asukasmiṃ nāma pabbatakucchismiṃ dvīsu pabbatabhittīsu manusse ṭhapetvā purato
tika-s0404t:550_12: dubbalaṃ dassetvā pabbatantaraṃ paviṭṭhabhāvaṃ jānitvā paviṭṭhamaggaṃ rundhitvā purato ca pacchato ca
tika-s0404t:550_13: ubhosu pabbatabhittīsu vaggitvā naditvā jālapakkhittamacchaṃ viya katvā sakkā gahetu”nti.
tika-s0404t:550_14: Tasmiṃ khaṇe “bhikkhūnaṃ kathāsallāpaṃ suṇāthā”ti rañño pesitacarapurisā taṃ sutvā rañño ārocesuṃ.
tika-s0404t:550_15: Taṃ sutvā rājā saṅgāmabheriṃ paharāpetvā gantvā sakaṭabyūhaṃ katvā ajātasattuṃ jīvaggāhaṃ gaṇhi.
tika-s0404t:551_8: Āyu pālayanti nirogo avedano jīvitaṃ rakkhanto.
tika-s0404t:551_9: Atha vā saṇikaṃ jīratīti so bhojane mattaññū puggalo parimitāhāratāya saṇikaṃ cirena jīrati jaraṃ pāpuṇāti jīvitaṃ pālayanto.
tika-s0404t:552_0: Imaṃ ovādaṃ adāsīti ekasmiṃ kira samaye rājā taṇḍuladoṇassa odanaṃ tadupiyena sūpabyañjanena bhuñjati.
tika-s0404t:552_1: So ekadivasaṃ bhuttapātarāso bhattasammadaṃ avinodetvā satthu santikaṃ gantvā kilantarūpo ito cito ca samparivattati,
tika-s0404t:552_2: niddāya abhibhuyyamānopi lahukaṃ nipajjituṃ asakkonto ekamantaṃ nisīdi.
tika-s0404t:557_3: mattabhojino hi sukhaṃ hotī”ti uttaripi puna ovadanto “manujassa sadā satīmato”ti imaṃ gāthamāha.
tika-s0404t:558_1: samīpe ṭhitaṃ pana bhāgineyyaṃ sudassanaṃ nāma māṇavaṃ “imaṃ gāthaṃ uggaṇha tātā”ti āha.
tika-s0404t:558_5: imaṃ gāthaṃ naṭo viya pattapattaṭṭhāne mā avaca,
tika-s0404t:558_6: rañño pātarāsaṃ bhuñjanaṭṭhāne ṭhatvā paṭhamapiṇḍādīsupi avatvā avasāne piṇḍe gahite vadeyyāsi,
tika-s0404t:558_8: Atha rañño hatthesu dhotesu pātiṃ apanetvā sitthāni gaṇetvā tadupiyaṃ byañjanaṃ ñatvā punadivase tāvatake taṇḍule hāreyyāsi.
tika-s0404t:558_9: Pātarāse ca vatvā sāyamāse mā vadeyyāsī”ti.
tika-s0404t:558_10: So “sādhū”ti paṭissuṇitvā taṃ divasaṃ rañño pātarāsaṃ bhutvā gatattā sāyamāse bhagavato anusiṭṭhiniyāmena gāthaṃ abhāsi.
tika-s0404t:558_11: Rājā dasabalassa vacanaṃ saritvā bhattapiṇḍaṃ pātiyaṃyeva chaḍḍesi.
tika-s0404t:558_12: Rañño hatthesu dhotesu pātiṃ apanetvā sitthāni gaṇetvā punadivase tattake taṇḍule hariṃsu,
tika-s0404t:558_13: sopi māṇavo divase divase tathāgatassa santikaṃ gacchati.
tika-s0404t:558_15: Atha naṃ ekadivasaṃ pucchi “rājā kittakaṃ bhuñjatī”ti?
tika-s0404t:558_21: Rattaññutāya vaḍḍhitaṃ sīlaṃ assa atthīti vaḍḍhitasīlo.
tika-s0404t:558_22: Apothujjanikehi sīlehīti catupārisuddhisīlehi sīlaṃ ariyaṃ suddhaṃ.
tika-s0404t:563_4: dasa atthe dasa kāraṇānīti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-s0404t:563_5: Atha vā attho phalaṃ tadadhīnavuttitāya vaso etassāti atthavaso,
tika-s0404t:563_8: tesaṃ taṃ assa dīgharattaṃ hitāya sukhāyā”ti vuttattā “yo ca tathāgatassa vacanaṃ sampaṭicchati,
tika-s0404t:563_9: tassa taṃ dīgharattaṃ hitāya sukhāya saṃvattatī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0404t:563_10: Asampaṭicchane ādīnavanti bhaddālisutte viya asampaṭicchane ādīnavaṃ dassetvā.
tika-s0404t:563_11: Sukhavihārābhāve sahajīvamānassa abhāvato sahajīvitāpi sukhavihārova vutto.
tika-s0404t:565_5: Saṅghakammānīti satipi uposathapavāraṇānaṃ saṅghakammabhāve gobalībaddañāyena uposathaṃ pavāraṇañca ṭhapetvā
tika-s0404t:566_1: diṭṭhadhammikānaṃyeva āsavānaṃ saṃvarāya dhammaṃ desemī”ti ettha vivādamūlabhūtā kilesā āsavāti āgatā.
tika-s0404t:569_0: Te mayhaṃ āsavā khīṇā, viddhastā vinaḷīkatā”ti. –
tika-s0404t:570_0: Ettha tebhūmakaṃ kammaṃ avasesā ca akusalā dhammā.
tika-s0404t:570_1: Idha pana parūpavādavippaṭisāravadhabandhādayo ceva apāyadukkhabhūtā ca nānappakārā upaddavā āsavāti
tika-s0404t:570_3: Yadi hi bhagavā sikkhāpadaṃ na ca paññapeyya,
tika-s0404t:570_4: tato asaddhammappaṭisevanaadinnādānapāṇātipātādihetu ye uppajjeyyuṃ parūpavādādayo diṭṭhadhammikā nānappakārā anatthā,
tika-s0404t:570_5: ye ca tannimittameva nirayādīsu nibbattassa pañcavidhabandhanakammakāraṇādivasena mahādukkhānubhavanappakārā anatthā,
tika-s0404t:570_6: te sandhāya idaṃ vuttaṃ “diṭṭhadhammikānaṃ āsavānaṃ saṃvarāya samparāyikānaṃ āsavānaṃ paṭighātāyā”ti.
tika-s0404t:570_12: Atha vā sammukhā parammukhā garahanaṃ akitti,
tika-s0404t:572_5: Yathāsakaṃ saṃvaritabbānaṃ vinetabbānañca kāyaduccaritādīnaṃ saṃvaraṇato saṃvaro,
tika-s0404t:572_10: nissaraṇappahānanti pañcavidhaṃ pahānaṃ yasmā cāgaṭṭhena pahānaṃ,
tika-s0404t:572_15: Sikkhāpadapaññattiyā hi vijjamānāya eva sikkhāpadasambhavato paññattivinayopi sikkhāpadapaññattiyā anuggahito hoti.
tika-s0404t:577_2: Chaṭṭhe khaṇabhaṅguratāya na niccā na dhuvāti aniccā.
tika-s0404t:577_3: Tato eva paṇḍitehi na iccā na upagantabbātipi aniccā.
tika-s0404t:577_4: Svāyaṃ nesaṃ aniccaṭṭho udayavayaparicchinnatāya veditabboti āha “hutvā abhāvino”ti,
tika-s0404t:577_8: ekaṃsena asubhādisabhāvā te bālānaṃ subhādibhāvena upaṭṭhahanti,
tika-s0404t:577_11: Na passanasabhāvāti khaṇapabhaṅguratāittarapaccupaṭṭhānatāya dissamānā viya hutvā adassanapakatikā.
tika-s0404t:577_12: Ete hi khettaṃ viya vatthu viya hiraññasuvaṇṇaṃ viya ca paññāyitvāpi katipāheneva supinake diṭṭhā viya na paññāyanti.
tika-s0404t:587_7: Jaṅgaladesavāsīnañhi anūpadese vasantānaṃ visabhāgo ca utu uppajjati,
tika-s0404t:587_8: anūpadesavāsīnañca jaṅgaladeseti evaṃ parasamuddatīrādivasenapi utuvisabhāgatā uppajjatiyeva.
tika-s0404t:587_10: Attano pakaticariyānaṃ visayānaṃ visamaṃ kāyapariharaṇavasena jātā visamaparihārajā.
tika-s0404t:587_14: Bāhiraṃ paccayaṃ anapekkhitvā kevalaṃ kammavipākatova jātā kammavipākajā.
tika-s0404t:587_15: Tattha purimehi sattahi kāraṇehi uppannā sārīrikā vedanā sakkā paṭibāhituṃ,
tika-s0404t:587_16: kammavipākajānaṃ pana sabbabhesajjānipi sabbaparittānipi nālaṃ paṭighātāya.
tika-s0404t:592_3: Pubbe kira amhākaṃ bodhisatto kapiyoniyaṃ nibbatto mahākāyo kapirājā hutvā anekasatavānarasahassaparivuto pabbatapāde vicari,
tika-s0404t:592_11: Te apītapubbaṃ disvā sahasāva apivitvā samantā paridhāvitvā mahāsattassa āgamanaṃ olokayamānā nisīdiṃsu.
tika-s0404t:592_15: tātā”ti samantā padaṃ pariyesamāno otiṇṇapadaṃyeva addasa,
tika-s0404t:592_18: Tāvadeva ca tattha abhinibbattaamanusso udakaṃ dvedhā katvā uṭṭhāsi –
tika-s0404t:592_36: Evaṃ sante ekampi vānaraṃ na muñcissanti.
tika-s0404t:592_38: na ca te vasaṃ gamissāmā”ti naḷaṃ āharāpetvā koṭiyaṃ gahetvā dhami.
tika-s0404t:592_41: Sesavānarānampi pāṭiyekkaṃ naḷaṃ āharāpetvā dhamitvā adāsi.
tika-s0404t:594_0: Naḷena vāriṃ pissāma, neva maṃ tvaṃ vadhissasī”ti. ;
tika-s0404t:595_0: Tato paṭṭhāya yāva ajjadivasā tasmiṃ ṭhāne naḷā ekacchiddāva honti.
tika-s0404t:595_1: Imasmiñhi kappe kappaṭṭhiyapāṭihāriyāni nāma cande sasalakkhaṇaṃ,
tika-s0404t:595_5: Iti sā pokkharaṇī naḷena pānīyassa pivitattā “naḷakapānakā”ti nāmaṃ labhi.
tika-s0404t:595_6: Aparabhāge taṃ pokkharaṇiṃ nissāya nigamo patiṭṭhāsi,
tika-s0404t:596_0: Tuṇhībhūtaṃ tuṇhībhūtanti byāpanicchāyaṃ idaṃ āmeḍitavacananti dassetuṃ “yaṃ yaṃ disa”ntiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0404t:596_2: saddo “parī”ti iminā samānatthoti āha “tato tato viloketvā”ti.
tika-s0404t:596_3: Kasmā āgilāyati koṭisahassahatthināgānaṃ balaṃ dhārentassāti codakassa adhippāyo.
tika-s0404t:596_8: Dukkhasabhāvesu tesu satthukāye dukkhuppattiyā ayaṃ paccayo”ti dassetuṃ “bhagavato”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0404t:596_12: yena aparimāṇakālaṃ sakkaccaṃ upacitavipulapuññasambhāro satthā evarūpaṃ dukkhavipākamanubhavatī”ti? Vuccate –
tika-s0404t:596_13: ayameva bhagavā bodhisattabhūto atītajātiyaṃ mallaputto hutvā pāpajanasevī ayonisomanasikārabahulo carati.
tika-s0404t:596_14: So ekadivasaṃ nibbuddhe vattamāne ekaṃ mallaputtaṃ gahetvā gāḷhataraṃ nippīḷesi.
tika-s0404t:596_15: Tena kammena idāni buddho hutvāpi dukkhamanubhavi.
tika-s0404t:596_17: evaṃ ciñcamāṇavikādīnamitthīnaṃ yāni bhagavato abbhakkhānādīni dukkhāni,
tika-s0404t:601_0: “Suṇātha bhikkhavo mayhaṃ, yaṃ kammaṃ pakataṃ mayā;
tika-s0404t:612_0: Taṃ abbhakkhāya niraye, ciraṃ saṃsaritaṃ mayā.
tika-s0404t:647_0: Pāde chaviṃ pakappesi, na hi kammaṃ vinassati.
tika-s0404t:652_0: Sabbe sakkā ca haññiṃsu, yadā hani viṭaṭūbho.
tika-s0404t:655_0: Yavaṃ khādatha bhuñjatha, mā ca bhuñjatha sālayo.
tika-s0404t:666_0: Kuto nu bodhi muṇḍassa, bodhi paramadullabhā.
tika-s0404t:677_1: Navame duggatito saṃsārato ca niyyāti etenāti niyyānaṃ,
tika-s0404t:677_6: niyyānaṃ vā phalabhūtaṃ etissā atthīti niyyānikā.
tika-s0404t:678_3: Sā panesā kathā “evarūpā navasurā pītā ratijananī hotī”ti assādavasena na vaṭṭati,
tika-s0404t:678_8: Visikhāgahaṇena ca tannivāsino gahitā “gāmo āgato”tiādīsu viya.
tika-s0404t:679_6: pattānaṃ kāḷattā kāḷoti pana vattabbo”ti evamādikā. Ādi-
tika-s0404t:679_8: yaṃ yo koci tiriyāmānā katattā”ti evamādīnaṃ saṅgaho daṭṭhabbo.
tika-s0404t:679_10: Khatoti etaṃ ekavacanaṃ tehi paccekaṃ khatattā “sāgaradevena khatattā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0404t:679_19: abhavoti attakilamathoti iti imāya chabbidhāya itibhavābhavakathāya saddhiṃ bāttiṃsa tiracchānakathā nāma honti.
tika-s0404t:679_20: Atha vā pāḷiyaṃ sarūpato anāgatāpi araññapabbatanadīdīpakathā itisaddena saṅgaṇhitvā bāttiṃsa tiracchānakathā vuttā.
tika-s0404t:684_1: Tatiyassa paṭhame sīlassa anavasesasamādānena akhaṇḍādibhāvāpattiyā ca paripuṇṇasīlā.
tika-s0404t:684_11: Idha niddese viya uddesepi pātimokkhasaṃvaro bhagavatā vutto “sampannasīlā”ti vuttattāti adhippāyo.
tika-s0404t:684_14: Tattha avadhāraṇena itaresaṃ tiṇṇaṃ ekadesena pātimokkhantogadhataṃ dīpeti.
tika-s0404t:684_15: Tathā hi anolokiyolokane ājīvahetu chasikkhāpadavītikkame gilānapaccayassa apaccavekkhitaparibhoge ca āpatti vihitāti.
tika-s0404t:684_17: Sīlanti vuttaṭṭhānaṃ nāma atthīti sīlapariyāyena tesaṃ katthaci sutte gahitaṭṭhānaṃ nāma kiṃ atthi yathā
tika-s0404t:684_18: pātimokkhasaṃvaroti ācariyassa sammukhattā appaṭikkhipantova upacārena pucchanto viya vadati.
tika-s0404t:684_24: Idamatthanti idaṃ payojanaṃ imassa paccayassa paribhuñjaneti adhippāyo.
tika-s0404t:684_25: Nippariyāyenāti iminā indriyasaṃvarādīni tīṇi padhānassa sīlassa parivāravasena pavattiyā pariyāyasīlāni nāmāti dasseti.
tika-s0404t:685_0: Idāni pātimokkhasaṃvarasseva padhānabhāvaṃ byatirekato anvayato ca upamāya vibhāvetuṃ “yassā”tiādimāha.
tika-s0404t:685_3: Tasse vāti “sampannasīlā”ti ettha yaṃ sīlaṃ vuttaṃ, tasseva.
tika-s0404t:685_4: Sampannapātimokkhāti ettha pātimokkhaggahaṇena vevacanaṃ vatvā taṃ vitthāretvā…pe… ādimāha.
tika-s0404t:685_5: Yathā aññatthāpi “idha bhikkhu sīlavā hotī”ti puggalādhiṭṭhānāya desanāya uddiṭṭhaṃ sīlaṃ “pātimokkhasaṃvarasaṃvuto viharatī”ti niddiṭṭhaṃ.
tika-s0404t:685_8: “Sīlānisaṃsadassanattha”nti hi ettha byatirekato yaṃ sīlānisaṃsassa adassanaṃ,
tika-s0404t:685_9: taṃ imissā desanāya kāraṇanti kasmā āraddhanti?
tika-s0404t:685_10: Veneyyānaṃ sīlānisaṃsassa adassanatoti atthato āpanno eva hoti.
tika-s0404t:685_12: Sīlānisaṃsadassanatthanti pana imassa atthaṃ vivarituṃ “tesa”ntiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0404t:685_14: “Sīlavā sīlasampanno kāyassa bhedā paraṃ maraṇā sugatiṃ saggaṃ lokaṃ upapajjatī”tiādīsu pana vipākaphalampi “ānisaṃso”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0404t:685_17: Vijjamānopi guṇo yāthāvato vibhāvito eva abhiruciṃ uppādeti,
tika-s0404t:685_19: tasmā ekantato ānisaṃsakittanaṃ icchitabbamevāti dassetuṃ “appeva nāmā”tiādimāha.
tika-s0404t:686_1: Piyassa nāma dassanaṃ ekantato abhinanditabbaṃ hotīti āha “piyacakkhūhi sampassitabbo”ti.
tika-s0404t:686_4: Manavaḍḍhanakoti pītimanassa paribrūhanato uparūpari pīticittasseva uppādanako.
tika-s0404t:686_7: Yathā vā aññe ajānantāpi jānantā viya pavattanti,
tika-s0404t:686_10: Passaṃ passatīti dassanabhūtena paññācakkhunā passitabbaṃ passati,
tika-s0404t:686_12: Evaṃ sambhāvanīyoti evaṃ viññutāya paṇḍitabhāvena sambhāvetabbo.
tika-s0404t:686_13: Sīlesvevassa paripūrakārīti sīlesu paripūrakārī eva bhaveyyāti.
tika-s0404t:686_15: Evañhi iminā padena uparisikkhādvayaṃ anivattitameva hoti.
tika-s0404t:686_16: Yathā pana sīlesu paripūrakārī nāma hoti,
tika-s0404t:686_22: Evañca katvā uparisikkhādvayaṃ sīlassa sambhārabhāvena gahitanti sīlassevettha padhānaggahaṇaṃ siddhaṃ hoti.
tika-s0404t:687_0: Ajjhattanti vā attanoti vā ekaṃ ekatthaṃ,
tika-s0404t:687_3: “samatha”nti upayogavacanaṃ “anū”ti iminā upasaggena yoge siddhanti āha “attano cittasamathe yutto”ti.
tika-s0404t:687_10: Yo pana īdiso ahutvā jhānaṃ upasampajja viharati,
tika-s0404t:688_7: Suññāgāragato bhikkhu tattha laddhakāyavivekatāya samathavipassanāvasena cittavivekaṃ paribrūhento yathānusiṭṭhapaṭipattiyā
tika-s0404t:688_8: lokaṃ sāsanañca attano visesādhigamaṭṭhānabhūtaṃ suññāgārañca upasobhayamāno guṇavisesādhiṭṭhānabhāvāpādanena
tika-s0404t:688_9: viññūnaṃ atthato taṃ brūhento nāma hotīti vuttaṃ “brūhetā suññāgārāna”nti.
tika-s0404t:688_11: Ekabhūmakādipāsāde kurumānopi pana neva suññāgārānaṃ brūhetāti daṭṭhabbo.
tika-s0404t:688_12: Suññāgāraggahaṇena cettha araññarukkhamūlādi sabbaṃ padhānānuyogakkhamaṃ senāsanaṃ gahitanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0404t:689_0: Ettāvatā yathā taṇhāvicaritadesanā paṭhamaṃ taṇhāvasena āraddhāpi taṇhāpadaṭṭhānattā mānadiṭṭhīnaṃ mānadiṭṭhiyo
tika-s0404t:689_2: evamayaṃ desanā paṭhamaṃ adhisīlasikkhāvasena āraddhāpi sīlapadaṭṭhānattā samathavipassanānaṃ samathavipassanāyo
tika-s0404t:689_4: Ettha hi “sīlesvevassa paripūrakārī”ti ettāvatā adhisīlasikkhā vuttā,
tika-s0404t:689_7: “Brūhetā suññāgārāna”nti iminā pana samathavasena suññāgāravaḍḍhane adhicittasikkhā,
tika-s0404t:689_8: vipassanāvasena adhipaññāsikkhāti evaṃ dvepi sikkhā saṅgahetvā vuttā.
tika-s0404t:689_9: Ettha ca “ajjhattaṃ cetosamathamanuyutto anirākatajjhāno”ti imehi padehi sīlānurakkhikā eva cittekaggatā kathitā,
tika-s0404t:690_3: so byādhivihato vikkhittacitto sīlaṃ vināsetvāpi byādhivūpasamaṃ kattā hoti.
tika-s0404t:690_5: so taṃ byādhidukkhaṃ vikkhambhetvā samāpattiṃ samāpajjati,
tika-s0404t:690_11: tassa “mama rūpaṃ mama viññāṇa”nti attabhāve balavamamattaṃ hoti,
tika-s0404t:690_12: so tathārūpesu dubbhikkhabyādhibhayādīsu sampattesu sīlaṃ nāsetvāpi attabhāvaṃ posetā hoti.
tika-s0404t:690_14: tassa attabhāve balavamamattaṃ vā sineho vā na hoti,
tika-s0404t:690_15: so tathārūpesu dubbhikkhabyādhibhayādīsu sampattesu sacepissa antāni bahi nikkhamanti,
tika-s0404t:690_18: neva sīlaṃ vināsetvā attabhāvaṃ posetā hoti.
tika-s0404t:691_0: “Brūhetā suññāgārāna”nti iminā pana tasseva ubhayassa brūhanā vaḍḍhanā sātaccakiriyā dassitā.
tika-s0404t:691_2: bhāvanīyo cā”ti ime cattāro dhamme ākaṅkhantena natthaññaṃ kiñci kātabbaṃ,
tika-s0404t:691_4: Īdiso hi sabrahmacārīnaṃ piyo hoti manāpo garu bhāvanīyo.
tika-s0404t:693_0: Attano kamma kubbānaṃ, taṃ jano kurute piya”nti. ;
tika-s0404t:694_4: suññāgārāna”nti vatvā idāni yasmā paccayalābhādiṃ patthayantenapi idameva karaṇīyaṃ,
tika-s0404t:694_9: Lābhī assanti lābhāsāya saṃvarasīlaparipūraṇaṃ pāḷiyaṃ āgataṃ.
tika-s0404t:694_12: mahākāruṇikatāya pana puggalajjhāsayena evaṃ vuttanti dassento “na bhagavā”tiādimāha.
tika-s0404t:694_14: na vācaṃ payuttaṃ bhaṇeti chinnakatho mūgo viya hutvā obhāsaparikathānimittaviññattipayuttaṃ ghāsesanaṃ vācaṃ na bhaṇe,
tika-s0404t:695_5: Mahantaṃ vā lokiyasukhaṃ phalanti pasavantīti mahapphalā,
tika-s0404t:696_1: Te pana yasmā idha katakālakiriyā kālena katajīvitupacchedā honti,
tika-s0404t:696_8: Kālakato pitā vā mātā vā petayoniyaṃ uppannoti adhikārato viññāyatīti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0404t:697_1: Na ca maṃ arati saheyyāti maṃ ca arati na abhibhaveyya na maddeyya na ajjhotthareyya.
tika-s0404t:697_3: Sīlādiguṇayutto hi aratiñca ratiñca sahati ajjhottharati,
tika-s0404t:697_5: tasmā īdisamattānaṃ icchantenapi sīlādiguṇayutteneva bhavitabbanti dasseti.
tika-s0404t:697_8: Taṃ duvidhampi bhayaṃ bheravañca sahati abhibhavatīti bhayabheravasaho.
tika-s0404t:698_0: Thero kira maggaṃ paṭipanno aññataraṃ pāsādikaṃ araññaṃ disvā “idhevajja samaṇadhammaṃ katvā gamissāmī”ti
tika-s0404t:698_1: maggā okkamma aññatarasmiṃ rukkhamūle saṅghāṭiṃ paññapetvā pallaṅkaṃ ābhujitvā nisīdi.
tika-s0404t:698_2: Rukkhadevatāya dārakā therassa sīlatejena sakabhāvena saṇṭhātuṃ asakkontā vissaramakaṃsu.
tika-s0404t:698_10: Tvaṃ ete vikāre akāsīti. Āma, bhanteti.
tika-s0404t:698_12: sīlatejena dārakā sakabhāvena saṇṭhātuṃ asakkontā vissaramakaṃsu,
tika-s0404t:698_17: idāni pana mā maṃ kiñci avaca,
tika-s0404t:698_20: tvaṃ pana ajjekadivasaṃ yattha katthaci vasāhī”ti.
tika-s0404t:698_22: tasmā īdisamattānaṃ icchantenapi sīlādiguṇayutteneva bhavitabbanti dasseti.
tika-s0404t:701_1: Pañcame imassa hi puggalassa sīlavirahitassa paññā sīlaṃ paridhovatīti akhaṇḍādibhāvāpādanena sīlaṃ ādimajjhapariyosānesu paññāya suvisodhitaṃ karoti.
tika-s0404t:701_3: ugghaṭitaññutāya pana cātuppadikagāthāpariyosāne paññāya sīlaṃ dhovitvā saha paṭisambhidāhi arahattaṃ pāpuṇāti,
tika-s0404t:701_4: ayaṃ paññāya sīlaṃ dhovati nāma seyyathāpi santatimahāmatto.
tika-s0404t:702_1: Yassa hi puthujjanassa sīlaṃ saṭṭhiasītivassāni akhaṇḍaṃ hoti,
tika-s0404t:702_2: so maraṇakālepi sabbakilese ghātetvā sīlena paññaṃ dhovitvā arahattaṃ gaṇhāti kandarasālapariveṇe mahāsaṭṭhivassatthero viya.
tika-s0404t:702_3: There kira maraṇamañce nipajjitvā balavavedanāya nitthunante tissamahārājā “theraṃ passissāmī”ti gantvā
tika-s0404t:702_4: pariveṇadvāre ṭhito taṃ saddaṃ sutvā pucchi “kassa saddo aya”nti.
tika-s0404t:702_7: idāni na taṃ vandissāmī”ti nivattitvā mahābodhiṃ vandituṃ gato.
tika-s0404t:702_8: Tato upaṭṭhākadaharo theraṃ āha “kiṃ no, bhante,
tika-s0404t:702_10: saddhopi rājā vippaṭisārī hutvā ‘na vandissāmī’ti gato”ti. Kasmā, āvusoti?
tika-s0404t:702_12: “Tena hi me okāsaṃ karothā”ti vatvā vedanaṃ vikkhambhetvā arahattaṃ patvā daharassa saññaṃ adāsi “gacchāvuso,
tika-s0404t:702_14: Daharo gantvā “idāni kira theraṃ vandathā”ti āha.
tika-s0404t:702_15: Rājā susumārapatitena theraṃ vandanto “nāhaṃ ayyassa arahattaṃ vandāmi,
tika-s0404t:702_16: puthujjanabhūmiyaṃ pana ṭhatvā rakkhitasīlameva vandāmī”ti āha.
tika-s0404t:707_3: Tattha dve mariyādā kilesamariyādā ca ārammaṇamariyādā ca.
tika-s0404t:707_4: Sace hissa rūpādike ārabbha rāgādayo uppajjeyyuṃ,
tika-s0404t:707_6: Tesu panassa ekopi na uppannoti kilesamariyādā natthi.
tika-s0404t:707_7: Sace panassa rūpādidhamme āvajjentassa ekacce āpāthaṃ nāgaccheyyuṃ,
tika-s0404t:707_9: Te panassa dhamme āvajjentassa āpāthaṃ anāgatadhammo nāma natthīti ārammaṇamariyādāpi natthi.
tika-s0404t:707_10: Idha pana kilesamariyādā adhippetāti āha “kilesamariyādaṃ bhinditvā”tiādi.
tika-s0404t:710_2: Tato idhādhippetaṃ niddhāretvā dassetuṃ “koyaṃ kokāliko”ti pucchā.
tika-s0404t:710_3: Suttassa aṭṭhuppattiṃ dassetuṃ “kasmā ca upasaṅkamī”ti pucchā.
tika-s0404t:710_5: Vivekavāsaṃ vasitukāmattā appicchatāya ca mā no kassaci…pe… vasiṃsu.
tika-s0404t:710_7: Therā bhikkhusaṅghassa niyyādayiṃsu payuttavācāya akatattā therehi ca adāpitattā.
tika-s0404t:710_9: maññeti iminā therānaṃ kohaññe ṭhitabhāvaṃ āsaṅkati avaṇe vaṇaṃ passanto viya,
tika-s0404t:710_10: suparisuddhe ādāsatale jallaṃ uṭṭhāpento viya ca.
tika-s0404t:712_0: Pīḷakā nāma bāhirato paṭṭhāya aṭṭhīni bhindanti,
tika-s0404t:712_1: imā pana paṭhamaṃyeva aṭṭhīni bhinditvā uggatā.
tika-s0404t:712_6: Ārakkhadevatānaṃ saddaṃ sutvāti padaṃ ānetvā sambandho.
tika-s0404t:713_3: Piyasīlāti iminā etasmiṃ atthe niruttinayena pesalāti padasiddhīti dasseti.
tika-s0404t:713_5: Yattakanti bhagavato vacanaṃ aññathā karontena yattakaṃ tayā aparaddhaṃ,
tika-s0404t:713_9: tasmā yāvañca te idaṃ aparaddhanti evamettha attho daṭṭhabbo.
tika-s0404t:714_1: Gilitaviso viya visaṃ gilitvā ṭhito viya.
tika-s0404t:714_4: Khīṇāsavoti vadati sunakkhatto viya acelaṃ korakkhattiyaṃ.
tika-s0404t:714_8: Pasaṃsiyanindā tāva sampannaguṇaparidhaṃsanavasena pavattiyā sāvajjatāya kaṭukavipākā,
tika-s0404t:714_10: Tattha avijjamānaguṇasamāropanena attano paresañca micchāpaṭipattihetubhāvato pasaṃsiyena tassa samabhāvakaraṇato ca.
tika-s0404t:714_11: Lokepi hi asūraṃ sūrena samaṃ karonto gārayho hoti,
tika-s0404t:715_1: Ayaṃ appamattako aparādho diṭṭhadhammikattā sappatikārattā ca tassa.
tika-s0404t:715_2: Ayaṃ mahantataro kali katūpacitassa samparāyikattā appatikārattā ca.
tika-s0404t:716_2: Yamariyagarahī nirayaṃ upetīti ettha yathāvuttaāyuppamāṇaṃ pākatikavasena ariyūpavādinā vuttanti veditabbaṃ.
tika-s0404t:716_3: Aggasāvakānaṃ pana guṇamahantatāya tatopi ativiya mahantataramevāti vadanti.
tika-s0404t:717_0: Atha kho brahmā sahampatīti ko ayaṃ brahmā,
tika-s0404t:717_1: kasmā ca pana bhagavantaṃ upasaṅkamitvā etadavocāti?
tika-s0404t:717_2: Ayaṃ kassapassa bhagavato sāsane sahako nāma bhikkhu anāgāmī hutvā suddhāvāsesu uppanno,
tika-s0404t:717_7: bhagavā ācikkhanto ariyūpavāde ādīnavaṃ pakāsessatī”ti iminā kāraṇena bhagavantaṃ upasaṅkamitvā etadavoca.
tika-s0404t:718_1: Paccitabbaṭṭhānassāti nirayadukkhena paccitabbappadesassa etaṃ abbudoti nāmaṃ.
tika-s0404t:718_2: Vassagaṇanāti ekato paṭṭhāya dasaguṇitaṃ abbudaāyumhi tato aparaṃ vīsatiguṇitaṃ nirabbudādīsu vassagaṇanā veditabbā.
tika-s0404t:718_3: Ayañca gaṇanā aparicitānaṃ dukkarāti vuttaṃ “na taṃ sukaraṃ saṅkhātu”nti.
tika-s0404t:718_4: Keci pana “tattha tattha paridevanānattena kammakāraṇanānattenapi imāni nāmāni laddhānī”ti vadanti,
tika-s0404t:718_7: Esa nayoti heṭṭhimato uparimassa vīsatiguṇataṃ atidisati.
tika-s0404t:723_2: Catutthe tapanaṃ santapanaṃ kāyassa khedanaṃ tapo,
tika-s0404t:723_8: Lūkhaṃ pharusaṃ sādhusammatācāravirahato na pasādanīyaṃ ājīvati vattatīti lūkhājīvī,
tika-s0404t:726_5: Paṇḍitadovārikaṭṭhāniyaṃ katvā bhagavā attānaṃ dassesīti dassento “ekadvāranti kasmā āhā”ti codanaṃ samuṭṭhāpesi.
tika-s0404t:726_6: Yassā paññāya vasena puriso paṇḍitoti vuccati,
tika-s0404t:726_11: Ṭhāne ṭhāne uppatti etissā atthīti ṭhānuppattikā,
tika-s0404t:726_18: So pana heṭṭhimantena dvinnampi iṭṭhakānaṃ vigamena evaṃ vuccatīti āha “dvinnaṃ iṭṭhakānaṃ apagataṭṭhāna”nti.
tika-s0404t:729_1: Chaṭṭhe khandhāpi diṭṭhiṭṭhānaṃ ārammaṇaṭṭhena “rūpaṃ attato samanupassatī”tiādivacanato.
tika-s0404t:729_7: Yathā cāha “tadapi phassapaccayā phussa phussa paṭisaṃvediyantī”ti ca.
tika-s0404t:729_17: “tassevaṃ ayoniso manasikaroto channaṃ diṭṭhīnaṃ aññatarā diṭṭhi uppajjati,
tika-s0404t:729_18: atthi me attāti tassa saccato thetato diṭṭhi uppajjatī”tiādi.
tika-s0404t:730_0: Yā diṭṭhīti idāni vuccamānānaṃ aṭṭhārasannaṃ padānaṃ sādhāraṇaṃ mūlapadaṃ.
tika-s0404t:730_2: diṭṭhīsu vā gataṃ idaṃ dassanaṃ dvāsaṭṭhidiṭṭhīsu antogadhattātipi diṭṭhigataṃ,
tika-s0404t:730_5: natthettha attā vā nicco vā kocīti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-s0404t:730_7: Duratikkamaṭṭhena sappaṭibhayaṭṭhena ca kantāro dubbhikkhakantāravāḷakantārādayo viya.
tika-s0404t:730_11: kadāci ucchedassa vā gahaṇato virūpaṃ phanditanti vipphanditaṃ.
tika-s0404t:730_13: Diṭṭhiyeva anto tudanaṭṭhena dunnīharaṇīyaṭṭhena ca sallanti diṭṭhisallaṃ.
tika-s0404t:733_1: Navame ajjhogāhetvā adhippetamatthaṃ sambhavituṃ sādhetuṃ dukkhāni durabhisambhavāni.
tika-s0404t:733_2: Aṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana tattha nivāsoyeva dukkhoti dassetuṃ “sambhavituṃ dukkhāni dussahānī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0404t:733_4: Vanapatthasaddo hi saṇḍabhūte rukkhasamūhepi vattatīti araññaggahaṇaṃ.
tika-s0404t:733_7: rūpādiputhuttārammaṇe pakārato gamanādiiriyāpathappakārehi attano kāyassa vivecanaṃ,
tika-s0404t:733_8: gacchatopi tiṭṭhatopi nisajjatopi nipajjatopi ekasseva pavatti.
tika-s0404t:733_9: Teneva hi vivecetabbānaṃ vivecanākārassa ca bhedato bahuvidhattā te ekattena gahetvā “paviveka”nti ekavacanena vuttaṃ.
tika-s0404t:733_10: Dukkaraṃ pavivekanti vā pavivekaṃ kattuṃ na sukhanti attho.
tika-s0404t:733_15: Bhayasantāsuppādanena khādituṃ āgatā yakkharakkhasapisācādayo viyāti adhippāyo.
tika-s0404t:733_17: Tiṇapaṇṇamigādisaddehīti vāteritānaṃ tiṇapaṇṇādīnaṃ migapakkhiādīnañca bhīsanakehi bheravehi saddehi.
tika-s0404t:733_18: Vividhehi ca aññehi khāṇuādīhi yakkhādiākārehi upaṭṭhitehi bhīsanakehi.
tika-s0404t:740_6: Yathā micchādiṭṭhi vipassanāya nijjiṇṇāpi na samucchinnāti samucchedappahānadassanatthaṃ puna gahitā,
tika-s0404t:740_7: evaṃ micchāsaṅkappādayopi vipassanāya pahīnāpi asamucchinnatāya idha puna gahitāti ayamattho “micchāsaṅkappassā”tiādīsu
tika-s0404t:740_8: sabbapadesu vattabboti dasseti “evaṃ sabbapadesu yojetabbo”ti iminā.
tika-s0404t:740_9: Ettha cāti “sammāvimuttipaccayā ca aneke kusalā dhammā bhāvanāpāripūriṃ gacchantī”ti etasmiṃ pāḷipade.
tika-s0404t:740_10: Ettha ca samucchedavasena ca paṭippassaddhivasena ca paṭipakkhadhammānaṃ sammadeva vimuccanaṃ sammāvimutti.
tika-s0404t:740_11: Tappaccayā ca maggaphalesu aṭṭha indriyāni bhāvanāpāripūriṃ upagacchantīti maggasampayuttānipi saddhādīni indriyāni uddhaṭāni.
tika-s0404t:740_14: Idañhi somanassindriyaṃ ukkaṃsagatasātasabhāvato sampayuttadhamme sinehantaṃ tementaṃ viya pavattati.
tika-s0404t:745_2: Tatiye jānaṃ jānātīti sabbaññutaññāṇena jānitabbaṃ sabbaṃ jānāti eva.
tika-s0404t:745_3: Na hi padesañāṇe ṭhito jānitabbaṃ sabbaṃ jānāti.
tika-s0404t:745_4: Ukkaṭṭhaniddesena hi avisesaggahaṇena ca “jāna”nti iminā niravasesaṃ ñeyyajātaṃ pariggayhatīti tabbisayāya
tika-s0404t:745_7: Passitabbameva passatīti dibbacakkhupaññācakkhudhammacakkhubuddhacakkhusamantacakkhusaṅkhātehi ñāṇacakkhūhi passitabbaṃ passati eva.
tika-s0404t:745_8: Atha vā jānaṃ jānātīti yathā aññe savipallāsā kāmarūpapariññāvādino jānantāpi vipallāsavasena jānanti,
tika-s0404t:745_10: Bhagavā pana pahīnavipallāsattā jānanto jānāti eva,
tika-s0404t:745_12: Cakkhu viya bhūtoti dassanapariṇāyakaṭṭhena cakkhu viya bhūto.
tika-s0404t:745_13: Yathā hi cakkhu sattānaṃ dassanatthaṃ pariṇeti sādheti,
tika-s0404t:745_14: evaṃ lokassa yāthāvadassanasādhanatopi dassanakiccapariṇāyakaṭṭhena cakkhu viya bhūto,
tika-s0404t:745_15: paññācakkhumayattā vā sayambhuñāṇena paññācakkhuṃ bhūto pattoti vā cakkhubhūto.
tika-s0404t:746_1: Aviparītasabhāvaṭṭhena pariyattidhammappavattanato vā hadayena cintetvā vācāya nicchāritadhammamayoti dhammabhūto.
tika-s0404t:746_3: Dhammā vā bodhipakkhiyā tehi uppannattā lokassa ca taduppādanato,
tika-s0404t:746_4: anaññasādhāraṇaṃ vā dhammaṃ patto adhigatoti dhammabhūto.
tika-s0404t:746_11: Atthaṃ nīharitvāti dukkhādiatthaṃ tatthāpi pīḷanādiatthaṃ uddharitvā.
tika-s0404t:746_13: Amatādhigamapaṭipattidesanāya amatasacchikiriyaṃ sattesu uppādento amataṃ dadātīti amatassa dātā.
tika-s0404t:749_2: Athāyaṃ itarā pajāti yā panāyaṃ avasesā pajā sakkāyadiṭṭhitīrameva anudhāvati,
tika-s0404t:749_6: Dhammānuvattinoti taṃ dhammaṃ sutvā tadanucchavikaṃ paṭipadaṃ pūretvā maggaphalasacchikaraṇena dhammānuvattino.
tika-s0404t:749_8: Suduttaraṃ taritvā pāramessantīti ye janā dhammānuvattino,
tika-s0404t:749_9: te etaṃ suduttaraṃ duratikkamaṃ māradheyyaṃ taritvā atikkamitvā nibbānapāraṃ gamissanti.
tika-s0404t:750_0: Kaṇhaṃ dhammaṃ vippahāyāti kāyaduccaritādibhedaṃ akusalaṃ dhammaṃ jahitvā.
tika-s0404t:750_1: Sukkaṃ bhāvethāti paṇḍito bhikkhu abhinikkhamanato paṭṭhāya yāva arahattamaggā kāyasucaritādibhedaṃ sukkaṃ dhammaṃ bhāveyya.
tika-s0404t:750_4: Ālayato nikkhamitvā anālayasaṅkhātaṃ nibbānaṃ paṭicca ārabbha.
tika-s0404t:751_0: Tatrābhiratimiccheyyāti yasmiṃ anālayasaṅkhāte viveke nibbāne imehi sattehi durabhiramaṃ,
tika-s0404t:751_3: Cittaklesehīti pañcahi nīvaraṇehi attānaṃ pariyodapeyya vodāpeyya,
tika-s0404t:752_1: Sammā cittaṃ subhāvitanti sammā hetunā nayena cittaṃ suṭṭhu bhāvitaṃ vaḍḍhitaṃ.
tika-s0404t:752_3: arahattamaggañāṇajutiyā khandhādibhede dhamme jotetvā ṭhitāti attho.
tika-s0404t:752_4: Te loke parinibbutāti te imasmiṃ khandhādiloke parinibbutā nāma arahattappattito paṭṭhāya kilesavaṭṭassa khepitattā saupādisesena,
tika-s0404t:752_5: carimacittanirodhena khandhavaṭṭassa khepitattā anupādisesena cāti dvīhi parinibbānehi parinibbutā,
tika-s0404t:752_6: anupādāno viya padīpo apaṇṇattikabhāvaṃ gatāti attho.
tika-s0404t:753_0: Ito paraṃ yāva tatiyo paṇṇāsako, tāva uttānatthameva.
tika-s0404t:759_3: Sevālamālikāti pātova udakaṃ orohitvā sevālañceva uppalādīni ca gahetvā attano udakasuddhikabhāvajānanatthañceva
tika-s0404t:759_4: “lokassa ca udakena suddhi hotī”ti imassa atthassa jānanatthañca mālaṃ katvā pilandhanakā.
tika-s0404t:759_5: Udakorohakāti pāto majjhanhe sāyanhe ca udakaorohaṇakā.
tika-s0404t:764_2: Navame yasmiṃ santāne kāmāvacarakammaṃ mahaggatakammañca katūpacitaṃ vipākadāne laddhāvasaraṃ hutvā ṭhitaṃ,
tika-s0404t:764_3: tesu kāmāvacarakammaṃ itaraṃ nīharitvā sayaṃ tattha ṭhatvā attano vipākaṃ dātuṃ na sakkoti,
tika-s0404t:764_4: mahaggatakammameva pana itaraṃ paṭibāhitvā attano vipākaṃ dātuṃ sakkoti garubhāvato.
tika-s0404t:772_14: na devakāye brahmakāye vāti dassetuṃ “ye gottapaṭisārino”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0404t:772_16: ahaṃ kassapo”ti paṭi paṭi attano gottaṃ anussaranti paṭijānanti vāti attho.
tika-s0404t:777_6: Sā heṭṭhimehi heṭṭhimehi uparimānaṃ uparimānaṃ paṇītatamā hoti,
tika-s0404t:777_7: taṃ yathāsakaṃ divasavaseneva divase divase bhuñjanti.
tika-s0404t:777_9: so jivhāya ṭhapitamatto yāva kesagganakhaggā kāyaṃ pharati,
tika-s0404t:777_10: tesaṃyeva divasavasena satta divase yāpanasamattho hotī”ti vadanti.
tika-s0404t:777_12: Aṭṭhannañhi samāpattīnaṃ samāpajjanassa samayopi atthi tassa asamayopi,
tika-s0404t:777_13: maggavimokkhena pana vimuccanassa samayo vā asamayo vā natthi.
tika-s0404t:777_16: tassa gacchantassa tiṭṭhantassa nisīdantassa nipajjantassa khādantassa bhuñjantassa ca maggaphalappaṭivedho nāma na hotīti na vattabbaṃ.
tika-s0404t:777_17: Iti maggavimokkhena vimuccantassa samayo vā asamayo vā natthīti maggavimokkho asamayavimutti nāma.
tika-s0404t:780_2: Samparivattamānāti dakkhiṇeneva passena asayitvā sabbaso parivattamānā.
tika-s0404t:780_4: Sukhaṃ supatīti ettha duvidhā supanā sayane piṭṭhippasāraṇalakkhaṇā kiriyāmayacittehi avokiṇṇabhavaṅgappavattilakkhaṇā ca.
tika-s0404t:780_6: Yasmā saṇikaṃ nipajjitvā aṅgapaccaṅgāni samodhāya pāsādikena ākārena sayati,
tika-s0404t:781_0: Niddākāle sukhaṃ alabhitvā dukkhena suttattā eva paṭibujjhanakāle sarīrakhedena nitthunanaṃ vijambhanaṃ
tika-s0404t:781_1: ito cito ca viparivattanañca hotīti āha “nitthunantā vijambhantā samparivattantā dukkhaṃ paṭibujjhantī”ti.
tika-s0404t:781_2: Ayaṃ pana sukhena suttattā sarīrakhedābhāvato nitthunanādivirahitova paṭibujjhati.
tika-s0404t:782_0: Bhaddakameva supinaṃ passatīti idaṃ anubhūtapubbavasena devatūpasaṃhāravasena cassa bhaddakameva supinaṃ hoti,
tika-s0404t:782_3: Dhātukkhobhahetukampi cassa bahulaṃ bhaddakameva siyā yebhuyyena cittajarūpānuguṇatāya utuāhārajarūpānaṃ.
tika-s0404t:783_0: Ure āmukkamuttāhāro viyāti gīvāya bandhitvā ure lambitamuttāhāro viyāti kehici taṃ ekāvalivasena vuttaṃ siyā,
tika-s0404t:783_1: anekaratanāvalisamūhabhūto pana muttāhāro aṃsappadesato paṭṭhāya yāva kaṭippadesassa heṭṭhābhāgā palambanto ure āmukkoyeva nāma hoti.
tika-s0404t:784_0: Visākhatthero viyāti so kira pāṭaliputte kuṭumbiyo ahosi.
tika-s0404t:784_1: So tattheva vasamāno assosi “tambapaṇṇidīpo kira cetiyamālālaṅkato kāsāvapajjoto,
tika-s0404t:784_2: icchiticchitaṭṭhāneyevettha sakkā nisīdituṃ vā nipajjituṃ vā,
tika-s0404t:784_3: utusappāyaṃ senāsanasappāyaṃ puggalasappāyaṃ dhammassavanasappāyanti sabbamettha sulabha”nti.
tika-s0404t:784_4: So attano bhogakkhandhaṃ puttadārassa niyyātetvā dussante baddhena ekakahāpaṇeneva gharā nikkhamitvā samuddatīre nāvaṃ udikkhamāno ekaṃ māsaṃ vasi.
tika-s0404t:784_5: So vohārakusalatāya imasmiṃ ṭhāne bhaṇḍaṃ kiṇitvā asukasmiṃ vikkiṇanto dhammikāya vaṇijjāya tenevantaramāsena sahassaṃ abhisaṃhari.
tika-s0404t:784_6: Iti anupubbena mahāvihāraṃ gantvā pabbajjaṃ yācati.
tika-s0404t:784_7: So pabbājanatthāya sīmaṃ nīto taṃ sahassatthavikaṃ ovaṭṭikantarena bhūmiyaṃ pātesi.
tika-s0404t:784_11: idāneva naṃ vicārehī”ti vutte “visākhassa pabbajjaṭṭhānaṃ āgatā mā rittahatthā gamiṃsū”ti muñcitvā sīmāmāḷake vikkiritvā pabbajitvā upasampanno.
tika-s0404t:784_12: So pañcavasso hutvā dvemātikā paguṇā katvā attano sappāyaṃ kammaṭṭhānaṃ gahetvā ekekasmiṃ vihāre cattāro cattāro māse samapavattavāsaṃ vasamāno cari.
tika-s0404t:788_0: Etthantare khalitaṃ natthi, aho lābho te mārisā”ti. ;
tika-s0404t:789_0: So cittalapabbatavihāraṃ gacchanto dvedhāpathaṃ patvā “ayaṃ nu kho maggo,
tika-s0404t:789_2: Athassa pabbate adhivatthā devatā hatthaṃ pasāretvā “eso maggo”ti dasseti.
tika-s0404t:789_3: So cittalapabbatavihāraṃ gantvā tattha cattāro māse vasitvā “paccūse gamissāmī”ti cintetvā nipajji.
tika-s0404t:789_4: Caṅkamasīse maṇilarukkhe adhivatthā devatā sopānaphalake nisīditvā parodi.
tika-s0404t:789_9: Mayi idha vasante tumhākaṃ ko guṇoti? Tumhesu, bhante,
tika-s0404t:789_10: idha vasantesu amanussā aññamaññaṃ mettaṃ paṭilabhanti,
tika-s0404t:789_11: te dāni tumhesu gatesu kalahaṃ karissanti,
tika-s0404t:789_13: Thero “sace mayi idha vasante tumhākaṃ phāsuvihāro hoti,
tika-s0404t:789_14: sundara”nti vatvā aññepi cattāro māse tattheva vasitvā puna tatheva gamanacittaṃ uppādesi.
tika-s0404t:789_16: Eteneva upāyena thero tattheva vasitvā tattheva parinibbāyīti.
tika-s0404t:789_17: Evaṃ dhamattāvihārī bhikkhu amanussānaṃ piyo hoti.
tika-s0404t:790_0: Balavapiyacittatāyāti iminā balavapiyacittatāmattenapi satthaṃ na kamati,
tika-s0404t:790_3: kenaci paripanthena parihīnajjhānassa byāpādassa dūrasamussāritabhāvato khippameva samādhiyati,
tika-s0404t:790_6: Ettha ca kiñcāpi ito aññakammaṭṭhānavasena adhigatajjhānānampi sukhasupanādayo ānisaṃsā labbhanti. Yathāha –
tika-s0404t:792_0: Suppabuddhaṃ pabujjhanti, sadā gotamasāvakā”ti. ; Ca ādi –
tika-s0404t:793_0: Tathāpime ānisaṃsā brahmavihāralābhino anavasesā labbhanti byāpādādīnaṃ ujuvipaccanīkabhāvato brahmavihārānaṃ.
tika-s0404t:793_4: Byāpādādivasena ca sattānaṃ dukkhasupanādayoti tappaṭipakkhabhūtesu brahmavihāresu siddhesu sukhasupanādayo hatthagatā eva hontīti.
tika-s0404t:796_1: Chaṭṭhe beluvagāmaketi vesāliyā dakkhiṇapasse avidūre beluvagāmako nāma atthi,
tika-s0404t:797_1: saddoti tassa “bhagavatā”tiādīhi padehi samānādhikaraṇabhāvena vuttassa yena abhisambuddhabhāvena bhagavā pakato adhigato supākaṭo ca,
tika-s0404t:797_2: taṃ abhisambuddhabhāvaṃ saddhiṃ āgamanīyapaṭipadāya atthabhāveneva dassento “yo so…pe…
tika-s0404t:797_4: Satipi ñāṇadassanasaddānaṃ idha paññāvevacanabhāve tena tena visesena nesaṃ visayavisese pavattidassanatthaṃ asādhāraṇañāṇavisesavasena,
tika-s0404t:797_7: sabbaññutaññāṇamaṃsacakkhuvasena paṭivedhadesanāñāṇavasena ca tadatthaṃ yojetvā dassento “tesaṃ tesa”ntiādimāha.
tika-s0404t:797_12: Desanāpaññāya passatāti desetabbadhammānaṃ desetabbappakāraṃ bodhaneyyapuggalānañca āsayānusayacaritādhimuttiādibhedaṃ
tika-s0404t:797_15: pañcavidhamārānaṃ vā sāsanassa vā paccatthikānaṃ aññatitthiyānaṃ.
tika-s0404t:797_16: Tesaṃ pana hananaṃ pāṭihāriyehi abhibhavanaṃ appaṭibhānatākaraṇaṃ ajjhupekkhaṇañca.
tika-s0404t:798_0: Atha vā tīsu kālesu appaṭihatañāṇatāya jānatā.
tika-s0404t:798_1: Kāyakammādivasena tiṇṇampi kammānaṃ ñāṇānuparivattito nisammakāritāya passatā.
tika-s0404t:798_3: Chandādīnaṃ ahānihetubhūtāya akkhayapaṭibhānasādhikāya sabbaññutāya sammāsambuddhenāti evaṃ dasabalaaṭṭhārasaāveṇikabuddhadhammavasenapi
tika-s0404t:799_0: Abhisaṅkhatanti attano paccayehi abhisammukhabhāvena samecca sambhuyya kataṃ.
tika-s0404t:799_3: Te cassa paccayā cetanāpadhānāti dassetuṃ pāḷiyaṃ “abhisaṅkhataṃ abhisañcetayita”nti vuttanti “cetayitaṃ kappayita”nti atthamāha.
tika-s0404t:799_4: Abhisaṅkhataṃ abhisañcetayitanti ca jhānassa pātubhāvadassanamukhena viddhaṃsanabhāvaṃ ulliṅgeti.
tika-s0404t:799_8: Samathavipassanādhamme ṭhitoti ettha samathadhamme ṭhitattā samāhito vipassanaṃ paṭṭhapetvā aniccānupassanādīhi
tika-s0404t:799_9: niccasaññādayo pajahanto anukkamena taṃ anulomañāṇaṃ pāpetā hutvā vipassannādhamme ṭhito.
tika-s0404t:800_0: Evaṃ santeti evaṃ yathārutavaseneva imassa suttapadassa atthe gahetabbe sati.
tika-s0404t:800_1: Samathavipassanāsu chandarāgo kattabboti anāgāmiphalaṃ anibbattetvā tadatthāya samathavipassanāpi anibbattetvā
tika-s0404t:800_2: kevalaṃ tattha chandarāgo kattabbo bhavissati. Kasmā?
tika-s0404t:800_3: Tesu samathavipassanāsaṅkhātesu dhammesu chandarāgamattena anāgāminā laddhabbassa aladdhaanāgāmiphalenapi laddhabbattā.
tika-s0404t:800_4: Tathā sati tena anāgāmiphalampi laddhabbameva hoti.
tika-s0404t:800_6: Sabhāvato rasitabbattā aviparīto attho eva attharaso.
tika-s0404t:801_0: Aññāpi kāci sugatiyoti vinipātike sandhāyāha. Aññāpi kāci duggatiyoti asurakāyamāha.
tika-s0404t:802_0: Appaṃ yācitena bahuṃ dentena uḷārapurisena viya ekaṃ dhammaṃ pucchitena “ayampi ekadhammo”ti kathitattā
tika-s0404t:802_1: ekādasapi dhammā pucchāvasena ekadhammo nāma jāto paccekaṃ vākyaparisamāpanañāyena.
tika-s0404t:802_6: sabbānipi kammaṭṭhānāni ekarasāpi amatādhigamassa paṭipattiyāti attho.
tika-s0404t:802_7: Evamettha aggaphalabhūmi anāgāmiphalabhūmīti dveva bhūmiyo sarūpato āgatā,
tika-s0404t:802_8: nānantariyatāya pana heṭṭhimāpi dve bhūmiyo atthato āgatā evāti daṭṭhabbāti.
tika-s0404t:805_3: Ekekaṃ padaṃ nāḷaṃ mūlaṃ etissāti evaṃsaññitā ekanāḷikā.
tika-s0404t:805_4: Ekekaṃ vā padaṃ nāḷaṃ atthaniggamanamaggo etissāti ekanāḷikā.
tika-s0404t:805_6: Cattāro aṃsā bhāgā atthasallakkhaṇūpāyā etissāti caturassā.
tika-s0404t:805_8: Niyamato nisinnassa āraddhassa vatto saṃvatto etissā atthīti nisinnavattikā,
tika-s0404t:805_9: yathāraddhassa atthassa visuṃ visuṃ pariyosāpikāti attho.
tika-s0404t:805_11: Ekekassapi padassa piṇḍatthadassanavasena bahūnaṃ padānaṃ ekajjhaṃ atthaṃ akathetvā ekamekassa padassa atthavaṇṇanā ayaṃ sabbattha labbhati.
tika-s0404t:805_15: Pariyosānagamananti keci tāva āhu “kaṇhapakkhe upamaṃ dassetvā upamā ca nāma yāvadeva upameyyasampaṭipādanatthāti
tika-s0404t:805_16: upameyyatthaṃ āharitvā saṃkilesapakkhaniddeso ca vodānapakkhavibhāvanatthāyāti sukkapakkhampi upamopameyyavibhāgena
tika-s0404t:805_18: Kaṇhapakkhe upameyyaṃ dassetvā pariyosānagamanādīsupi eseva nayo”ti.
tika-s0404t:805_20: sukkapakkhe ca taṃtaṃupamūpameyyatthānaṃ visuṃ visuṃ pariyosāpetvāva kathanaṃ pariyosānagamana”nti vadanti.
tika-s0404t:805_23: Sabbācariyānaṃ āciṇṇāti sabbehipi pubbācariyehi ācaritā saṃvaṇṇitā,
tika-s0404t:806_5: Taṃ pana pariharaṇaṃ pariggahetvā vicaraṇanti āha “pariggahetvā vicaritu”nti.
tika-s0404t:806_8: parimāṇaparicchedopi sarīrarūpampīti āha “gaṇanato vā vaṇṇato vā”ti.
tika-s0404t:807_0: Dhanusattisūlādīti ettha issāsācariyānaṃ gāvīsu kataṃ dhanulakkhaṇaṃ.
tika-s0404t:807_2: Issarabhattigaṇānaṃ gāvīsu kataṃ sūlalakkhaṇanti yojanā. Ādi-
tika-s0404t:807_3: saddena rāmavāsudevagaṇādīnaṃ gāvīsu kataṃ pharasucakkādilakkhaṇaṃ saṅgaṇhāti.
tika-s0404t:811_2: Yathāruciṃ gahetvā gacchantīti gunnaṃ rucianurūpaṃ gocarabhūmiṃ vā nadipāraṃ vā gahetvā gacchanti.
tika-s0404t:812_0: Dvīhākārehīti vuttaṃ ākāradvayaṃ dassetuṃ “gaṇanato vā samuṭṭhānato vā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0404t:812_1: Evaṃ pāḷiyaṃ āgatāti “upacayo santatī”ti jātiṃ dvidhā bhinditvā hadayavatthuṃ aggahetvā dasāyatanāni
tika-s0404t:812_4: Rūpakoṭṭhāsāti vā visuṃ visuṃ appavattitvā kalāpabhāveneva pavattanato rūpakalāpā.
tika-s0404t:812_7: tassa aṃsā kesādayo koṭṭhāsāti aññepi avayavā koṭṭhāsā viya koṭṭhāsā.
tika-s0404t:813_1: Tattha rūpaṃ pariggahetvāti yathāvuttaṃ rūpaṃ salakkhaṇato ñāṇena pariggaṇhitvā.
tika-s0404t:813_2: Arūpaṃ vavatthapetvāti taṃ rūpaṃ nissāya ārammaṇañca katvā pavattamāne vedanādike cattāro khandhe arūpanti vavatthapetvā.
tika-s0404t:813_3: Rūpārūpaṃ pariggahetvāti puna tattha yaṃ rūppanalakkhaṇaṃ,
tika-s0404t:813_6: Ubhayavinimuttaṃ kiñci natthi attā vā attaniyaṃ vāti evaṃ rūpārūpaṃ pariggahetvā.
tika-s0404t:813_7: Tadubhayañca avijjādinā paccayena sapaccayanti paccayaṃ sallakkhetvā,
tika-s0404t:813_8: aniccatādilakkhaṇaṃ āropetvā yo kalāpasammasanādikkamena kammaṭṭhānaṃ matthakaṃ pāpetuṃ na sakkoti,
tika-s0404t:814_9: vacīviññattīti idaṃ dvayaṃ cittavasenāti ettakaṃ rūpaṃ ekasamuṭṭhānaṃ.
tika-s0404t:814_18: kabaḷīkāro āhāroti ettakaṃ rūpaṃ utucittāhārakammavasena catusamuṭṭhānaṃ. Upacayo, santati, jaratā,
tika-s0404t:814_19: rūpassa aniccatāti ettakaṃ rūpaṃ na kutoci samuṭṭhātīti na jānāti.
tika-s0404t:814_20: Samuṭṭhānato rūpaṃ ajānantotiādīsu vattabbaṃ “gaṇanato rūpaṃ ajānanto”tiādīsu vuttanayeneva veditabbaṃ.
tika-s0404t:815_0: Kammalakkhaṇoti attanā kataṃ duccaritakammaṃ lakkhaṇaṃ etassāti kammalakkhaṇo, bālo.
tika-s0404t:815_11: Attanā kataṃ sucaritakammaṃ lakkhaṇaṃ etassāti kammalakkhaṇo, paṇḍito.
tika-s0404t:816_0: Bāle vajjetvā paṇḍite na sevatīti yaṃ bālapuggale vajjetvā paṇḍitasevanaṃ atthakāmena kātabbaṃ,
tika-s0404t:816_2: Tathābhūtassa ca ayamādīnavoti dassetuṃ puna “bāle vajjetvā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0404t:816_3: Tattha yaṃ bhagavatā “idaṃ vo kappatī”ti anuññātaṃ,
tika-s0404t:816_23: satekicchātekicchaṃ ajānanto suvisuddhaṃ katvā sīlaṃ rakkhituṃ na sakkoti.
