tika-s0404t:816_26: kāraṇākāraṇaṃ ajānanto khandhādīsu akusalatāya rūpārūpapariggahampi kātuṃ na sakkoti,
tika-s0404t:817_0: Govaṇasadise attabhāve uppajjitvā tattha dukkhuppattihetuto micchāvitakkā āsāṭikā viyāti āsāṭikāti āha “akusalavitakkaṃ āsāṭikaṃ ahāretvā”ti.
tika-s0404t:818_2: pañcannetaṃ upādānakkhandhānaṃ adhivacana”nti vacanato chahi vaṇamukhehi vissandamānayūso gaṇḍo viya
tika-s0404t:818_3: pilotikākhaṇḍena chadvārehi vissandamānakilesāsuci attabhāvavaṇo satisaṃvarena pidahitabbo,
tika-s0404t:818_4: ayaṃ pana evaṃ na karotīti āha “yathā so gopālako vaṇaṃ na paṭicchādeti,
tika-s0404t:819_0: Yathā dhūmo indhanaṃ nissāya uppajjamāno saṇho sukhumo,
tika-s0404t:819_1: taṃ taṃ vivaraṃ anupavissa byāpento sattānaṃ ḍaṃsamakasādiparissayaṃ vinodeti,
tika-s0404t:819_3: evaṃ dhammadesanāñāṇassa indhanabhūtaṃ rūpārūpadhammajātaṃ nissāya uppajjamānā saṇhā sukhumā taṃ taṃ
tika-s0404t:819_7: tasmā dhūmo viyāti dhūmoti āha “gopālako dhūmaṃ viya dhammadesanādhūmaṃ na karotī”ti.
tika-s0404t:819_8: Attano santikaṃ upagantvā nisinnassa kātabbā tadanucchavikā dhammakathā upanisinnakakathā.
tika-s0404t:819_12: Nanu attano jānāpanatthaṃ dhammakathādi na kātabbamevāti?
tika-s0404t:819_14: suddhāsayena pana dhamme kathite tassa guṇajānanaṃ sandhāyetaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-s0404t:821_0: Bhāsaye jotaye dhammaṃ, paggaṇhe isinaṃ dhaja”nti.
tika-s0404t:822_2: Yathā pana taṃ udakena otiṇṇasattānaṃ sarīramalaṃ pavāheti,
tika-s0404t:822_5: evaṃ bahussutā attano samīpaṃ otiṇṇasattānaṃ dhammodakena cittamalaṃ pavāhenti,
tika-s0404t:822_11: idaṃ byañjanaṃ ayaṃ saddo kathaṃ imasmiṃ atthe ropetabbo,
tika-s0404t:822_12: kena pakārena imassa atthassa vācako jāto.
tika-s0404t:822_14: nirūpetabbaṃ ayaṃ sabhāvanirutti kathamettha nirūḷhāti adhippāyo.
tika-s0404t:822_15: Imassa bhāsitassa ko atthoti saddatthaṃ pucchati.
tika-s0404t:822_20: Na paripucchatīti vimaticchedanapucchāvasena sabbaso pucchaṃ na karoti.
tika-s0404t:822_21: Na paripañhatīti pari pari attano ñātuṃ icchaṃ na ācikkhati,
tika-s0404t:822_25: Vivaraṇaṃ nāma atthassa vibhajitvā kathananti āha “bhājetvā na desentī”ti.
tika-s0404t:822_27: Na uttāniṃ karontīti sinerupādamūle vālikaṃ uddharanto viya pathavīsandhārodakaṃ vivaritvā dassento viya ca uttānaṃ na karonti.
tika-s0404t:823_0: Evaṃ yassa dhammassa vasena bahussutā “tittha”nti vuttā pariyāyato.
tika-s0404t:823_1: Idāni tameva dhammaṃ nippariyāyato “tittha”nti dassetuṃ “yathā vā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0404t:823_2: Dhammo hi taranti otaranti etena nibbānaṃ nāma taḷākanti “tittha”nti vuccati.
tika-s0404t:825_0: Na gavesati taṃ taḷākaṃ, na doso amatantaḷe”ti. –
tika-s0404t:826_0: Dhammasseva nibbānassotaraṇatitthabhūtassa otaraṇākāraṃ ajānanto “dhammatitthaṃ na jānātī”ti vutto.
tika-s0404t:827_0: Pītāpītanti gogaṇe pītaṃ apītañca gorūpaṃ na jānāti,
tika-s0404t:827_3: “Ānisaṃsaṃ na vindatī”ti vatvā tassa avindanākāraṃ dassento “dhammassavanaggaṃ gantvā”tiādimāha.
tika-s0404t:828_3: Aṭṭhaṅgikanti ca visuṃ ekajjhañca aṭṭhaṅgikaṃ upādāya gahetabbaṃ,
tika-s0404t:828_5: Evañca katvā sattaṅgassapi ariyamaggassa saṅgaho siddho hoti.
tika-s0404t:829_2: tattha sammohaviddhaṃsanavasena pavattā nibbānārammaṇā lokuttarāti evaṃ “ime lokiyā,
tika-s0404t:830_0: Anavasesaṃ duhatīti paṭiggahaṇe mattaṃ ajānanto kismiñci dāyake saddhāhāniyā,
tika-s0404t:831_0: “Ime amhesu garucittīkāraṃ na karontī”ti iminā navakānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ sammāpaṭipattiyā abhāvaṃ dasseti ācariyupajjhāyesu pitupemassa anupaṭṭhāpanato,
tika-s0404t:831_3: Na hi sīlādiguṇehi sāsane thirabhāvappattā ananuggahetabbe sabrahmacārī anuggaṇhanti,
tika-s0404t:831_8: Vuttavipallāsavasenāti “na rūpaññū”tiādīsu vuttassa paṭisedhassa paṭikkhepavasena aggahaṇavasena.
tika-s0404t:831_9: Yojetvāti “rūpaññū hotīti gaṇanato vā vaṇṇato vā rūpaṃ jānātī”tiādinā,
tika-s0404t:831_11: pañcagorasaparibhogatopi na paribāhiro hotī”tiādinā ca atthaṃ yojetvā.
tika-s0404t:831_12: Veditabboti tasmiṃ tasmiṃ pade yathārahaṃ attho veditabbo.
tika-s0404t:838_2: Mūlaṭṭhakathāsāranti pubbe vuttaaṅguttaramahāaṭṭhakathāya sārameva anunigamavasena vadati.
tika-s0404t:838_5: aṅguttaramahāaṭṭhakathāya atthasāraṃ ādāya imaṃ manorathapūraṇiṃ karonto sesamahānikāyānampi mūlaṭṭhakathāsu
tika-s0404t:838_7: Mahāvihārādhivāsīnanti ca idaṃ purimapacchimapadehi saddhiṃ sambandhitabbaṃ “mahāvihārādhivāsīnaṃ samayaṃ pakāsayantī,
tika-s0404t:838_10: Hotu sabbo sukhī lokoti kāmāvacarādivibhāgo sabbo sattaloko yathārahaṃ bodhittayādhigamavasena sampattena
tika-s0404t:838_11: nibbānasukhena sukhī sukhito hotūti sadevakassa lokassa accantaṃ sukhādhigamāya attano puññaṃ pariṇāmeti.
tika-s0404t:849_0: Yaṃ siddhaṃ iminā puññaṃ, yaṃ caññaṃ pasutaṃ mayā;
tika-s0404t:857_0: Sadā rakkhantu rājāno, dhammeneva imaṃ pajaṃ;
tika-s0404t:859_0: Ime ca pāṇino sabbe, sabbadā nirupaddavā;
